GSP33brssgo3u:2715: sthite caivaṃ sarvavedāntapratyayatve sarvavijñānānāmanyatroditānāṃ vijñānaguṇānāmanyatrāpi samāne vijñāna upasaṃhāro bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2717: ya eva hi teṣāṃ guṇānāmekatrārtho viśiṣṭavijñānopakārakaḥ sa evānyatrāpi /
GSP33brssgo3u:2721: yadi hi vijñānabhedo bhavettato vijñānāntaranibaddhatvādguṇānāṃ prakṛtivikṛtibhāvābhāvācca na syādupasaṃhāraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2723: asyaiva tu prayojanasūtrasya prapañcaḥ sarvābhedādityārabhya bhaviṣyati // 5 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2725: śākhābhede samānavidyāyāṃ śrutā guṇā yathāśruti vyavasthitā uta ekatrāśrutā itaraśākhāta
GSP33brssgo3u:2726: upasaṃhartavyā iti saṃdehe vidyaikye 'pi tatra tatroktaireva guṇairvidyopakārasiddheḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2735: nanvāgneyayāgāvaruddhānāṃ guṇānāṃ tato 'bhinne saurye prāptivadvidyāntarasthaguṇānāṃ vidyāntare prāptiḥ kiṃ syādityata āha-prakṛtīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2736: prakṛtiguṇānāṃ vikāre prāptiryuktā vidyānāṃ tu prakṛtivikṛtibhāvāsiddherna tatprāptirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2742: anyathātvaṃ śabdād iti cen nāviśeṣāt / BBs_3,3.6 /
GSP33brssgo3u:2746: paṭhyate - 'atha hemamāsanyaṃ prāṇamūcustvaṃ na udgāyeti tatheti tebhya eṣa prāṇa
GSP33brssgo3u:2749: iti prakramyetarānprāṇānasurapāpmaviddhatvena ninditvā tathaiva mukhyaprāṇaparigrahaḥ paṭhyate - 'atha ha ya evāyaṃ mukhyaḥ prāṇastamudgīthamupāsāṃcakrire' (chā. 1.2.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2754: anyathā hi prakramante vājasaneyino 'nyathā chandogāḥ 'tvaṃ na udgāya' (bṛ. 1.3.2)
GSP33brssgo3u:2764: vājasaneyake 'picodgīthasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prāṇasya śrutam - 'eṣa u vā udgīthaḥ' (bṛ. 1.3.23) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2771: 'te ha devāḥ sāttvikavṛttayaḥ prāṇā anyonyamucūrhantedānīmasminyajñe udgīthenaudgātreṇa
GSP33brssgo3u:2772: karmaṇā rajastamovṛttirūpānasurānatītya devatvaṃ gacchāmaḥ'iti te caivaṃ nirdeṣamudgīthakartāramupāsyaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2773: nirdhārayituṃ kṛtasaṃvādāḥ prathamaṃ vācyaṃ parīkṣitavantastvamaudgātraṃ no 'smākaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2774: kurviti tayā tvanṛtaṃ kṛtaṃ tathā ghrāṇacakṣuḥśrotramanāṃsyapi kāmenāsurapāpmanā
GSP33brssgo3u:2775: grastānīti ninditvā āsanyamāsye bhavaṃ mukhamadhyasthaṃ prāṇamupāsyaṃ nirdhāritavanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2778: atra pūrvādhikaraṇasiddhāntanyāyenodgīthavidyeti saṃjñaikyena vidyaikyamiti pūrvapakṣe mitho guṇopasaṃhāraḥ phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2780: evaṃ yatra pūrvanyāyena pūrvapakṣaḥ tatrāpavādikī saṃgatiriti mantavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2787: alparūpabhedo na vidyaikyavirodhītyuktanyāyena pūrvapakṣī pariharati-naiṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2789: yathāśmānaṃ prāpya loṣṭo vidhvaṃsate tathā prāṇaṃ hantumāgatā asurāstasya vīryeṇa svayameva dhvastā iti śrutamubhayatretyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2791: udgīthakartṛrūpatvena prāṇasyobhayatra śrutatvādekatra śrutaṃ kartṛtvamapyubhayatra draṣṭavyamityarthaḥ //6//
GSP33brssgo3u:2795: na vā vidyaikatvamātra nyāyyaṃ vidyābheda evātra nyāyyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2801: ityevamudgīthāvayavasyoṅkārasyopāsyatvaṃ prastutya rasatamādiguṇopavyākhyānaṃ tatra kṛtvā atha khalvetasyaivākṣarasyopavyākhyānaṃ bhavati (chā.
GSP33brssgo3u:2802: iti punarapi tamevodgīthāvayavamoṅkāramanuvartya devāsurākhyāyikādvāreṇa tam prāṇamudgīthamupāsāṃcakrire (chā. 1.2.2) ityāha /
GSP33brssgo3u:2803: tatra yadyudgīthaśabdena sakalā bhaktirabhipreyeta tasyāśca kartodgātartviktata upakramaścoparapadhyeta lakṣaṇā ca psajyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2808: ityapi tasyāḥ kartodgātartvikprāṇatvena nirūpyata iti prasthānāntaram /
GSP33brssgo3u:2809: yadapi tatrodgīthasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ prāṇasya tadapyudgātṛtvenaiva didarśayiṣitasya prāṇasya sarvātmatvapratipādanārthamiti na vidyaikatvamāvahati
GSP33brssgo3u:2810: sakalabhaktiviṣaya eva ca tatrāpyudgīthaśabda iti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2813: tathāca tatraiva śrāvitam- vācā ca hyeva sa prāṇena codagāyat (bṛ. 1.3.24) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2815: tathāhyabhyudayavākye paśukāmavākye ca tredhā taṇḍulānvibhajedye madhyamāḥ syustānagnaye
GSP33brssgo3u:2831: āptiḥ samṛddhiriti guṇānuktvā guṇavatyoṅkāre prāṇadṛṣṭividhānāyākhyāyikā prastutetyāha-rasatameti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2833: prāṇamudgīthamityatrāpyudgīthakartā prāṇa upāsya iti vyākhyāyatāmityata āha-tatra yadyudgītheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2834: oṅkāropāstyupakramasaṅga udgīthapade kartṛlakṣaṇā ceti doṣadvayaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2835: nanu siddhānte 'pi tatpade 'vayavalakṣaṇā svīkāryā tato varaṃ kartṛlakṣaṇā śrutyantarānugrahāttathā
GSP33brssgo3u:2841: evaṃ chāndogye oṅkāra upāsya ukta itaratra tu prāṇa ityupāsyabhedādvidyābheda ityāha-vājeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2843: tatrodgītha upāsyatayā noktaḥ kintu prāṇasyopāsyasya guṇatayetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2846: sa udgātā vāgviśiṣṭaprāṇenaudgātraṃ kṛtavāniti śruterasaṃbhavo 'pi netyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2849: ekatrodgātā prāṇa upāsyo 'nyatroṅkāra ityantaraṅgopāsyarūpabhede spaṣṭe sati bahiraṅgārthavādasāmyamātreṇa nopāsanaikyaṃ yuktamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2851: 'vi vā etaṃ prajayā paśubhirardhayati vardhayatyasya bhrātṛvyaṃ yasya havirniruptaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2852: purastāccandramā abhyudeti tredhā taṇḍulānvibhajedye madhyamāḥ syustānagnaye dātre
GSP33brssgo3u:2853: puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ kuryādye sthaviṣṭhāstānindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścaruṃ ye 'ṇiṣṭhāstānviṣṇave
GSP33brssgo3u:2857: candramāśca paścādabhyudeti tametaṃ yajamānaṃ kālavyatyayāparādhāttadeva niruptaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2858: haviḥ prajādinārdhayati viyojayati śatruṃ cāsya vardhayati yasmātkālabhrāntimānyajamānaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2859: ye madhyamādibhāvena tredhā bhūtāstaṇḍulā dadhyādisahitā niruptāstānvibhajedagnyādibhyo
GSP33brssgo3u:2860: viyojayadviyojya ca dātṛtvādiguṇakānagnyādibhyo darśadevābhinnebhyo nirvapediti dadhan
GSP33brssgo3u:2862: atra kālāparādhe devāntarayuktaṃ prāyaścittarūpaṃ darśādbhinnaṃ karma vidhīyata iti
GSP33brssgo3u:2863: prāpte taṇḍulatredhātvādyanuvādena vibhajediti haviṣaḥ prakṛtadevaviyogena tasminneva
GSP33brssgo3u:2866: paśukāmavākye tu yadyapi ye sthaviṣṭhāstānagnaye sanimate 'ṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapedye
GSP33brssgo3u:2867: madhyamāstān viṣaṇave śipiviṣṭāya śṛte caruṃ ye kṣodiṣṭhāstānindrāya pradātre dadhaṃścarumiti
GSP33brssgo3u:2869: tathāpi yaḥ paśukāmaḥ syātso 'māvāsyāmiṣṭvā vatsānapākuryāditi nityaṃ darśakarma
GSP33brssgo3u:2871: nābhyudayavākyenārthaikyamiti tathā prakṛte 'pi nirdeśasāmyaṃ na vidyaikyaprayojakamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2874: para iti sakārāntaṃ parasmāt paraścāsau varācca varatara iti parovarīyānityekaṃ padam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2876: ākāśātmanā hiraṇyaśmaśrupuruṣātmanā codgīthopāstisāmye 'pi vidyābhedavadihāpi bheda ityarthaḥ //7//
GSP33brssgo3u:2879: saṃjñātaś cet tad uktam asti tu tad api / BBs_3,3.8 /
GSP33brssgo3u:2882: uktaṃ hyetat - 'na vā prakaraṇabhedātparovarīyastvādivat' (bra. sū. 3.3.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2883: tadeva cātra nyāyyataraṃ śrutyakṣarānugataṃ hi tatsaṃjñaikatvaṃ tu śrutyakṣarabāhyamudgīthaśabdamātraprayogāllaukikairvyahartṛbhirupacaryate
GSP33brssgo3u:2885: tathā prasiddhabhedānāmapyagnihotradarśapūrṇamāsādīnāṃ kāṭhakaikagranthaparipaṭhitānāṃ kāṭhakasaṃjñakatvaṃ dṛśyate tathehāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2886: yatra tu nāsti kaścidevañjātīyako bhedahetustatra bhavatu saṃjñaikatvādvidyaikatvaṃ yathā saṃvargavidyādiṣu // 8 //
GSP33brssgo3u:2892: asati bādhake saṃjñaikyamapi mānaṃ yathā saṃvargavidyeti saṃjñaikyātsarvaśākhāsu tadvidyaikyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2899: ityatrākṣarodgīthaśabdayoḥ sāmānādhikaraṇye śrūyamāṇe 'dhyāsāpavādaikatvaviśeṣaṇapakṣāṇāṃ pratibhāsanātkatamo 'tra pakṣo nyāyyaḥ syāditi vicāraḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2902: yathā nāmni brahmabuddhāvadhyasyamānāyāmapyanuvartata eva nāmabuddhirna brahmabuddhyā nivartate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2905: apavādo nāma yatra kasmiṃścidvastuni pūrvaniviṣṭāyāṃ mithyābuddhau niścitāyāṃ paścādupajāyamānā yathārthā buddhiḥ pūrvaniviṣṭāyā mithyābuddhernivartikā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:2913: viśeṣaṇaṃ punaḥ sarvavedavyāpina omityetasyākṣarasya grahaṇaprasaṅga audgātraviśeṣasya samarpaṇam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2916: evametasminsāmānādhikaraṇyavākye vimṛśyamāna ete pakṣāḥ pratibhānti tatrānyatamanirdhāraṇakāraṇābhāvādanirdāraṇaprāptāvidamucyate - vyāpteśca samañjasamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2918: tadiha kṣayaḥ pakṣāḥ sāvadyā iti paryudasyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:2920: tatrādhyāse tāvadyā buddhiritaratrādhyasyate tacchabdasya lakṣaṇāvṛttitvaṃ prasajyeta tatphalaṃ ca kalpyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:2921: śrūyata eva phalam 'āpayitā ha vai kāmānāṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.7)
GSP33brssgo3u:2931: nāpyekatvapakṣaḥ saṃgacchate niṣprayojanaṃ hi tadā śabdadvayoccāraṇaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2933: naca hautraviṣaya ādhvaryavaviṣaye vākṣara oṅkāraśabdavācya udgīthaśabdaprasiddhirasti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2938: sarvavyāpyakṣaramiha mā prasañjītyata udgīthaśabdenākṣaraṃ viśeṣyate kathaṃ nāmodgīthāvayavabhūta oṅkāro gṛhyeteti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2943: adhyāsapakṣe hyarthāntarabuddhirarthāntare nikṣipyata iti viprakṛṣṭā lakṣaṇā viśeṣaṇapakṣe pravṛttāḥ śabdā avayaveṣvapi pravartamānā dṛṣṭāḥ paṭagrāmādiṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:2952: pūrvamudgātṛkarmātmakodgīthāvayavatvamoṅkārasya dhyeyasya viśeṣaṇaṃ siddhavatkṛtya dhyeyabhedādvidyābhedaḥ siddhāntitaḥ sa na yukta ityākṣepasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣayati-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2953: atra pūrvapakṣe pūrvoktasiddhāntāsiddhiḥ phalaṃ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti matvā siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-caśabda ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2955: yasyodgīthasya buddhiroṅkāre 'dhyasyate tadvācakodgīthaśabdasyoṅkāre lakṣaṇā syāttadbuddhiviṣayatvaguṇaparatvāttathā saṃbandho 'pyasiddhaḥ kalpanīyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:2956: pratīkopāsteḥ phalaṃ ca kalpyamiti gauravaṃ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2959: 'oṅkāra āptiḥ samṛddhiriti' 'ya upāste sa kāmānāpnoti'iti śrutaṃ phalaṃ nādhyāsasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2961: bhrāntiścet nivarteta na tu nivartata ityabhrantirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2962: kiñca tattvabodhakādvākyādbhrāntyapavādo bhavati nedaṃ vākyaṃ tattvaparamityāha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2966: 'omityakṣaramupāsīta'ityukte sarvavedavyāpyoṅkāra ihopāstau prasajyeta tannirāsārthamudgīthāvayavatvaṃ viśeṣaṇaṃ samañjasamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2967: adhyāsapakṣe tadbuddhiviṣayatvaguṇayogarūpaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpya iti viprakṛṣṭā lakṣaṇā avayavalakṣaṇā tu saṃnikṛṣṭā avayavāvayavisaṃbandhasya
GSP33brssgo3u:2968: paṭāvayave dagdhe paṭo dagdha iti loke prayogācca /
GSP33brssgo3u:2969: nāmādau brahmaśabdasya tvagatyā brahmabuddhigrāhyatvaguṇalakṣaṇāśritā tatra pratīkopāstervivakṣitatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2970: iha tu pratīkopāstividhikalpane āptyādiguṇakoṅkāre prāṇadṛṣṭividhāne ca vākyabhedaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:2977: vājināṃ chandogānāṃ ca prāṇasaṃvāde śraiṣṭhyaguṇānvitasya prāṇasyopāsyatvamuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2978: vāgādayo 'pi hi tatra vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇānvitā uktāḥ te ca prāṇe punaḥ pratyarpitāḥ - 'yadvā ahaṃ vasiṣṭho 'smi tvaṃ tadvasiśṣo 'si' (bṛ. 6.1.14) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:2979: anyeṣāmapi tu śākhināṃ kauṣītaki prabhṛtīnāṃ prāṇasaṃvādeṣu athāto niḥśreyasādānam 'etā ha vai devatā ahaṃśreyase vivadamānāḥ' (kau. 2.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:2980: ityevañjātīyakeṣu prāṇasya śraiḥṣṭamuktaṃ na tvime vasiṣṭhatvādayo 'pi guṇā uktāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:2981: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimime vasiṣṭhatvādayo guṇāḥ kvaciduktā anyatrāpyasyerannuta nāsyeranniti /
GSP33brssgo3u:2984: 'atho ya evaṃ vidvānprāṇe niḥśreyasaṃ viditvā' iti tatratatraivaṃśabdena vedyaṃ vastu nivedyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:2985: evaṃśabdaśca saṃnihitāvalambano na śākhāntaraparipaṭhimevañjātīyakaṃ guṇajātaṃ śaknoti nivedayitum /
GSP33brssgo3u:2987: evaṃ prāpte pratyāha - asyetanniyame guṇāḥ kvaciduktā vasiṣṭhatvādayo 'nyatrāpi /
GSP33brssgo3u:2991: abhede ca vijñānasya kathamime guṇāḥ kvaciduktā anyatra nāsyeran /
GSP33brssgo3u:2992: nanvevaṃśabdastatra tatra bhedenaivañjātīyakaṃ guṇajātaṃ vedyatvāya samarpayatītyuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:2994: tasminneva vijñāne vājasaneyibrāhmaṇagatenaivaṃśabdena tatsaṃśabditamiti na paraśākhāgatamapyabhinnavijñānāvaruddhaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:2997: ekasyāmapi hi śākhāyāṃ śrutā guṇāḥ śrutā eva sarvatra bhavanti guṇavato bhedābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:2998: nahi devadattaḥ śauryādiguṇatvena svadeśe prasiddho deśāntaraṃ gatastaddeśyairavibhāvitaśauryādiguṇo 'pyatadguṇo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3010: te ca guṇāḥ prāṇasya śraiṣṭhyaṃ niścitya vāgādibhistasminnarpitā iti śākhādvayasaṃmator'thaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3017: yathā vāgādibhyaḥ prāṇaśraiṣṭhyaṃ siddhamatho tathā ya evaṃ śraiṣṭhyaguṇaṃ vidvānupāste sa prāṇe śraiṣṭhyaṃ viditvā śreṣṭho bhavatīti śrutyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3018: evaṃ jātīyakavidyaikyātprāptamārthikaṃ vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇajātamevaṃśabdo na gṛhṇāti śrutāvalambitvāditi prāpte siddhāntayati-asyeranniti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3019: vājasaneyibrāhmaṇe tāvadevaṃśabdena vasiṣṭhatvādiguṇajātasya prāṇavidyāsaṃbandhaḥ siddhaḥ saiva vidyā kauṣītakiśrutau pratyabhijñāyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:3028: aparigaṇitā api guṇāḥ śrutā evetyatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-nahīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3034: brahmasvarūpapratipādanaparāsu śrutiṣvānandarūpatvaṃ vijñānaghanatvaṃ sarvagatatvaṃ sarvātmatvamityevañjātīyakā brahmaṇo dharmāḥ kvacitkecicchrūyante
GSP33brssgo3u:3035: teṣu saṃśayaḥ - kimānandādayo brahmadharmā yatra yāvantaḥ śrūyante tāvanta eva tatra pratipattavyāḥ kiṃvā sarve sarvatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3036: tatra yathāśrutivibhāgaṃ dharmapratipattau prāptāyāmidamucyate - ānandādayaḥ pradhānasya brahmaṇo dharmāḥ sarve sarvatra pratipattavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3039: sarvatra hi tadevaikaṃ pradhānaṃ viśeṣyaṃ brahma na bhidyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3041: nanvevaṃ sati priyaśirastvādayo 'pi dharmāḥ sarvatra saṃkīryeran /
GSP33brssgo3u:3042: tathāhi - taittirīyaka ānandamayamātmānaṃ prakramyāmnāyate - 'tasya priyameva śiraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3052: brahmaṇastu nirviśeṣatvātsvaśākhāgatapadaireva pramitisiddhervyarthaḥ padāntaropasaṃhāra iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3057: tāni ca samānādhikaraṇāni padāni viruddhadharmatyāgena sarvādhiṣṭhānabhūtāmekāmakhaṇḍavyaktiṃ kṣayanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3058: na caikenaiva padena lakṣyasiddheḥ padāntaraṃ vyarthamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3060: yadyapi padadvaye 'pi lakṣaṇāvatarati tathāpyānando brahmetyukte duḥkhatvālpatvabhrantinirāse 'pyasattvajaḍatvādibhramo bhavedatastannirāsārthaṃ satyajñānādipadāni prayoktavyāni /
GSP33brssgo3u:3063: tacca viśeṣadarśanaṃ yāvadbhiḥ padairbhavati tāvanti padānyupasaṃhartavyānīti bhāvaḥ //11//
GSP33brssgo3u:3068: priyaśirastvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ taittirīyaka āmnātānāṃ nāstyanyatra prāptiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3069: yatkāraṇaṃ priyaṃ modaḥ pramoda ānanda ityete parasparāpekṣayā bhoktrantarāpekṣayā copacitāpacitarūpā upalabhyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:3075: apica parasminbrahmaṇi cittāvatāropāyamātratvenaite parikalpyante na draṣṭavyatvena /
GSP33brssgo3u:3078: sa ca nyāyo 'nyeṣu niściteṣu brahmadharmeṣūpāsanāyopadiśyamāneṣu netavyaḥ saṃyadvāmādiṣu satyakāmādiṣu ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:3079: teṣu hi satyapyupāsyasya brahmaṇa ekatme prakramabhedādupāsanābhede sati nānyonyadharmāṇāmanyonyatra prāptiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3080: yathā ca dve nāryāvekaṃ nṛpatimupāsate chatreṇaikā cāmareṇānyā tatropāsyaikatve 'pyupāsanābhedo dharmavyavasthā ca bhavetyevamihāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3081: upacitāpacitaguṇatvaṃ hi sati bhedavyavahāre saguṇe brahmaṇyupapadyate na nirguṇe parasminbrahmaṇi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3082: ato na satyakāmatvādīnāṃ dharmāṇāṃ kvacicchrutānāṃ sarvatra prāptirityarthaḥ // 12 //
GSP33brssgo3u:3083: brahmaikyāccedānandatvādidharmāṇāṃ sarvatra prāptistarhi saguṇabrahmavidyāgatadharmaprāptirapi syāditi śaṅkānirāsārthaṃ sūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-priyeti
GSP33brssgo3u:3084: putradarśanasukhaṃ priyaṃ tadvārtādinā modastasya vidyādyatiśaye pramoda ityevaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3085: tāratamyavanto dharmāstvadvaye jñeye na prāpnuvanti teṣāmabrahmasvarūpāṇāṃ brahmajñānānupayogāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3086: teṣāṃ brahma dharmatvaṃ cāsiddhamityāha-na caita iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3098: brahmaṇo dharmiṇa ekatvātsarve sarvatra pratīyeranniti vaiṣamyaṃ pratipattimātraprayojanā hi ta iti // 13 //
GSP33brssgo3u:3105: kāṭhake hi paṭhyate - 'indriyebhyaḥ parā hyarthā arthebhyaśca paraṃ manaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3107: ityārabhya 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā sā parā gatiḥ' (ka. 3.11 ) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3108: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimime sarva evārthādayastatastataḥ paratvena pratipādyanta uta puruṣa evaibhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ paraḥ pratipādyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3109: tatra tāvatsarveṣāmevaiṣāṃ paratvena pratipādanamiti bhavati matiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3112: nanu bahuṣvartheṣu paratvena pratipipādayiṣiteṣu vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3117: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - puruṣa eva hyebhyaḥ sarvebhyaḥ paraḥ pratipādya iti yuktaṃ na pratyekameṣāṃ paratvapratipādanam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3120: nahītareṣu paratvena pratipanneṣu kiñcitprayojanaṃ dṛśyate prayojanaṃ mokṣasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3122: apica parapratiṣedhena kāṣṭhāśabdena ca puruṣaviṣayamādaraṃ darśayanpuruṣapratipattyarthaiva pūrvāparapravāhoktiriti darśayati - ādhyānāyeti
GSP33brssgo3u:3132: utsūtrasiddhāntaṃ pratijñāya sautraṃ hetuṃ vyācaṣṭe-puruṣa eveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3133: phalavattve satyapūrvatvātpuruṣasyaiva prādhānyena pratipādyatvamaphalārthādīnāṃ paratvaṃ tu taccheṣatvenocyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3134: kiñca 'puruṣānna paraṃ kiñcitsā kāṣṭhā'iti vedaḥ paraniṣedhaliṅgena sarvabādhāvadhitvaliṅgena
GSP33brssgo3u:3137: arthādīnāmatroktirādhyānāya tattatparatvādhyānapūrvakaṃ puruṣadarśanāyaiva svataḥ prayojanābhāvāditi sūtraṃ yojayati-ādhyānāyeti //14//
GSP33brssgo3u:3142: yatkāraṇam 'eṣa sarveṣu bhūteṣu gūḍhotmā na prakāśate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3146: tasyaiva ca durvijñānatāṃ saṃskṛtamitigamyatāṃ ca darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3150: evamanekaprakāra āśayātiśayaḥ śruteḥ puruṣe lakṣyate netareṣu /
GSP33brssgo3u:3152: ityukte kiṃ tadadhvanaḥ pāraṃ viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padamityasyāmākāṅkṣāyāmindriyādyanukramaṇātparamapadapratipattyartha evāyamāyāma ityavasīyate //
GSP33brssgo3u:3155: puraṣānna paraṃ kiñcit'ityupakramopasaṃhārayoraikarūpyātkḷptaphalavadekapuruṣaparatvenaikavākyatvaniścaye sati vākyabhedaphalabhedakalpanā na yuktā gauravādityāha-apiceti //15//
GSP33brssgo3u:3160: aitareyake śrūyate - 'ātmā vā idameka evāgra āsīnnānyatkiñcana miṣatsa īkṣata lokānnu sṛjā' (ai. 1.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:3162: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ para evātmaśabdenābhilapyata utānyaḥ kaściditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3166: nanu vākyānvayaḥ sutarāṃ paramātmaviṣayo dṛśyate prāgutpatterātmaikatvāvadhāraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3170: paramātmani hi sraṣṭari parigṛhyamāṇe mahābhūtasṛṣṭirādau vaktavyā lokasṛṣṭistvihādāvucyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3174: smṛtirapi 'sa vai śarīrī prathamaḥsa vai puruṣaḥ ucyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3175: ādikartā sa bhūtānāṃ brahmāgre samavartata' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3176: aitareyiṇo 'pi athāto retasaḥ prajāpate reto devāḥ ityatra pūrvasminprakaraṇe prajāpatikartṛkāṃ vicitrāṃ sṛṣṭimāmananti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3177: ātmaśabdo 'pi tasminprayujyamāno dṛśyate - ātmaivedamagra āsītpuruṣavidhiḥ' (bṛ. 1.4.1) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo3u:3180: apica tābhyo gāmānayattābhyo 'śvamānayattābhyoḥ puruṣamānayattā abruvannityevañjātīyako bhūyānvyāpāraviśeṣo laukikeṣu viśeṣavatsvātmasu prasiddha ihānugamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3182: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - 'para evātmehātmaśabdena gṛhyata itaravat /
GSP33brssgo3u:3183: yathetareṣu sṛṣṭiśravaṇeṣu tasmādvā etasmādātmana ākāśaḥ saṃbhūtaḥ' (tai. 2.1.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:3185: yathā cetarasmiṃllaukikātmaśabdaprayoge pratyagātmaiva mukhya ātmaśabdena gṛhyate tathehāpi bhavitumarhati yatra tu 'ātmaivedamagra āsīt' (bṛ.
GSP33brssgo3u:3187: ityevamādi viśeṣaṇāntaraṃ śrūyate bhavettatra viśeṣata ātmano grahaṇam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3188: atra punaḥ paramātmagrahaṇānuguṇameva viśeṣaṇamapyuttaramupalabhyate 'sa īkṣata lokānnu sṛjā iti' (ai. 1.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:3210: prajāpate reto devā iti pūrvasmātprajāpativākyādbhedaprasaṅgādātmā vā ityādivākyasya
GSP33brssgo3u:3217: ambho marīcīrmaramāpa iti sūtrayitvā svayameva śrutirvyācaṣṭe-pareṇa divaṃ divaḥ parastāddivi pratiṣṭhitaścandrāmbhasā vyāpto yo lokaḥ tadambhaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3229: kiñca prajāḥ sṛṣṭvā tāḥ prati bhogārthaṃ gāmānayallokasraṣṭā tathāśvamānayat /
GSP33brssgo3u:3230: tāstu gavāśvaprāptyā na tṛptāstataḥ puruṣaśarīre ānīte tā abruvaṃstṛptāḥ sma iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3231: ayaṃ ca vyavahāro lokasraṣṭuḥ prajāpatitve liṅgamityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3232: ātmaśabdasya cidātmani mukhyatvānmukhyagrahe bādhakābhāvāduttarasyekṣaṇāderanukūlatvātparamātmagrahaṇamiti siddhāntayati-evaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3236: anvayād iti cet syād avadhāraṇāt / BBs_3,3.17 /
GSP33brssgo3u:3248: śrutyantaraprasiddho hi samānaviṣayo viśeṣaḥ śrutyantareṣūpasaṃhartavyo bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3249: yo 'pyayaṃ vyāpāraviśeṣānugamastābhyo gāmānayadityevamādiḥ so 'pi vivakṣitārthāvadhāraṇānuguṇyenaiva grahītavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3250: nahyayaṃ sakalaḥ kathāprabandho vivakṣata iti śakyate vaktuma,
GSP33brssgo3u:3253: tathāhyamabhaḥprabhṛtīnāṃ lokānāṃ lokapālānāṃ cāgnyādīnāṃ sṛṣṭiṃ śiṣṭāvā karaṇāni
GSP33brssgo3u:3254: karaṇāyatanaṃ ca śarīramupadiśya sa eva sraṣṭā 'kathaṃ nvidaṃ madṛte syāt' (ai. 3.11
GSP33brssgo3u:3255: iti vīkṣyedaṃ śarīraṃ praviveśeti darśayati - 'sa etameva sīmānaṃ vidāryaitayā dvārā
GSP33brssgo3u:3259: iti vīkṣya 'sa etameva puruṣaṃ brahma tatamamapaśyat' (ai. 3.13)
GSP33brssgo3u:3262: ityādinā samastabhedajātaṃ saha mahābhūtairamukramya 'sarvaṃ tatprajñānetraṃ prajñāne pratiṣṭhitaṃ prajñānetro lokaḥ prajñā pratiṣṭhā prajñānaṃ brahma' (aita. 5.3)
GSP33brssgo3u:3266: vājasaneyake 'katama ātmeti yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu hṛdyantarjyotiḥ puruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 4.3.7)
GSP33brssgo3u:3268: tathāhyupasaṃharati - 'sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmājaro 'maro 'mṛto 'bhayo brahma' (bṛ. 4.4.25) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3272: tatra saṃśayaḥ - tulyārthatvaṃ kimanayorāmnānayoḥ syādatulyārthatvaṃ veti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3287: yaduktamupakramānvayādupakrame cātmaśabdaśravaṇābhāvānnātmagṛhītiriti tasya kaḥ parihāra iti cetso 'bhidhīyate syādavadhāraṇāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3293: anyathā hi yo 'yaṃ mikhya ātmā sa na vijñāta iti naiva sarvavijñānaṃ saṃpadyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:3294: tathā prāgutpatterekatvāvadhāraṇaṃ jīvasya cātmaśabdena parāmarśaḥ svāpāvasthāyāṃ ca tatsvabhāvasaṃpattikathanaṃ paricodanāpūrvakaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ 'tattvamasi' (chā. 6.8.7)
GSP33brssgo3u:3298: sāmānyopakramaśca na vākyaśeṣagatena viśeṣeṇa virudhyate viśeṣākāṅkṣitvātsāmānyasya /
GSP33brssgo3u:3299: sacchabdārtho 'pi ca paryālocyamāno na mukhyādātmano 'nyaḥ saṃbhavatyato 'nyasya vastujātasyārambhaṇaśabdādibhyo 'nṛtatvopapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3302: tasmādevañjātīyakeṣu vākyeṣu pratipādanaprakārabhede 'pi pratipādyārthābheda iti siddham // 17 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo3u:3310: etameva sīmānaṃ mūrdhnaḥ keśavibhāgāvasānaṃ vidārya chidraṃ kṛtvā etayā brahmarandhrākhyayā dvārā liṅgaviśiṣṭaḥ praviṣṭavānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3311: māṃ vinā yadi vāgādibhiḥ svasvavyāpāraḥ kṛtaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3312: atha tadāhaṃ ka iti tvaṃpadārthaṃ vicārya svayametadeva śodhitamātmānaṃ brahma tatamaṃ vyāptatamamapaśyat /
GSP33brssgo3u:3314: prajñā cidātmā netraṃ nīyate 'neneti niyāmakaṃ yasya tat prajñānetraṃ cidātmaniyamyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3321: padānāṃ jātau śaktigrahātsacchabdo 'pi sattājātivācītyupakramasya niścitārthatvādasaṃjātavirodhyupakramabalena tādātmyopadeśaḥ saṃpattiparatayā neya iti pūrvapakṣaniṣkarṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3322: pūrvatra vākyaikyādarthādiparatvaṃ tyaktvā vidyaikyamuktamiha tu sadātmaśabdābhyāṃ jātyātmavācibhyāmupakramabhedādvākyabhede sati vidyābheda iti pratyudāharaṇasaṃgatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3332: suptau jīvaḥ satā saṃpannau bhavatīti kathanaṃ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3333: bhūya eva mā bhagavān vijñāpayatviti paricodanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3336: tathā copakrame sattāśrayasāmānyoktau ka āśraya ityākāṅkṣāyāṃ vākyaśeṣādātmeti niścīyata ityāha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3337: sacchabdasyātmānātmasādhāraṇyamupetyoktaṃ tadapi nāsti ātmapadavatsatpadasya vyaktivācitvādvyaktiśca bādhāyogya cidātmaiveti na vācichandogayorūpakramavaiṣamyamityāha-sacchabdeti
GSP33brssgo3u:3339: vājivākye tvamarthasya tadarthaparyantasya lakṣyasya pratipādanaṃ chāndogyavākye
GSP33brssgo3u:3340: tu tadarthasya tvamarthaparyantasya pratipādanamiti prakārabhede 'pi vākyārthaikyādvidyaikyamiti
GSP33brssgo3u:3346: chandogā vājasaneyinaśca prāṇasaṃvāde śvādisaṃvāde śvādimaryādaṃ prāṇasyānnamāmnānya tasyaivāpo vāsa āmananti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3347: anantaraṃ ca chandogā āmananti -'tasmādvā etadaśiṣyantaḥ purastāccoṣṭāccādbhiḥ paridadhāti' (chā. 5.2.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3348: vājasaneyinastvāmananti - 'tadvidvāṃsaḥ śrotriyā aśiṣyanta ācāmantyaśitvācāmantyetameva tadanamanagnaṃ kurvanto manyante' (bṛ. 6.1.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:3350: tatra tvācamanamanagnatācintanaṃ ta prāṇasya pratīyate tkimubhayamapi vidhīyata utācamanamevotānagnatācintanameveti vicāryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3356: evaṃ prāpte brūmaḥ - nācamanasya vidheyatvamupapadyate kāryākhyānāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3361: sāmānyaviṣayā hi smṛtiḥ puruṣamātrasaṃbaddhaṃ prāyatyārthamācamanaṃ prāpayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3368: tasmātprāptamevāśisiṣatāmaśitavatāṃ cobhayata ācamanamanūdya 'etameva tadanamanagnaṃ kurvanto manyante' (bṛ. 6.1.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:3373: nacaivaṃ satyekasyācamanasyobhayārthatābhyupagatā bhavati prāyatyārthatā paridhānārthā cheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3374: kriyāntaratvābhyupagamāt kriyāntarameva hyācamanaṃ nāma prāyatyārthaṃ puruṣasyābhyupagamyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:3375: tadīyāsu tvapsu vāsaḥsaṃkalpanaṃ nāma kriyāntarameva paridhānārthaṃ prāṇasyābhyupagamyata ityanavadyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3376: apica 'yadidaṃ kiñcāśvasya ā kṛmibhya ā kīṭapataṅgebhyastatte 'nnam (bṛ. 6.1.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:3379: sarvaṃ tu prāṇasyānnamitīyamannadṛṣṭiścodyate tatsāhacaryāccāpo vāsa ityatrāpi nāpāmācamanaṃ codyate prasiddhāsvevatvācamanīyāsvapsu paridhānadṛṣciścodyata iti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3384: avaśyavidheye tvanyatarasminvāsaḥkāryākhyānādapāṃ vāsaḥsaṃkalpanamevāpūrvaṃ vidhīyate nācamanaṃ pūrvavaddhi tadityupapāditam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3385: yadapyuktaṃ vispaṣṭā cācamane vidhivibhaktiriti tadapi pūrvavattvenaivācamanasya pratyuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3386: ata evācamanasyāvidhitsitatvādetameva tadanamanagnaṃ kurvanto manyanta ityatraiva kāṇvāḥ paryavasyanti nāmananti tasmādevaṃvidityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3387: tasmānmādhyandinānāmapi pāṭha ācamanānuvādenaivaṃvittvameva prakṛtaprāṇavāsovittvaṃ vidhīyata iti pratipattavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3388: yo 'pyayamabhyupagamaḥ kvacidācamanaṃ vidhīyate kvacidvāsovijñānamiti so 'pi na sādhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3389: āpo vāsa ityādikāyā vākyapravṛtteḥ sarvatraikarūpyāt tasmādvāsovijñānameveha vidhīyate nācamanamiti nyāyyam // 18 //
GSP33brssgo3u:3391: 'me kimannaṃ kiṃ vāsaḥ'iti prāṇena pṛṣṭā vāgādayaḥ ūcuḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3392: 'yadidaṃ kiṃ cāśvabhya ā kṛmibhyastatte 'nnamāpo vāsaḥ'iti sarvaprāṇibhirbhujyamānaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3393: yadidaṃ prasiddhaṃ śvādiparyantamannaṃ tatprāṇasya tavānnamāpa ācchādanamityupāsakena
GSP33brssgo3u:3397: kiṃ tat, bhojanātpūrvamūrdhvaṃ cācāmantīti yattadadbhiḥ prāṇaṃ paridadhatyācchādayantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3399: tat tasmādityuktārthaṃ yataḥ pūrve vidvāṃso 'śanātprāgūrdhvaṃ cācāmanta etamevānāṃ prāṇaṃ tattenācamanenānagnamācchāditaṃ kurvanto manyante
GSP33brssgo3u:3402: saṃdigdhasadupakramasya vākyaśeṣānnirṇayavadācāmantīti padasya vidhitvasaṃdehe ācāmediti vākyaśeṣādvidhitvanirṇaya iti dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3405: siddhānte tasyāvidheyatvānnāṅgatvenopasaṃhāra iti vivekaḥ ubhayavidhāne vākyabhedaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3407: praśastaṃ hīdamācamanaṃ yasmādanena prāṇamanagnaṃ manyanta iti stutiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3410: smṛtyā śudyarthaṃ kāryatvena vihitasakalakarmāṅgatayā prāptācamanānuvādenāpūrvamanagnatādhyānameva vidhīyata iti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3411: smārtamācamanaṃ śrutyā nānūdyate kiṃ tvanayā śrutyā vihitaṃ samṛtyānūdyata iti śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3416: apsu prāṇavāsastvadhyānākhyaḥ saṃkalpaḥ prāṇavidyāṅgatvena vidhīyata ityāha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3418: śudyarthaṃ viniyuktasyācamanasya prāṇācchādanārthatvaṃ viruddhamityāśaṅkyāha-na caivaṃ satīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3420: kiñca yathā pūrvavākye prāṇasyānnadhyānamaṅgaṃ vihitaṃ tathātrāpsu vāsodhyānaṃ vidhīyate
GSP33brssgo3u:3422: bhakṣayediti śabdābhāvācchvādyannasya sarvasya manuṣveṇepāsakena bhoktumaśakyatvācca na pūrvavākye kriyāvidhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3424: anagnaṃ manyanta ityatra vāsastvadhyānamapi na vidheyaṃ doṣasāmyaditi śaṅkate-nanviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3425: ubhayorapyanuvādatve vaiphalyādavaśyamekānuvādenaikaṃ vidheyaṃ tacca vidheyaṃ vāsodhyānameva vāsaḥ kāryasyānagnatvasyākhyānādapūrvatvācceti samādhānārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3427: ācāmediti na vidhiḥ kintu viṣṇurūpāṃśu yaṣṭavya itivadanuvāda ityatra liṅgamāha-ata eveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3429: tarhi pāṭhabalānmādhyandine ācamanavidhiḥ kāṇve dhyānavidhiriti kasyacinmataṃ nirākaroti-yo 'pīti //18//
GSP33brssgo3u:3435: tatra ca guṇāḥ śrūyante - sa ātmānamupāsīta manamayaṃ prāṇaśarīraṃ bhārūpam ityevamādayaḥ.
GSP33brssgo3u:3436: tasyāmeva śāstrāyāṃ bṛhadāraṇyake punaḥ paṭhyate - 'manomayo 'yaṃ puruṣo bhāḥ satyasminnantarhadaye
GSP33brssgo3u:3437: yadā vrīhirvā yavo vā sa eṣa sarvasyeśānaḥ sarvasyādhipatiḥ sarvamidaṃ praśāsti yadidaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3439: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimiyamekā vidyāgnirahasyabṛhadāraṇyakayorguṇopasaṃhāraścota dve ime vidye guṇānupasaṃhāraśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3443: bhinnāsu hi śākhāsvadhyetṛbhedātpaunaruktasyaparihāramālocya vidyaikatvamadhyavasāyaikatrātiriktā guṇā itaratropasaṃhriyante prāṇasaṃvādādiṣvatyuktam
GSP33brssgo3u:3444: ekasyāṃ punaḥ śākhāyāmadhyetṛveditṛbhedābhāvādaśakyaparihāre paunaruktye na viprakṛṣṭadeśasthaikā vidyā bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3446: tadā hyatiriktā eva guṇā itaratretaratra cāmnāyeranna samānā api tūbhayatrāmnāyante manomayatvadayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3448: evaṃ prāpte brūmahe - yathā bhinnāsu śākhāsu vidyaikatvaṃ guṇopasaṃhāraśca bhavatyevamekasyāmapi śākhāyāṃ bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3456: ekaṃ hyāmnānaṃ vidyāvidyāvidhānārthamaparaṃ guṇavidhānārthamiti na kiñcinnopapadyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3457: nanvevaṃ sati yadupaṭhimagnirahasye tadeva bṛhadāraṇyake paṭhitavyam sa eṣa sarvasyeśānaḥ ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3458: yattu paṭhitameva manomaya ityādi cenna paṭhitavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3461: masānaguṇāmnānena hi viprakṛṣṭadeśāṃ śāṇḍilyavidyāṃ pratyabhijñāpya tasyāmīśānatvādyupadiśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3463: apicāprāptāṃśopadeśenārthavati vākye saṃjāte prāptāṃśaparāmarśasya nityānuvādatayāpyupapadyamānatvānna tadbalena pratyabhijñopodituṃ śakyate
GSP33brssgo3u:3471: iha tvekaśākhāyāṃ viprakṛṣṭadeśasthavākyayorekasya vidhitvamanyasyānuvādatvamityaniścayāddvayorapi vidyāvidhitvamiti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣayati-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3473: tadvidyāntaramiti na vyāptiḥ prāṇapañcāgnyādividyāsu vyabhicāradityāśaṅkya śākhābhede punaruktirasiddhetyuktamityāha-bhinnāsviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3475: 'dadhnā juhoti'iti vākye guṇavidhistathātrāpyastu na vidyāmeda ityāśaṅkyāha-nacātraikamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3477: uktaguṇoktirna vṛthā katipayaguṇaviśiṣṭopāsyābhedapratyabhijñānārthatvādata upāsyarūpābhedādbhinnaśākhāsviva samānaśākhāyāmapi vidyaikyamiti siddhāntasūtraṃ yojayati-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3479: yatra bahavo guṇāḥ śrutāstatra pradhānavidhiranyatra tadanuvādena guṇavidhiriti niścayādagnirahasye pradhānavidhivaduttaratra guṇavidhiriti bhāvaḥ //19//
GSP33brssgo3u:3485: ityukramya 'tadyattatsatyamasau sa ādityo ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣo yaścāyaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣanpuruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 55.2)
GSP33brssgo3u:3486: iti tasyaiva satyasya brahmaṇo 'dhidaivatamadhyātmaṃ cāyatanaviśeṣamupadiśya vyāhṛtiśarīratvaṃ ca saṃpādya dve upaniṣadāvupadiśyete /
GSP33brssgo3u:3489: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimavibhāgenaivobhe apyupaniṣadāvubhayatrānusaṃgātavye uta vibhāgenaikādhidaivamekādhyātmamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3491: yathā śāṇḍilyavidyāyāṃ vibhāgenāpyadhītāyāṃ guṇopasaṃhāra ukta evamanyatrāpyevañjātīyake viṣaye bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3502: taduktaṃ yatsatyaṃ tat sa yo 'sāvādityaḥ kiṃ maṇḍalaṃ na tatra sthāne puruṣaḥ karaṇātmakaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3503: sa evādhyātmamakṣisthānastha ityupadiśya 'tasya bhūriti śiro bhuva iti bāhuḥ svariti
GSP33brssgo3u:3504: pādau'iti vyāhṛtirūpaṃ śarīramuktvā dve upaniṣado rahasyadevatānāmanī upadiśyete
GSP33brssgo3u:3506: idaṃ nāmadvayaṃ viṣayastatra nāminaḥ satyākhyasya brahmaṇa ekatvātsthānabhedokteśca saṃśayamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3507: pūrvapakṣe pratisthānaṃ nāmadvayānuṣṭhānaṃ siddhānte yathāśrutyaikaikanāmānuṣṭhānamiti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3511: ādityaraśmīnāṃ cakṣuṣa cakṣuṣaścāditye pratiṣṭhānāditi vyatiṣaktapāṭho mithaḥ saṃśleṣapāṭhastābhyāṃ vidyaikyasiddhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3513: vidyaikye 'pi sthānabhedādupaniṣadorasaṃkaraḥ syādityāśaṅkāṃ dṛṣṭāntena pariharati-yo hīti //20//
GSP33brssgo3u:3522: kathaṃ sthānaviśeṣopanibandha ityucyate - 'ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 5.5.3)
GSP33brssgo3u:3523: iti hyādhidaivakaṃ puruṣaṃ prakṛtya tasyopaniṣadahariti śrāvayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3529: nanveka evāyamadhidaivatamadhyātmaṃ ca puruṣa ekasyaiva satyasya brahmaṇa āyatanadvayapratipādanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3532: asti cāyaṃ dṛṣṭāntaḥ satyapyācāryasvarūpāpānapāye yadācāryasyāsīnasyanuvartanamuktaṃ na tattiṣṭhato bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3534: grāmāraṇyayostvācāryasvarūpānāpāyāttatsvarūpānubuddhasya ca dharmasya grāmāraṇyakṛtaviśeṣābhāvādubhayatra tulyavadbhāva ityadṛṣṭāntaḥ saḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3537: tathā cākṣistho 'hariti nāmavān satyabrahmatvādādityasthavaditi prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃyojayati-naveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3539: tasyo 'paniṣadaharahamiti ca vākyadvayena tacchabdaparāmṛṣṭayoḥ saṃnihitasthānaviśiṣṭayoḥ puruṣayornāmasaṃbandhapareṇopasaṃhārānumānaṃ bādhyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3542: pratidṛṣṭāntasya svarūpasaṃbandhitvādviśiṣṭe dhyeye prakṛte dṛṣṭāntaṃ nāstītyāha-grāmeti //21//
GSP33brssgo3u:3546: api caivañjātīyakānāṃ dharmāṇāṃ vyavastheti liṅgadarśanaṃ bhavati - 'tasyaitasya tadeva rūpaṃ yāvamuṣya geṣṇau tau geṣṇau yannāma tannāma' (chā. 1.7.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3551: vidyaikyādevopasaṃhārasiddhāvatideśo vṛthā syāttasmādekavidyāyāmapi sthānabhedenoktaguṇānāṃ vinātideśamanupasaṃhāra iti siddham //22//
GSP33brssgo3u:3556: brahmajyeṣṭhā viryā saṃbhṛtāni brahmāgre jyeṣṭhaṃ divamātatāna ityevaṃ rāṇāyanīyānāṃ khileṣu vīryasaṃbhṛtidyuniveśaprabhṛtayo brahmaṇo vibhūtayaḥ paṭhyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:3558: tāsu brahmavidyāsu tā brahmavibhūtaya upasaṃhriyeranna veti vicāraṇāyāṃ brahmasaṃbandhādupasaṃhāraprāptāvevaṃ paṭhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3561: tathāhi śāṇḍilyavidyāyāṃ hṛdayāyatanatvaṃ brahmaṇa uktam - 'eṣa ma ātmāntarhṛdaye' (chā. 3.14.3) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3562: tadvadeva daharavidyāyāmapi 'daharaṃ puṇḍarīke veśma daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ' (chā. 8.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3563: upakosalavidyāyāṃ tvakṣyāyatanatvam 'ya eṣo 'kṣaṇi puruṣo dṛśyate' (chā. 4.15.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3564: evaṃ tatra tatrat tadādhyātmikamāyatanametāsu vidyāsu pratīyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3565: ādhidaivikyastvetā vibhūtayaḥ saṃbhṛtidyuvyāptiprabhṛtayastāsāṃ kuta etāsu prāptiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3567: 'eṣa u eva bhāmanīreṣa hi sarveṣu lokeṣu bhāti' (chā. 4.15.4)
GSP33brssgo3u:3568: 'yāvānvā ayamākāśastāvāneṣo 'ntarhṛdaya ākāśa ubhe asmindyāvāpṛthivī antareva samāhite' (chā. 8.1.3)
GSP33brssgo3u:3570: santi cānyā āyatanaviśeṣahīnā apīha brahmavidyāḥ ṣoḍaśakalādyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3573: samānaguṇāmnānena hi pratyupasthāpitāsu viprakṛṣṭadeśāsvapi vidyāsu viprakṛṣṭadeśā guṇā upasaṃhriyeranniti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3574: saṃbhṛtyādayastu śāṇḍilyādivākyagocarāśca manomayatvādayo guṇāḥ parasparavyāvṛttasvarūpatvānna pradeśāntaravartividyāpratyupasthāpanamityucyate vidyābhede 'pi tadupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3575: ekamapi hi brahma vibūtibhedairanekadhopāsyata iti sthitiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3581: brahmaiva jyeṣṭhaṃ kāraṇaṃ yeṣāṃ tāni brahmajyeṣṭhāni,
GSP33brssgo3u:3584: tāni ca vīryāṇi saṃbhṛtāni nirvighnaṃ samṛddhāni,
GSP33brssgo3u:3586: tacca jyeṣṭhaṃ brahmāgne devādyutpatteḥ prāgeva divaṃ svargamātatāna vyāptavatsadā sarvavyāpakamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3590: anārabhyādhītabrahmavibhūtīnāṃ brahmasaṃbandhena sarvabrahmavidyāsu pratyabhijñānādupasaṃhāra iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3592: saṃbhṛtiśca dyuvyāptiśca saṃbhṛtidyuvyāpti tadapi sarvatra nopasaṃhartavyamupaniṣadoriva vyavasthāpakaviśeṣayogāditi sūtrayojanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3593: ādhyātmikāyatanaviśeṣayuktāsu vidyāsvādhidaivikavibhūtīnāṃ pratyabhijñāne hetvabhāvānna prāptirityukte hetuṃ śaṅkate-nanvetāsviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3595: uktahetudvayaṃ na guṇaprāpakamādhidaivikavidyānāṃ śāṇḍilyadaharādīnāmāyatanahīnavidyāyāṃ ca mithoguṇasāṃkaryaprasaṅgāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:3598: mitho bhedena rūpabhedātsaṃbhṛtyādīnāṃ nopasaṃhāra ityuktanyāyātideśatvādasya na
GSP33brssgo3u:3600: tathaikasminnapi brahmaṇi vidyābhedopapatteḥ brahmapratyabhijñā na guṇaprāpiketyāha-parovarīyastvādivaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3606: asti tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ ca rahasyabrāhmaṇe puruṣavidyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3611: taittirīyakā api kañcitpuruṣayajñaṃ kalpayanavti - 'tasyaivaṃ viduṣo yajñasyātmā yajamānaḥ śraddhā patnī' (nārā. 80)
GSP33brssgo3u:3613: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ ya itaratroktāḥ puruṣayajñasya dharmāste taittirīyakeṣūpasaṃhartavyāḥ kiṃvā nopasaṃhartavyā iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3618: yathaikeṣāṃ śākhināṃ tāṇḍināṃ paiṅgināṃ ca puruṣavidyāyāmāmnānaṃ naivamitareṣāṃ taittirīyāṇāmāmnānamasti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3620: yadapi savanasaṃpādanaṃ tadapītaravilakṣaṇameva 'yatprātarmadhyandinaṃsāyaṃ ca tāni' (nārā. 80) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3621: yadapi kiñcinmaraṇāvabhṛthatvādisāmyaṃ tadapyalpīyastavādbhūyasā vailakṣaṇyenābhibhūyamānaṃ na pratyabhijñāpanakṣamam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3623: viduṣo yajñasyeti hi nacaite samānādhikaraṇe ṣaṣṭhyau vidvāneva yoyajñastasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3625: vyadhikaraṇe tvete ṣaṣṭhyau viduṣo yo yajñastasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3627: satyāṃ ca gatau mukhya evārtha āśrayitavyo na bhāktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3628: ātmā yajamāna iti ca yajamānatvaṃ puruṣasya nirbruvanvaiyadhikaraṇyenaivāsya yajñasaṃbandhaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3629: apica tasyaivaṃviduṣaiti siddhavadanuvādaśrutau satyāṃ puruṣasya yajñabhāvamātmādīnāṃ ca yajamānādibhāvaṃ pratipitsamānasya vākyabhedaḥ syāt
GSP33brssgo3u:3630: apica saṃsanyāsāmātmavidyāṃ purastādupadiśyānantaraṃ tasyaivaṃviduṣa ityādyanukramaṇaṃ phasyantaḥ pūrvaśeṣa evaiṣa āmnāyo na svatantra iti pratīmaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3633: āyurabhivṛddhiphalo hyasau 'sa ha --ṣoḍaśaṃ varṣaśataṃ jīvati ya evaṃ veda' (chā. 3.16.7)
GSP33brssgo3u:3637: 'puruṣo vāva yajñastasya yāni caturviśati varṣāṇi tatprātaḥ savanamatha yāni catuścatvāriṃśadvarṣāṇi
GSP33brssgo3u:3638: tanmādhyandinaṃ savanamatha yānyaṣṭācatvāriṃśadvarṣāṇi tattṛtīyaṃ savanam'iti prasiddhayajñasāmyārthaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3640: 'sa yadaśiśiṣati yatpipāsati yanna ramate tā dīkṣā atha yadaśnāti yatpibati yadramate
GSP33brssgo3u:3641: tā upasadaḥ atha yaddhasati yajjakṣati yanmaithunaṃ carati tāni stutaśastrāṇi atha
GSP33brssgo3u:3642: yattapodānādi sā dakṣiṇā maraṇamevāvabhṛthaḥ vasvādirūpā me prāṇā idaṃ savanatrayaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3649: iha tvasādhāraṇamaraṇāvabhṛthaguṇaviśiṣṭapuruṣayajñarūpaikyapratyabhidhānādvi dyaikyamiti pratyudāharaṇena prāpte siddhāntayati-nopasaṃhartavyā iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3650: tasyaivaṃ viduṣo yajñasyātmā yajamānaḥ śraddhā patnī śarīramidhmamuro vedirlomāni
GSP33brssgo3u:3651: barhirvedaḥ śikhā hṛdayaṃ yūpaḥ kāma ājyaṃ manyuḥ paśustapo 'gnirdamaḥ śamayitā dakṣiṇā
GSP33brssgo3u:3652: vāgghotā prāṇa udgātā cakṣuradhvaryurmano brahmā'iti bahutaradharmavailakṣaṇyānna
GSP33brssgo3u:3657: yanmaraṇaṃ tadavabhṛtho yadramate tadupasada iti tittiriśrutau sārūpyamapi bhātītyata āha-yadapi kiñciditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3659: kiñca chāndogye puruṣayajñayoraikyaṃ śrutamatra tu bheda iti vairūpyāntaramāha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3664: pratīyate tasyāṃ satyāṃ viśeṣyasyāṅāgānāṃ ca pṛthagvidhivādinastava vākyabhedadoṣaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3665: kiñca satyādibhyo nyāsa evāpare ca yaditi saṃnyāsamuktvā sarvaiḥ sarvamidaṃ jagadityevaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3666: tamātmānaṃ jñātvā bhūyo na mṛtyumupayāti vidvāniti saṃnyāsasādhyātmavidyāṃ purastātprājāpatyānuvāke
GSP33brssgo3u:3675: astyātharvaṇikānāmupaniṣadārambhe mantrasamāmnāyaḥ - 'sarvaṃ pravidhya hṛdayaṃ pravidhya dhamanīḥ pravṛjya śiro 'bhipravṛjyatridhā vipṛktaḥ' ityādiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3678: kaṭhānāṃ taittirīyāṇāṃ - 'śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ' (tai. 1.1.1) ityādiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3679: vājasaneyināṃ tūpaniṣadārambhe pravargyabrāhmaṇaṃ paṭhyate - 'devā ha vai niṣeduḥ' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3680: kauṣītakināmapyagniṣṭomabrāhmaṇam - 'brahma vā agniṣṭomo brahmaiva tadaharbrahmaṇaiva te brahmopayanti te 'mṛtatvamāpnuvanti ya etadaharupayanti' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3681: kimime sarve pravidhyamādayo mantrāḥ pravargyādīni ca karmāṇi vidyāsūpasaṃhriyerankiṃvā nopasaṃhriyeranniti mīmāṃsāmahe /
GSP33brssgo3u:3682: kiṃ tāvannaḥ pratibhāti upasaṃhāra evaiṣāṃ vidyāsviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3689: nanu naiṣāṃ mantrāṇāṃ vidyāviṣayaṃ kiñcitsāmarthyaṃ paśyāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3690: kathaṃ ca pravargyādīni karmāṇyanyārthatvenaiva viniyuktāni santi vidyārthatvenāpi pratipadyemahīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3692: sāmarthyaṃ tāvanmantrāṇāṃ vidyāviṣayamapi kiñcicchakyaṃ kalpayituṃ hṛdayādisaṃkīrtanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3693: hṛdayādīni hi prayeṇopāsaneṣvāyatanādibhāvenopadiṣṭāni taddvāreṇa ca hṛdayaṃ pravidhyetyevañjātīyakānāṃ mantrāṇāmupapannamupāsanāṅgatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3696: tathā pravargyādīnāṃ karmaṇāmanyatrāpi viniyuktānāṃ satāmaviruddho vidyāsu viniyogo vājapeya iva bṛhaspatisavasyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3701: hṛdayaṃ pravidhyetyevañjātīyakānāṃ hi mantrāṇāṃ yer'thā hṛdayavedhādayo bhinnā anabhisaṃbaddhāsta upaniṣaduditābhirvidyābhiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3705: hṛdayamātrasaṃkīrtanasya hyevamupayogaḥ kathañcidutprekṣyeta naca hṛdayamātramatra mantrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3706: hṛdayaṃ pravidhya dhamanīḥ pravṛjyetyevañjātīyako hi na sakalo mantrārthe vidyābhirabhisaṃbadhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3707: ābhicārikaviṣayo hyeṣor'thastasmādābhicārikeṇa karmaṇā sarvaṃ pravidhyetyetasya mantrasyābhisaṃbandhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3709: evamanyeṣāmapi mantrāṇāṃ keṣācilliṅgena keṣāñcidvacanena keṣāñcitpramāṇāntareṇātyevamarthāntareṣu viniyuktānāṃ rahasyapaṭhitānāmapi satāṃ na saṃnidhimātreṇa vidyāśeṣatvopapattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3710: durbalo hi saṃnidhiḥ śrutyādibhya ityuktaṃ prathame tantre 'śrutiliṅgavākyaprakaraṇasthānasamākhyānāṃ samavāye pāradaurbalyamarthaviprakarṣāt' (jai. sū. 3.3.13) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo3u:3713: vājapeye tu bṛhaspatisavasya spaṣṭaṃ viniyogāntaram - 'vājapeyeneṣṭvā bṛhaspatisavena yajeta' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3714: api caiko 'yaṃ pravargyaḥ sakṛdutpanno balīyasā pramāṇenānyatra viniyukto na durbalena pramāṇenānyatrāpi viniyogamarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3715: agṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatve hi pramāṇayoretadevaṃ syānnatu balavadabalavatoḥ pramāṇayoragṛhyamāṇaviśeṣatā saṃbhavati balavadabalavattvaviśeṣādeva /
GSP33brssgo3u:3716: tasmādevañjātīyakānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ vā na saṃnidhipāṭhamātreṇa vidyāśeṣatvamāśaṅkitavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3720: he devate, madripoḥ sarvamaṅgaṃ pravidhya vidāraya viśeṣataśca hṛdayaṃ bhindhi dhamanīḥ śirāḥ pravṛñjaya troṭaya śiraścābhito nāśaya,
GSP33brssgo3u:3721: evaṃ tridhā vipṛkto viśliṣṭo bhavatu me śatrurityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3724: uccaiḥ śravāḥ śveto 'śvo yasyendrasya sa tvaṃ haritamaṇivannīlo 'sītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3726: agniṣṭomo brahmaiva sa yasminnahani kriyate tadapi brahma tasmādya etadahaḥ sādhyaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3727: karmopayantyanutiṣṭhinti te brahmaṇaiva sādhanena brahmopayanti te ca krameṇāmṛtatvamāpnuvantīti yojanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3730: nanu teṣāṃ śeṣatve mānābhāvānnopasaṃhāra iti śaṅkate-nanveṣāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3734: aphalamantrādīnāṃ phalavaccheṣatvabodhanaṃ saṃnidherarthavattvaṃ tatsaṃbhave satyakasmādarthaśūnyatvenāsau saṃnidhirāśrayituṃ nahi yukta ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3735: nañpāṭhetvakasmāddhetuṃ vināsāvartho nāśrayituṃ nahi yukta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3737: purastādupasadāṃ pravargyeṇa pracarantīti vākyena pravargyasya kratuśeṣatvaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3738: agniṣṭomādeśca tattadvākyena svargādyarthatvamato na vidyārthatvamityāha-kathaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3740: upāstiṣu mantraprayogaḥ kvāpi na dṛṣṭa ityata āha-dṛṣṭaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3741: putrasya dīrghāyuṣyārthaṃ chāndogye trailokyasya keśātvenopāstiruktā tatra piturayaṃ prārthanāmantraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3742: tatrāmuneti putrasya trirṇāma gṛhṇāti amunā putreṇa saha bhūritīmaṃ lokamamuṃ ca prapadye na me putraviyogaḥ syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3743: tattadvākyenānyatra viniyuktānāmapi karmaṇāṃ saṃnidhinā vidyāsu viniyogo na virudhyata ityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-vājapeya iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3749: vidhīyata iti na viniyuktasya viniyoga iti bhaṭṭagurutantradvayasiddhaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3750: yathāpi yathā nityāgnihotrasyāśvamedhaprakaraṇe vāgyatasyaitāṃ rātrimagnihotraṃ juhotīti nāmnā pratyabhijñā,
GSP33brssgo3u:3752: padena pratyabhijñānaṃ vākyena vidhānaṃ tathātrāpi bṛhaspatisavapadena pratyabhijñānaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3754: naca sādhyabhāvārthavidhāyakākhyātaparatantraṃ nāmapadaṃ na siddhakarmapratyabhijñākṣamamiti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3756: nacaivaṃ sati kuṇḍapāyisatre 'pyaṅgatvena nityāgnihotrasyaiva vidhiḥ syāditi vācyaṃ, iṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3759: tasmādekasyaiva bṛhaspatināmakasya dhātvarthasya brahmavarcase viniyuktasyāpi vājapeyāṅgatayā viniyoga iti bhagavatpādatātparyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3760: astica viniyuktasya viniyoge sarvasaṃmatamudāharaṇaṃ khādiratvādikaṃ tasya kratau viniyuktasya vīryādiphale 'pi viniyogāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3761: tathā mantrakarmaṇāmanyatra viniyuktānāṃ vidyāśeṣatvamiti prāpte siddhāntayati-naiṣāmityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3762: vidyāsu hṛdayādisaṃbandhe 'pi vedhādyarthānāmasaṃbandhātkṛtsnamantrārthānāmabhicārādisaṃbandhaliṅgena saṃnidherbalīyasābhicārādāveva mantrāṇāṃ viniyoga ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3764: juhoti karmaṇaḥ purastātsavane savane juhoti'iti vākyādvājapeye karmaviśeṣe saṃbandho
GSP33brssgo3u:3768: nanu liṅgādibharanyatra viniyuktānāmapi saṃnidhinā vidyāsvapi viniyogo 'stvavirodhādityuktaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3774: ayamāśayaḥ-ekatra viniyuktasya nirākāṅkṣatvādanyatra viniyogo viruddha eva parantu
GSP33brssgo3u:3776: viniyuktaviniyogaḥ svīkriyate 'yathā khādiro yūpo bhavati''khādiraṃ vīryakāmasya
GSP33brssgo3u:3777: yūpaṃ kuryāt'iti vākyābhyāṃ kratau viniyuktasya khādiratvasya vīryaphale viniyogaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3778: yatra tu pramāṇayoratulyatvaṃ tatra na svīkriyate prabalapramāṇena durbalaviniyogabādhāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3779: yathā 'kadācana starīrasi'ityasyā ṛca aindryā gārhapatyamupatiṣṭhata iti tṛtīyāvibhaktiśrutyānyanirapekṣatayā
GSP33brssgo3u:3781: liṅgaṃ hi na sākṣāccheṣatvaṃ bodhayati kintvindraprakāśanamātraṃ karoti,
GSP33brssgo3u:3782: tena ca liṅgenānena mantreṇa indra upasthāpayitavya iti śrutiḥ kalpanīyā,
GSP33brssgo3u:3783: tayā śeṣatvabodha iti śrutivyavadhānena śeṣatvabodhakaṃ liṅgaṃ jhaṭiti svārthabodhakaśrutyā bādhyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3784: tathā liṅgena vākyaṃ bādhyaṃ yathā 'syo 'naṃ te sadanaṃ karomi ghṛtasya dhārayā kalpayāmi',
GSP33brssgo3u:3785: 'tasminsīdāmṛte pratitiṣṭha vrīhīṇāṃ medha sumanasyamānaḥ'iti mantrābhāgayoḥ pratyekaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3786: sadanakaraṇe puroḍāśāsādane ca tatprakāśanasāmarthyaliṅgena śrutidvārā viniyoge sati
GSP33brssgo3u:3789: ca liṅgaṃ kalpayitvā śrutikalpanayobhayatra kṛtsnamantraviniyogabodhane dvābhyāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3792: asamarthasya viniyogāyogāt ata eva gaṅgāpadasya tīrabodhaviniyoge lakṣaṇārūpaṃ sāmarthyaṃ kalpyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3793: tathā vākyena prakaraṇaṃ bādhyaṃ yathā sāhnaprakaraṇāmnātadvādaśopasadāṃ dvādaśāhīnasyeti vākyenāhīnāṅgatva bodhakena prakaraṇaprāptasāhnāṅgatvabādhādutkarṣaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3799: saṃnidheḥ prakaraṇādikalpakatvena kḷptaprakaraṇāddurbalatvāt tathā saṃnidhinā samākhyā bādhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3800: tathāhi-pauroḍāśikasamākhyāke kāṇḍe āgneyapuroḍāśādikarmaṇāṃ krameṇa mantrā āmnātāstatra
GSP33brssgo3u:3802: samākhyābalenāsya mantrasya puroḍāśapātraśundhanaśeṣatvaṃ prāptaṃ saṃnidhinā bādhitvā
GSP33brssgo3u:3806: evaṃ virodhe sati śrutirbādhikaiva samākhyā bādhyaiva,
GSP33brssgo3u:3807: madhyasthānāṃ tu caturṇāṃ pūrvabādhyatvaṃ parabādhakatvaṃ ceti śrutiliṅgasūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3808: tasmālliṅgādinānyatra viniyuktānāṃ mantrāṇāṃ durbalasaṃnidhinā na vidyāsu viniyoga iti siddham /
GSP33brssgo3u:3810: karmaṇāṃ vidyopakāratve tābhiḥ sahaikaphalatve ca mānaṃ kiñcinnāstītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3812: nanu tarhi vedhādivākyānāmupaniṣadbhiḥ saha pāṭhasya kā gatistāmāha-araṇyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3817: hānau tūpāyanaśabdaśeṣatvāt kuśāc chandaḥstutyupagānavat tad uktam / BBs_3,3.26 /
GSP33brssgo3u:3818: asti tāṇḍānāṃ śrutiḥ - 'aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpaṃ candra iva rāhormukhātpramucya dhūtvā śarīramakṛtaṃ kṛtātmā brahmalokamabhisaṃbhavāmi' (chā. 8.13.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3819: tathātharṇikānāma 'tathā vidvānnāmarūpādvimuktaḥ parātparaṃ puruṣamupaiti divyam' (muṇḍa. 3.2.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3820: tathā śāṭyāyaninaḥ paṭhanti 'tasya putrā dāyamupayanti sihṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ dviṣantaḥ pāpakṛtyām' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3821: tathaiva kauṣītakinaḥ 'tatsukṛtaduṣkṛte vidhūnute tasya priyā jñātayaḥ sukṛtamupantyapriyā duṣkṛtam' (kau. 1.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3822: tadiha kvacitsukṛtaduṣkṛtayorhānaṃ śrūyate kvacittayoreva vibhāgena priyairapriyaiścopāyanaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3823: kvacittūbhayamapi hānamupāyanaṃ ca tadyatrobhayaṃ śrūyate tatra tāvanna kiñcidvaktavyamasti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3824: yatrāpyupāyanameva śrūyate na hānaṃ tatrāpyarthādeva hānaṃ saṃnipatati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3826: yatra tu hānameva śrūyate nopāyanaṃ tatropāyanaṃ sanipatedvā na veti vicikitsāyāmaśravaṇādasaṃnipātaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3828: apicātmakartṛkaṃ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayorhānaṃ parakartṛkaṃ tūpāyanaṃ tayorasatyāvaśyakabhāve kathaṃ hānenopāyamākṣipyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:3839: itthaṃ mahābhāgā vidyā yatsāmarthyādasya viduṣaḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛte saṃsārakāraṇabhūte vidhūyate te cāsya suhṛdviṣatsu niviśete itai /
GSP33brssgo3u:3840: stutyarthe cāsminsaṃkīrtane hānānantarabhāvitvenopāyasya kvacicchrutatvādanyatrāpi hānaśrutāvupāyanānuvṛttiṃ manyate stutiprakarṣalābhāya /
GSP33brssgo3u:3843: kathaṃ hīhaikaviṃśatādityasyābhidhīyatānapekṣyamāṇer'thavādāntare dvādaśa māsāḥpañcartavastraya ime lokā asāvāditya ekaviṃśaḥ ityetasmin /
GSP33brssgo3u:3844: tathā triṣṭubhau bhavataḥ sendriyatvāya ityevamādiṣu indriyaṃ vai triṣṭup ityevamādyarthavādāntarāpekṣā dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3845: vidyāstutyarthatvāccāsyopāyanavādasya kathamanyadīye sukṛtaduṣkṛte anyairupeyete iti nātīvābhiniveṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3846: upāyanaśabdaśeṣatvāditi tu śabdaśabdaṃ samuccārayanstutyarthameva hānāvupāyanānuvṛttiṃ sūcayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3850: tadyathā bhāllavinām - 'kuśā vānaspatyāḥ stha tā mā pāta' ityetasminnigame kuśānāmaviśeṣeṇa
GSP33brssgo3u:3851: vanaspatiyonitvena śravaṇe śāṭyāyanināmaudumbarāḥ kuśā iti viśeṣavacanādaudumbaryaḥ kuśā āśrīyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:3852: yathāca kvaciddevāsuracchandasāmaviśeṣeṇa paurvāparyaprasaṅge 'devacchandāṃsi pūrvāṇi' iti paiṅgyāmnānātpratīyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:3853: yathāca ṣoḍaśustotre keṣāñcitkālāviśeṣaprāptau 'samayādhyuṣite sūrye' ityārcaśruteḥ kālaviśeṣapratipattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3855: yathaiteṣu kuśādiṣu śrutyantaragataviśeṣairanvaya evaṃ hānāvapyupāyanānvaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3856: śrutyantarakṛtaṃ hi viśeṣaṃ śrutyantare 'nabhyupagacchataḥ sarvatraiva vikalpaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3858: taduktaṃ dvādaśalakṣaṇāyām - 'api tu vākyaśeṣatvāditaraparyudāsaḥ syātpratiṣedhe vikalpaḥ syāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3862: na hānaṃ vidhūnanamabhidhīyate 'dhañ kampane' iti smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3863: dodhūyante dhvajāgrāṇīti ca vāyunā cālyamāneṣu dhvajāgreṣu prayogadarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3865: cālanaṃ tu suṣkṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ kañcitkālaṃ phalapratibandhanādityevaṃ prāpayya prativaktavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3869: yadyapīdaṃ parakīyayoḥ sukṛtaduṣkṛtayoḥ parairupāyanaṃ nāñjasaṃ saṃbhāvyate tathāpi tatsarntanāttāvattadānuguṇyena hānameva vidhūnanaṃ nāmeti nirṇetuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3870: kvacidapi cedaṃ vidhūnanasaṃnidhāvupāyanaṃ śrūyamāṇaṃ kuśāchandastutyupagānavadvidhanūnaśrutyā sarvatrāpekṣāmāṇaṃ sārvatrikaṃ nirṇayakāraṇaṃ saṃpadyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:3873: aśvaśca romāṇi vidhūnvānastyajanrajaḥ sahaiva tena romāṇyapi jīrṇāni śātayati 'aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpam' (chā. 8.13.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:3878: yathāśvo rajoyuktāni jīrṇaromāṇi tyaktvā nirmalo bhavati tathāhamapi pāpaṃ vidhūya
GSP33brssgo3u:3879: kṛtātmā nirmalīkṛtacittaḥ san yathā vā rāhugrastaścandro rāhumukhātpramucya spaṣṭo
GSP33brssgo3u:3880: bhavati tathā śarīraṃ dhūtvā tyaktvā dehābhimānānmuktaḥ sannakṛtaṃ kūṭasthaṃ brahmātmakaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3882: yathā nadyaḥ samudraṃ prāpya nāmarūpe tyajanti tathā vidvānityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3888: yatra tu tyāga eva śrutaḥ tatra hānopāyanayoḥ sahabhāvasyāvaśyakatvānāvaśyakatvābhyāṃ saṃśayamāha-yatra tviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3889: atra pūrvapakṣe stutiprakarṣāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tatsiddhiriti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3890: yadyapi tāṇḍyātharvaṇaśrutyornirguṇavidyārthayoḥ karmahānameva śrutaṃ nopāyanaṃ tathāpi
GSP33brssgo3u:3897: aśvaromadṛṣṭāntena vidhūtayoḥ puṇyapāpayoḥ paratrāvasthānasāpekṣatvātparairūpādānaṃ vācyamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3898: vidyābhede guṇānupasaṃhāra iti vyavasthānuṣṭhānaviṣayā na stutiviṣayetyāha-yaducyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3902: nanvarthavādasya vidhinā saṃbandhaḥ prasiddho nārthavādāntareṇetyata āha-prasiddhā ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3905: yajñasya puruṣarūpakalpanāyāṃ sendriyatvāya triṣṭubhau bhavata ityuktaṃ bahvṛcabrāhmaṇe,
GSP33brssgo3u:3908: vidvanniṣṭhayoreva tayoḥ phalaṃ pare prāpnuvanti vidyāsāmarthyādityupayantipadenocyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3912: naca yathā putrakṛtaśrāddhasya pitṛṣu phalaṃ tathātreti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3913: yasya phalamuddiśya yatkarma vihitaṃ tasya tatphalamiti nyāyena pitṛṇāṃ tṛptyuddeśena kṛtakarmaṇo vyadhikaraṇaphalatve 'pi viduṣaḥ karmakāle 'nuddiṣṭavyadhikaraṇaphalāyogāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:3914: kiñca viduṣo dehapāte karmaṇo 'sattvādyāvajjīvaṃ vidvatsevakasya taddveṣiṇo vā phalaṃ syādityata āha-nātīvābhiniveṣṭavyamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3915: vidvatsevādveṣābhyāṃ vidvanniṣṭhapuṇyapāpatulye puṇyapāpe sevakadveṣiṇorjāyete jātayoḥ phalataḥ svīkāra upāyanamiti parihārasya sulabhatvādanāgraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3917: upāyanavivakṣāyāmupāyanasyaivopasaṃhāraṃ sūtrakāro brūyādataḥ śabdasya taṃ brūvanstutiṃ sūcayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3918: vidyāvicārātmake pāde stutivicārasya kā saṃgatirityata āha-tasmāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3919: śākhāntarastho viśeṣaḥ śākhāntare 'pi grāhya ityatra dṛṣṭāntamāha-kuśeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3922: yūyaṃ vānaspatyāḥ vanasthamahāvṛkṣo vanaspatiḥ tatprabhavāḥ stha tā itthaṃbhūtā yūyaṃ mā pāta māṃ rakṣateti yajamānaprārthanā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3923: atra tā iti strīliṅganirdeśādaudumbarya iti bhāṣyācca śalākāsu kuśaśabdasya strītvaṃ mantavyaṃ darbhaviṣayasya na strītvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3926: navākṣarāṇi chandāṃsi āsurāṇyanyāni daivāni teṣāṃ kvacchindobhiḥ stuvata ityatrāviśeṣaprāptau paiṅgivākyādviśeṣagraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3928: ātirātre ṣoḍaśino grahasyāṅgabhūtaṃ stotraṃ kadeti chandogādīnāmākāṅkṣāyāmudayasamayāviṣṭe sūrye ṣoḍaśinaḥ stotramityārcaśruteḥ kālaviśeṣagraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3931: 'ṛtvija upagāyanti'ityaviśeṣaśruteḥ 'nādhvaryurūpagāyati'iti śrutyantarādadhvaryubhinnā ṛtvija upagāyantīti viśeṣagraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3934: sāmānyaviśeṣayorekavākyatārūpāyāṃ gatau satyāṃ vākyabhedaṃ kṛtvā nādhvaryuriti niṣedhādaviśeṣaśruteścādhvaryurupagāyati nopagāyati cetyevaṃ sarvatra vikalpo na yuktaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3941: evaṃ vrīhivākyepi catvāro doṣā ityevaṃ duṣṭavikalpaparihārāya bhinnaśākhaśrutyorapyekavākyatā jaiminisaṃmatetyāha-taduktamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3943: iti śrutaṃ 'yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhuyāt'iti cānyatra śrutaṃ tatra yadi nadīkṣitavākyaṃ homapratiṣedhakaṃ syāttadā kratvarthatvānniṣedho 'nuṣṭheyaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3944: yāvajjīvavidhinā homo vānuṣṭheya iti vikalpaḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:3946: api tu yāvajjīvavākyaṃ prati nadīkṣitavākyasya śeṣatvānnakāra itaraparyudāsārthakaḥ syāddīkṣitānyalakṣakaḥ syāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:3950: miśraistu paryudāsādhikaraṇasiddhāntasūtraṃ 'api tu vākyaśeṣaḥ syādanyāyyatvādvikalpasya vidhīnāmekadeśaḥ syāt'iti sthitamatrārthataḥ paṭhitamityuktaṃ taccintyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3951: sūtrārthastu yajñamātre yeyajāmahe iti prayoktavyamiti śrutaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3953: tatra nakārasya niṣedhakatve 'pyatirātre ṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇayorivānuyājeṣu yajñatvāviśeṣātprayoktavyaṃ niṣedhānna prayoktavyamiti vikalpaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:3956: tathā cānuyājabhinneṣu yāgeṣu yeyajāmaha iti prayoktavyamityekavākyateti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3961: vidhūnanasya hi phaladvayamaśvaromādiṣu dṛṣṭaṃ pūrvasvabhāvāt cyutiranyatra saṃkrāntiśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3963: tatra vidhūnanaśabdasya kampanaṃ mukhyārtha iti tāvatsarvasaṃmatam /
GSP33brssgo3u:3965: atastayoryaḥ svabhāvaḥ phaladātṛtvaśaktistataścālanaṃ vidyayā pratibandhāccyutiḥ sā lakṣaṇīyā na hāniramūrtayoranyatra saṃkrāntyayogādanyasāpekṣatvācceti pūrvapakṣārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3968: naca yatra dhunoterūpāyanaśabdasāṃnidhyaṃ tatra hānirlakṣyate na kevaladhunoterhāniścānyatra viduṣaḥ sevakādau tulyakarmasaṃkrāntiriti nāsaṃbhava iti vācyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:3969: kevaladhunoterapi mukhyārthāsaṃbhavenānyatra lakṣyatayā buddhisthahānilakṣaṇāyā eva yuktatvāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3970: upāyanasyāmukhyatvānna kvāpi hānilakṣaṇābījatvamiti śaṅkitvā puṇyapāpayoḥ phalataḥ svīkārātmakamupāyanaṃ hāniṃ vinānupapannaṃ sallakṣaṇānirṇāyakamiti pariharati-yadyapītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:3971: yathānyatraśrutamaudumbaratvādikaṃ kuśādinirṇāyakaṃ tathedamupāyanaṃ vidhūnanasya hānatve niścāyakamityāha-kvacidapīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3974: tathāpi hānaṃ kathaṃ lakṣyata ityāśaṅkya mukhyasaṃbandhādityāha-aśvaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3975: anupapattisaṃbandhau lakṣaṇābījarūpāmuktvā lakṣakaṃ padaṃ nirdiśati-aśva iveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3976: vidhūyeti padaṃ dṛṣṭānte hānaparyantaṃ saddārṣṭāntike 'pi hānalakṣakamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3977: yadvā hānavācakamevāstu naca dhūñ kampana iti dhātupāṭhavirodhastasyopalakṣaṇārthatvādityāha-aneketi /
GSP33brssgo3u:3978: śākhāntarasthamupāyanaṃ vidhūnanasya hānatvaniścāyakamityatra jaiminisūtraṃ taduktamiti gṛhītapūrvaṃ vyākhyātamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:3979: evaṃ vidhṛnanasya hānitvisiddheḥ kevalahānāvupāyanopasaṃhāra iti siddham //26//
GSP33brssgo3u:3983: sāṃparāye tartavyābhāvāt tathā hy anye / BBs_3,3.27 /
GSP33brssgo3u:3984: devayānena pathā paryaṅ kasthaṃ brahmābhiprastitasya vyadhvani sukṛtaduṣkṛtayorvibhāgaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:3985: kauṣītakinaḥ paryaṅ kavidyāyāmamananti 'sa etaṃ devayānaṃ pantānamāsādyāgnilokamāgacchati' (kau. 1.3)
GSP33brssgo3u:3986: ityupakramya 'sa āgacchati virajāṃ nadīṃ tāṃ manasaivātyeti tatsukṛtaduṣkṛte vidhūnute' (kau. 1.4) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:3987: tatkiṃ yathāśrutaṃ vyadhvanyeva viyogavacanaṃ pratipattavyamāhosvidādāveva dehādapasarpaṇa iti vicāraṇāyāṃ śrutiprāmāṇyādyathāśruti pratipattiprasaktau paṭhati - sāṃparāya itai /
GSP33brssgo3u:3988: sāṃparāye gamana eva dehādapasarpaṇa idaṃ vidyāsāmarthyātsukṛtaduṣkṛtahānaṃ bhavatīti pratijānīte /
GSP33brssgo3u:3990: nahi viduṣaḥ saṃparetasya vidyayā brahma saṃprepsato 'ntarāle sukṛtaduṣkṛtābhyāṃ kiñcitprāptavyamasti yadarthaṃ katicitkṣaṇānakṣīṇe te kalpeyātām
GSP33brssgo3u:3991: vidyāviruddhaphalatvāttu vidyāsāmarthyena tayoḥ kṣayaḥ sa ca yadaiva vidyā phalābhimukhī tadaiva bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:3993: tathā hyanye 'pi śikhinastāṇḍinaḥ śāṭyāyaninaśca prāgavasthāyāmeva sukṛtaduṣkṛtahānamāmananti 'aśva iva romāṇi vidhūya pāpam' (chā. 8.13.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:3994: iti, 'tasya putrā dāyamupayanti suhṛdaḥ sādhukṛtyāṃ dviṣantaḥ pāpakṛtyām' iti ca // 27 //
GSP33brssgo3u:3997: pūrvoktaṃ vidhūnanasya hānatvamupajīvya hānasya nadītaraṇānantaryaśruteraśvaiva romāṇi ityādau dehatyāgātprākkālatvaśruteśca saṃśayamāha-tatkimiti
GSP33brssgo3u:3999: ityatra taditisarvanāmaśrutyāstenetyarthatayā saṃnihitanadītaraṇasya karmahānihetutvokterardhapathe karmakṣaya iti pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4003: saṃparetasya mṛtasya kañcitkālaṃ karmasattve phalābhāvāddevayānamārgapraveśāyogāccādāveva kṣaya ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4011: yadi ca dehādapasṛptasya devayānena pathā prasthitasyārdhapathe sukṛtaduṣkṛtakṣayo
GSP33brssgo3u:4017: kiñca mṛtasya chandato yathākāmaṃ vidyānuṣṭhānānupapatterubhyorvidyākarmakṣayayoḥ śruto hetuphalabhāvo virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4018: kiñca sati puṣkalahetau na kāryavilamba iti nyāyopetatāṇḍyādiśrutivirodhastava syādasmatpakṣe tvavirodha ityāha-chandata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4023: gater arthavattvam ubhayathānyathā hi virodhaḥ / BBs_3,3.29 /
GSP33brssgo3u:4025: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ hānāvaviśeṣeṇaiva devayānaḥ panthāḥ saṃnipateduta vibhāgena kvacitsaṃnipatet kvacinneti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4027: gaterdevayānasya pathor'thavattvamubhayathā vibhāgena bhavitumarhati kvacidarthavatī gatiḥ kvacinneti nāviśeṣeṇa /
GSP33brssgo3u:4032: gantavyaṃ ca paramaṃ sāmyaṃ na deśāntaraprāptyāyattamityānarthakyamevātra gatermanyāmahe // 29 //
GSP33brssgo3u:4033: gaterarthavattvaṅkvacitsaguṇavidyāyāṃ mārgaḥ śrūyate nirguṇavidyāyāṃ na śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4034: tatra hānasaṃnidhau mārgasya śrutatvādanapekṣitatvācca saṃśaye dṛṣṭāntasaṃgatyā pūrvapakṣamāha-yathā tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4047: yatra hi paryaṅ kārohaṇaṃ paryaṅ kastena brahmaṇā saṃvadanaṃ viśiṣṭagandhādi prāptiścetyevamādi bahu deśāntaraprāptyāyattaṃ phalaṃ śrūyate tatrārthavatī gatiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4050: lokavaccaiṣa vibhāgo draṣṭavyo yathā loke grāmaprāptau deśāntaraprāpaṇaḥ panthā apekṣyate nārogyaprāptāvevamihāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4052: nanu tarhi saguṇavidyāyāmapi mārgo vyartha ityata āha-upapanna iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4053: sā gatirlakṣaṇaṃ kāraṇaṃ yasyārthasya sa tallakṣaṇārthaḥ //30//
GSP33brssgo3u:4058: saguṇāsu vidyāsu gatirarthavatī na nirguṇāyāṃ paramātmavidyāyāmityukhtam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4059: saguṇāsvapi vidyāsu kāsucidgatiḥ śrūyate yathā paryaṅ kavidyāyāmupakosalavidyāyāṃ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ daharavidyāyāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4060: nānyāsu yathā madhuvidyāyāṃ śāṇḍilyavidyāyāṃ ṣoḍaṣakalavidyāyāṃ vaiśvānaravidyāyāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4061: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ yāsvevaiṣā gatiḥ śrūyate tāsveva niyamyetotāniyamena sarvābhirevañjātīyakābhirvidyābhirabhisaṃbadhyateti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4065: yadyanyatra śrūyamāṇāpi gatirvidyāntaraṃ gacchecchrutyādīnāṃ prāmāṇyaṃ hīyeta sarvasya sarvārthatvaprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4066: apicārcirādikaikaiva gatirupakosalavidyāyāṃ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ ca tulyavatpaṭhyate tatsarvārthatve 'narthakaṃ punarvacanaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4067: tasmānniyama ityevaṃ prāpte paṭhati - aniyama iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4072: iti pañcāgnividyāvatāṃ devayānaṃ panthānamavatārayantī 'ye ceme 'raṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate' (chā. 5.10.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:4077: nahi kevalābhyāṃ śraddātapobhyāmantareṇa vidyābalameṣā gatirlabhyate 'vidyayā tadārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4078: na tatra dakṣiṇā yanti nāvidvāṃsastapasvinaḥ' iti śrutyantarāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4080: vājasaneyinastu pañcāgnividyādhikāre 'dhīyate - 'ya evametadvidurye cāmī araṇye śraddhāṃ satyamupāsate' (bṛ. 6.2.15) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4081: tatra śraddhalavo ye satyaṃ brahmopāsata iti vyākhyeyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4084: 'atha ya etau panthānau na viduste pataṅgā yadidaṃ dandaśūkam' (bṛ. 6.2.16)
GSP33brssgo3u:4087: samṛtirapi - 'śuklakṛṣṇe gatī hyete jagataḥ śāśvate mate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4089: yatpunardevayānasya patho dvirāmnānamupakosalavidyāyāṃ pañcāgnividyāyāṃ ca tadubhayatrāpyanucintanārtham /
GSP33brssgo3u:4094: atrāpyarcirādimārga eva viṣayastatra vidyāviśeṣaprakaraṇādaviśeṣaśruteśca saṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-kiṃ tāvaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4095: saguṇanirguṇavidyāsu mārgasya bhāvābhāvavyavasthāvatsaguṇāsvapi vyavastheti dṛṣṭāntena prāptau siddhānte vyavasthāpavādādgatiniyamo 'niyama ubhayatra phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4100: aviśeṣaśrutyādinā prakaraṇabādho na doṣa ityāha-naiṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4101: tattatra adhikṛtānāṃ madhye ya itthaṃ pañcāgnīnvidurye cāmī araṇye śraddhātapa ityupāsate śraddhātapaupalakṣitaṃ brahma dhyāyanti te 'rciṣamabhisaṃbhavantītyanvayaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4103: aviduṣāṃ gatiniṣedhācchraddhātapaḥśabdābhyāṃ tatsādhyabrahmavidyālakṣaṇeti pariharati-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4112: tatra prayātā gacchanti brahma brahmavido janāḥ'ityaviśeṣeṇopasakānāmarcirādigatimuktvopasaṃhārasmṛteśca teṣāṃ tatprāptirityāha-smṛtiriti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4117: tatraikayā śuklayā punarāvṛttivarjaṃ kāryaṃ brahma gacchati anyayā svarge gatvā punarāyātītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4122: yeṣāṃ na śruto mārgaste mārgadhyānaṃ vināpi vidyāsāmarthyānmārgaṃ labhanta iti jñāpanārthā punaruktirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4128: viduṣo vartamānadehapātānantaraṃ dehāntaramutpadyate na veti cintyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4129: nanu vidyāyāḥ sādhanabhūtāyāḥ saṃpattau kaivalyanirvṛttiḥ syānna veti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4131: nahi pākasādanasaṃpattāvodano bhavenna veti cintā saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4134: tathāhyapāntaratamā nāma vedācāryaḥ purāṇarṣirviṣṇuniyogātkalidvāparayoḥ saṃdhau kṛṣṇadvaipāyanaḥ saṃbabhūveti smaranti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4135: vasiṣṭhaśca brahmaṇo mānasaḥ putraḥ sannimiśāpādapagatapūrvadehaḥ punarbrahmādeśānmitrāvaruṇābhyāṃ saṃbabhūveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4136: bhṛgvādināmapi brahmaṇa eva mānasaputrāṇāṃ vāruṇe yajñe punarutpattiḥ śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4137: sanatkumāro 'pi brahmaṇa eva mānasaḥ putraḥ svayaṃ rudrāya varapradānātskandatvena prādurbabhūva /
GSP33brssgo3u:4138: evameva dakṣanāradaprabhṛtīnāṃ bhūyasī dehāntarotpattiḥ kathyate tena tena nimittena smṛtau /
GSP33brssgo3u:4140: te ca kecitpatite pūrvadehe dehāntaramādadatte kecittu sthita eva tasminyogaiśvaryavaśādanekadehādānanyāyena /
GSP33brssgo3u:4142: tadeteṣāṃ dehāntarotpattidarśanātprāptaṃ brahmavidyāyāḥ pākṣikaṃ mokṣahetutvamahetutvaṃ veti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4145: yathāsau bhagavānsavitā sahsrayugaparyantaṃ jagato 'dhikāraṃ caritvā tadavasāna udayāstamayavarjitaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4146: kaivalyamanubhavati 'atha tata ūrdhvaṃ udetya naivodetā nāstametaikala eva madhye
GSP33brssgo3u:4149: 'tasya tāvadeva ciraṃ yāvanna vimokṣye 'tha saṃpatsye' (chā. 6.14.2) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4150: evamapāntaramaprabhṛtayo 'pīśvarāḥ parameśvareṇa teṣu teṣvadhikāreṣu niyuktāḥ santaḥ satyapi samyagdarśane kaivalyahetāvakṣīṇakarmāṇo yāvadadhaikāramavatiṣṭhante,
GSP33brssgo3u:4152: sakṛtpravṛttameva hi te phaladānāya karmāśayamativāhayantaḥ svātantryeṇaiva gṛhādiva
GSP33brssgo3u:4155: nacaite jātismarā ityucyante 'ta evaite' iti smṛtiprasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4156: yathāhi sulabhā nāma brahmavādinī janakena vivaditukāmākhyudasya svaṃ dehaṃ jānakaṃ dehamāviśya vyudya tena paścātsvameva dehamāviveśeti smaryate
GSP33brssgo3u:4157: yadi hyapayukte sakṛtpravṛtte karmaṇi karmāntaraṃ dehāntarārambhakāraṇamāvirbhavettato
GSP33brssgo3u:4158: 'nyadapyadagdhabījaṃ karmāntaraṃ tadvadeva prasajyeteti brahmavidyāyāḥ pākṣikaṃ mokṣahetutvamahetutvaṃ vāśaṅkyeta,
GSP33brssgo3u:4162: kṣīyante cāsya karmāṇi tasmindṛṣṭe parāvare' (muṇḍa. 2.2.8) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4168: jñānadagdhaistathā kleśairnātmā saṃpadyate punaḥ' iti caivamādyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4176: tathāca śrutiraviśeṣeṇaiva sarveṣāṃ jñānānmokṣaṃ darśayati 'tadyo yo devānāṃ pratyabudhyata sa eva tadabhavattatharṣīṇāṃ tathā manuṣyāṇām' (bṛ. 1.4.10) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4178: te paścādaiśvaryakṣayadarśanena nirviṇṇāḥ paramātmajñāne pariniṣṭhāḥ kaivalyaṃ prāpurityupapadyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4180: parasyānte kṛtātmānaḥ praviśanti paraṃ padam' iti smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4182: karmaphale hi svargādāvanubhavānārūḍhe syādāśaṅkā bhavedvā na veti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4186: nahi 'tattvamasi' ityasya vākyasyārthastattvaṃ mṛto bhaviṣyasītyevaṃ pariṇetuṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4188: iti ca samyagdarśanakālameva tatphalaṃ sarvātmatvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4190: FN: ūrdhvo vilakṣaṇaḥ brahmarūpaḥ san udgamya /
GSP33brssgo3u:4201: pūrvapakṣe jñānānmuktiśrutīnāṃ jñānastutimātratvena jñānasya muktiphalatvābhāve sati brahmalokaphalatvāviśeṣādarcirādimārgopasaṃhāraḥ phalaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4205: vasiṣṭha urvaśīputre jāta ityevamartho bahvṛcārthavāda ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4213: tataḥ paścādūrdhvo vilakṣaṇaḥ kevalaḥ brahmasvarūpaḥ san udetyodgamya dehaṃ tyaktveti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo3u:4216: nanu jñānināmapi janmāntaraṃ cetkathaṃ muktirityata āha-sakṛtpravṛttamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4217: yadi jñānināṃ prārabdhātiriktakarmādhīnāṃ janmāntaraṃ syāttadā jñānānmuktyabhāvaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4219: kintu bahujanmaphalāya sakṛdudbhūtaṃ prārabdhaṃ te kṣapayanti,
GSP33brssgo3u:4220: janmagrahaṇe 'pi jñānayogabalānna śocanti prārabdhasamāptau mucyanta ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4228: ādhikārikāstu pūrvanāmānaḥ svatantrā nirabhimānā iti vaiṣamyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4229: tena janakena saha vyudya vivādaṃ kṛtvetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4231: nimittābhāve naimittikābhāva iti nyāyānugṛhītānāṃ jñānānmuktiśrutīnāṃ na stutimātratvamitimamarthamupapādayati-yadi hyupayukta ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4235: viduṣo dehapātāvadhiśruteranubhavācca jñānasyāvarakājñānāṃśanivartakasya prārabdhavikṣepasthityanukūlājñānāṃśanivartanasāmarthyābhāvasiddherbhogenaiva prārabdhakṣaya iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4246: vājasaneyake śrūyate - 'etadvai tadakṣaraṃ gārgi brāhmaṇā abhivadantyasthūlamanaṇvahrasvamadīrghamalohitamasneham' (bṛ. 3.8.8) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4251: tāsāṃ viśeṣapratiṣedhabuddhīnāṃ kiṃ sarvāsāṃ sarvatra prāptiruta vyavastheti saṃśaye
GSP33brssgo3u:4253: sarvatrāvaroddhavyāḥ sāmānyatadbhāvābhyām - samāno hi sarvatra viśeṣanirākaraṇarūpo
GSP33brssgo3u:4255: tadeva ca sarvatra pratipādyaṃ brahmābhinnaṃ pratyabhijñāyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4256: tatra kimityanyatra kṛtā buddhayo 'nyatra na syuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4259: tatra vidhirūpāṇi viśeṣaṇāni cintitānīha pratiṣedharūpāṇīti viśeṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4262: yathā jāmadagnye 'hīne puroḍāśinīṣūpasatsu coditāsu puroḍāśapradānamantrāṇām agnerverhetraṃ veradhvaram ityevamādīnāmudgātṛvedotpannānāmapyadhvaryubhirabhisaṃbandho bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4265: taduktaṃ prathame kāṇḍe - 'guṇamukhyavyatikrame tadarthatvānmukhyena vedasaṃyogaḥ' (jai. sū. 3.3.8) ityatra // 33 //
GSP33brssgo3u:4274: yadi na lakṣyante tadā sarvadvaitaniṣedhāsiddhernirviśeṣapramityabhāvadoṣa iti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4275: akṣare dharmiṇi dvaitaniṣedhadhiyo 'kṣaradhiyastaddhetavaḥ śabdā iti yāvat,
GSP33brssgo3u:4277: śeṣibrahmaṇāḥ sarvaśākhāsu bhāvāttatpramiteḥ samānatvāccheṣāṇāmusaṃhāraḥ iti cettarhi nyāyasāmyātpunaruktitāvadavasthyamityata āha-prapañcārtha iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4284: ahīnaścatūrātraḥ kratustasminpuroḍāśinya upasado bhavantīti puroḍāśasādhyā iṣṭayastaittirīyake vihitāḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4286: verdevagaṇasya hotraṃ adhvaraṃ ca karmāgnestvatta evetyagnyāmantraṇamantrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4289: viniyogavidhanādhvaryuṇā prayoga iti guṇamukhyayorvyatikrame virodha sati mukhyena balīyasā mantrātmakavedasyādhvaryuṇā saṃprayoga utpatterviniyogārthatvāditi jaiminisūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4291: svaraprayogaḥ 'ya evaṃ vidvānvāravantīyaṃ gāyati yajñāyajñīyaṃ gāyati vāmadevyaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4292: gāyati'ityādhāne teṣāṃ viniyogavidhinā yājuṣeṇa yājuṣasyopāṃśusvarasya prayoga iti
GSP33brssgo3u:4303: tathā kaṭhāḥ 'ṛtaṃ pibantau sukṛtasya loke guhāṃ praviṣṭau parame parārdhe /
GSP33brssgo3u:4304: chāyātapau brahmavido vadanti pañcāgnayo ye ca triṇāciketāḥ' (ka. 3.1) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4312: ṛtaṃ pibantāvityatrobhayorapi bhoktṛtvameva dṛśyate tadvedyarūpaṃ bhidyamānaṃ vidyāṃ bhindyādityevaṃ prāpte bravīti vidyaikatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4317: dvā suparṇā ityatra tāvat anaśnannanyo abhicākaśīti ityaśanāyādyatītaḥ paramātmā pratipādyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4318: vākyaśeṣe 'pi ca sa eva pratipādyamno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4320: ṛtaṃ pibantau ityatra tu jīve pibatyaśanāyādyatītaḥ paramātmāpi sāhacaryācchatrinyāyena pibatītyupacaryate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4323: tadviṣaya eva cātrāpi vākyaśeṣo bhavati 'yaḥ seturījānānāmakṣaraṃ brahma yatparam' (ka. 3.2) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4327: apica triṣvapyeteṣu vedānteṣu paurvāparyalocane paramātmavidyaivāvagamyate tādātmyavivakṣayaiva jīvopādānaṃ nārthāntaravivakṣayā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4337: iha tu vedyabhedānnopasaṃhāra iti pratyudāharaṇena pūrvapakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4340: kintu pibatpadasya mukhyārthatvāya svataḥ kalpanayā ca pānakṛtyāśrayau buddhijīvau pibantau grāhyau,
GSP33brssgo3u:4350: tatra saṃśayaḥ - vidyaikatvaṃ vā syādvidyānānātvaṃ veti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4354: tasmādyathābhyāsātkarmabheda evamabhyāsādvidyābheda ityevaṃ prāpte pratyāha - antarāmnānāviśeṣātsvātmano vidyaikatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4355: sarvāntaro hi svātmobhayatrāpyaviśiṣṭaḥ pṛcchyate ca pratyucyate ca /
GSP33brssgo3u:4359: yathāca pañcabhūtasamūhe dehe pṛthivyā āpontarā adbhyastejo 'ntaramiti satyapyāpekṣike 'ntaratve naiva mukhya sarvāntaratvaṃ bhavati tathehāpītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4361: yathā 'eko devaḥ sarvabhūteṣu gūḍhaḥ sarvavyāpī sarvabhūtāntarātmā' (śve.
GSP33brssgo3u:4362: 6.11) ityasminmantre samasteṣu bhūtagrāmyeṣveka eva sarvāntara ātmāmnāyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4372: tanme vyācakṣvetyuṣastapraśne yājñavalkyena prāṇādiprerako dṛṣṭyādisākṣī pratipāditaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4373: tathaiva 'yadeva sākṣādaparokṣādbrahma ya ātmā sarvāntarastanme vyācakṣva'iti kaholapraśne 'śanāyādyatītaḥ pratipāditaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4383: anyathā bhedānupapattir iti cen nopadeśāntaravat / BBs_3,3.36 /
GSP33brssgo3u:4387: yathā tāṇḍināmupaniṣadi ṣaṣṭhe prapāṭhake - 'sa ātmā tattvamasi śvekateto' (chā. 6.8.7)
GSP33brssgo3u:4388: iti navakṛtvo 'pyupadeśe na vidyābhedo bhavatyevamihāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4389: kathaṃ na navakṛtvo 'pyupadeśe vidyābhedo na bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4397: iti dvitīye praśna evakāraṃ prayuñjānaḥ pūrvapraśnagatamevārthamuttaratrānukṛṣyamāṇaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4402: nanu anyathā vidyaikyāṅgīkāre abhyāsānupapattiriti ceducyate-sa evābhyāsaḥ karmabhedako yo nirarthakaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4403: iha tūṣastabrāhmaṇoktātmana evāśanāyādyatyayarūpaviśeṣakathanārthatvādabhyāso 'nyathāsiddho na vidyābhedaka iti samudāyārthaḥ //36//
GSP33brssgo3u:4408: tathā - 'tadyo 'haṃ so 'sau yo 'sau so 'ham' ityādityapuruṣaṃ prakṛtyaitareyiṇaḥ samāmananti,
GSP33brssgo3u:4409: tathā jābālāḥ tvaṃ vā ahamasmi bhagavo devate 'haṃ vai tvamasi' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4410: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimiha vyatihāreṇobhayarūpā matiḥ kartavyotaikarūpaiveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4413: yadi caivaṃ cintayitavyo viśeṣaḥ parikalpyeta saṃsāriṇastāvadīśvarātmamīśvarasya saṃsīryātmatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4414: tatra saṃsāriṇastāvadīśvarātmatva utkarṣo bhavedīśvarasya tu saṃsāryātmatve nikarṣaḥ kutaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4419: tathāhi viśiṃṣanti samāmnātāra ubhayoccāraṇena 'tvamahamasmyahaṃ ca tattvamasi' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4428: kiṃ tarhi vyatihāreṇeha dvirūpā matiḥ kartavyā vacanaprāmāṇyānnaikarūpetyetāvadupapādayāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4430: yathādhyānārtho 'pi satyakāmādiguṇopadeśe tadguṇa īśvaraḥ prasiddhyati tadvat /
GSP33brssgo3u:4431: tasmādayamādhyātavyo vyatihāraḥ samāne ca viṣaya upasaṃhartavyo bhavatīti // 37 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo3u:4436: utkṛṣṭadṛṣṭirnikṛṣṭe kṛtā phalavatīti nyāyācca saṃśaye jīve īśvaratvamatireva kāryā uktanyāyāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:4438: tatra lāghavaṃ phalaṃ liddhānte tu śrutyarthavattvamiti vivekaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4439: ekenaiva tvamahamasmītyuccāraṇenaikatvamateḥ kṛtatvādahaṃ tvamasi iti vṛthā syādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4444: brahmaṇi manomayatvādivajjīvātmatvasya dhyānārthamārope 'pi nikarṣaprasaktyabhāvāditi pariharati-naiṣa doṣa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4445: brahmaṇi nikarṣaṃ hitvā jīvatādātmyadhyāne maduktamevāgatamiti śaṅkate-nanvevamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4446: materdvirūpatvaṃ tvadanuktamasmābhirucyate dhyānaparaṃ vākyamidamekatvaṃ tu mānāntarāvirodhātsidhyatīti samādhatte-na vayamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4452: 'sa yo haitaṃ mahadyakṣaṃ prathamajaṃ veda brahma' (bṛ. 5.4.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:4454: sa ādityo ya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣo yaścāyaṃ dakṣiṇe 'kṣanpuruṣaḥ' (bṛ. 5.5.2) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4455: tatra saṃśayaḥ -' kiṃ dve ete satyavidye kiṃvaikaiveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4467: yatra tu vispaṣṭātkāraṇāntarādvidyābhedaḥ pratīyate tatraitadevaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4468: atra tūkṣayā saṃbhave tadyattatsatyamiti prakṛtākarṣaṇātpūrvavidyāsaṃbaddameva satyamuttaratrākṛṣyata ityekavidyātvaniścayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4471: apicārthavādādeva phale kalpayitavye sati vidyaikatve cāvayaveṣu śrūyamāṇāni bahūnyapi phalānyavayavinyāmeva vidyāyāmupasaṃhartavyāni bhavanti
GSP33brssgo3u:4472: tasmātsaiveyamekā satyavidyā tena tena viśeṣaṇopetāmnātetyataḥ sarva eva satyādayo guṇā ekasminneva prayoga upasaṃhartavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4474: chāndogye ca - 'atha ya eṣo 'ntarāditye hiraṇmayaḥ puruṣo dṛśyate' (chā. 1.6.6)
GSP33brssgo3u:4478: chāndogye hi jyotiṣṭomakarmasamabandhinīyamudgīthavyapāśrayā vidyā vijñāyate tatra hyadimadhyāvasāneṣu hi karmasaṃbandhacihnāni bhavanti 'iyamevargagniḥ sāma' (chā. 1.6.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:4488: sa yaḥ kaścidadhikārī mahadvyāpakaṃ yakṣaṃ pūjyaṃ bhautikeṣu prathamajametatsacca tyacceti sattyaṃ brahma hiraṇyagarbhākhyaṃ vedopāste tasya lokajayaḥ phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4491: madhyasthamakṣaramanṛtamubhayataḥ satyena saṃpuṭitatvātsattyaprāyameva bhavatīti nāmākṣaropāsanā satyavidyāṅgatvenoktā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4493: so 'sāvādityamaṇḍale 'kṣiṇi ca puruṣastasyāharityahamiti ca nāmadvayajñānātpāpakṣayaḥ phalamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4498: tathātra phalaśrutibhedādvidyābheda iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣayati-dve iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4504: evaṃ vidyābhede 'pyetadupāsyaikyajñānaṃ syādatra tūbhayathāsaṃbhave vidyaikyanānātvasaṃśaye satyamityupāsyarūpaikyajñānādvidyaikyaniścaya ityakṣarārthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4507: kiñca yatra pradhānavidhāvevaṅkāma iti phalaṃ śrutaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4509: iha tu prathamaja satyaṃ brahmeti vedeti pradhānavidyāvidhisthatvaṃ lokajayaphalasyābhyupetyāsmābhirnāmarūpāṅgasya phalaśruteḥ stutitvamuktam
GSP33brssgo3u:4511: pradhāne tadaṅge vā yatkiñcitphalaṃ śrutaṃ tasya sarvasyāpi śrutatvāviśeṣājjāteṣṭiphalanyāyena
GSP33brssgo3u:4518: puruṣa udgītha ityevaṃ vidvānudgātā karmaphalasamṛddhisamartha iti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4525: atha yadidamasminbrahmapure daharaṃ puṇḍarīkaṃ veśma daharo 'sminnantarākāśaḥ (chā. 8.1.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:4526: iti prastutya chandogā adhīyate 'eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā vijaro vimṛtyurviśoko vijighatso 'pipāsaḥ satyakāmaḥ satyasaṃkalpaḥ' (chā. 8.1.5) ityādi
GSP33brssgo3u:4527: tathā vājasaneyinaḥ - sa vā eṣa mahānaja ātmā yo 'yaṃ vijñānamayaḥ prāṇeṣu ya eṣo 'ntarhadaya ākāśastasmiñchete sarvasya vaśī (bṛ. 4.4.22) ityādi
GSP33brssgo3u:4528: tatra vidyaikatvaṃ parasparaguṇayogaśca kiṃ vā neti saṃśaye vidyaikatvamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4532: yadetaccāndogye hṛdayākāśasya satyakāmatvādiguṇajātamulabhyate taditaratra vājasaneyake vaśitvādyupalabhyate tadapītaratra chāndogye eṣa ātmāpahatapāpmā (chā. 8.1.5)
GSP33brssgo3u:4535: samānaṃ hyubhayamatrāpi hṛdayamātanaṃ samānaśca vedya īśvaraḥ samānaṃ ca tasya setutvaṃ lokāsaṃbhedaprayojanamityevamādi bahu sāmānyaṃ dṛśyate
GSP33brssgo3u:4537: ñapi dṛśyate chāndogye hṛdayākāśasya guṇayogo vājasaneyake tvākāśāśrayasya brahmaṇa iti / na /
GSP33brssgo3u:4541: saguṇā hi brahmavidyā chāndogya upadiśyate 'atha ya ihātmānamanuvidya vrajantyetāṃśca satyānkāmān' (chā. 8.1.6)
GSP33brssgo3u:4543: vājasaneyake tu nirguṇameva paraṃ brahmopadiśyamānaṃ dṛśyate 'ata ūrdhvaṃ vimokṣāya brūhi' (bṛ. 4.3.14)
GSP33brssgo3u:4546: vaśitvādi tu tatstutyarthameva guṇajātaṃ vājasaneyake saṃkīrtyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4549: guṇavatastu brahmaṇa ekatvādvibhūtipradarśanāyāyaṃ guṇopasaṃhāraḥ sūtrito nopāsanāyeti draṣṭavyam // 39 //
GSP33brssgo3u:4551: saguṇanirguṇavidyayoḥ śrutāḥ satyakāmādayo vaśitvādayaśca guṇā mitha upasaṃhartavyā
GSP33brssgo3u:4552: na vetyupasaṃhārasya phalabhāvābhāvābhyāṃ saṃdehe satyavidyāyā ekatvādguṇasāṃkarye
GSP33brssgo3u:4557: bhinnāvidyāsthānāmapi guṇānāmāyatanādisāmyena nirguṇasthale buddhisthānāṃ stutyarthamupasaṃhāro yuktaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4560: yadyapi saguṇasthasatyakāmādiṣu nirguṇasthaguṇā antarbhūtā eva tathāpi nopasaṃhāroktervaiyarthyaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4566: chāndogye vaiśvānaravidyāṃ prakṛtya śrūyate - 'tadyadbhaktaṃ prathamamāgacchettaddhomīyaṃ sa yāṃ prathamāmāhutiṃ juhuyāttāṃ juhuyātprāṇasya svāhā' (chā. 5.19.1) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4568: tāsu ca parastādagnihotraśabdaḥ prayuktaḥ 'ya etadevaṃ vidvānagnihotraṃ juhoti' (chā. 5.24.2)
GSP33brssgo3u:4571: tatredaṃ vicāryate - kiṃ bhojanalope lopaḥ prāṇāgnihotrasyotālopa itai /
GSP33brssgo3u:4577: yathā ha vai svayamahutvāgnihotraṃ parasya juhuyādevaṃ tat' ityatithibhojanasya prāthamyaṃ ninditvā svāmibhojanaṃ prathamaṃ prāpayantī prāṇāgnihotra ādaraṃ karoti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4578: yā hi na prāthamyalopaṃ sahate netarāṃ sā prāthamyavato 'gnihotrasya lopaṃ sahateti manyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4590: nanu yadbhaktamiti yacchabdena bhojanākṣiptaṃ bhaktamanūdya yaddhomīyamiti homasaṃyogavidhinādākṣepakabhojanalope tadākṣiptabhaktāśritahomalopa iti siddhāntī śaṅkate-tadyaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4591: nirguṇasyopāstilope 'pi stutyarthaguṇasthairyavadbhojanalope 'pi prāṇāgnihotrasyādareṇa stutinirvāhārthamalopa iti dṛṣṭāntena pūrvapakṣasūtreṇa pariharati-evaṃ prāpta iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4597: ato bhaktavidherapavādārthatvādbhojanalope bhaktākhyaguṇasyāṅgasya lope 'pi na mukhyasyāgnihotrasya lopaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4600: ādhāne santi pavamāneṣṭyastatrāgnaye pavamānāya puroḍāśamaṣṭākapālaṃ nirvapediti
GSP33brssgo3u:4602: vihitāgnihotra havaṇyatideśena prāpta ādhānakāle cāgnihotrābhāvāttasyā guṇabhūtāyā
GSP33brssgo3u:4603: lope 'pi mukhyasya nirvāpasya na lopa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4614: tā aprayojakalakṣaṇāpannāḥ satyaḥ kathaṃ bhojanalope dravyāntaraṃ pratinidhāpayeyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4616: kuṇḍapāyināmayane hi māsāgnihotraṃ juhotīti vidhyuddeśagato 'gnihotraśabdastadvadbhāvaṃ vidāpayediti yuktā taddharmaprāptiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4624: ata eva cehāpi sāṃpādikānyevāgnihotrāṅgāni darśayati - 'ura eva vedirlomāni bahurhṛdayaṃ gārhapatyo mano 'nvāhāryapacana āsyamāhavanīyaḥ' (chā. 5.18.2) iti /
