GSP33brssgo3u:4639: āśritya vihitāhutīnāmāśrayalope lopa eva na dravyāntarākṣepakatvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4640: yathā kratuprayuktātpraṇayanāśritasya godohanasya kratulope lope na tvāśrayāntaraprayojakatvaṃ tatheti phalitamāha-tā itiyaduktamagnihotraśabdāddravyāntaraprāptiriti,
GSP33brssgo3u:4646: mukhyāgnihotrāṅgāni saṃpādyante cetkathaṃ tadanaṅgaṃ vediratra saṃpādyate tatrāha-vediśrutiśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4651: nanu svāmibhojanasyottarakālatvaṃ śrutyādivihitaṃ kathaṃ pūrvo 'tidhibhyo 'śnīyāditivacane bādhyate tatrāha-na hyastīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4661: kiṃ tāni nityānyeva syuḥ karmasu parṇamayītvādivadutānityāni godohanādivaditi vicārayāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4665: yattveṣāṃ svavākyeṣu phalaśravaṇam 'āpayitā ha vaikāmānāṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.7)
GSP33brssgo3u:4667: tasmādyathā yasya parṇamayī juhūrbhavati na sa pāpaṃ ślokaṃ śṛṇoti ityevamādīnāmaprakaraṇapaṭhitānāmapi
GSP33brssgo3u:4670: yānyetānyudgīthādikarmaguṇayāthātmyanirdhāraṇāni rasatama āptiḥ samṛddhirmukhyaprāṇa āditya ityevamādīni naitāni nityavatkarmasu niyamyeran
GSP33brssgo3u:4672: tathāhyaniyatatvamevañjātīyakānāṃ darśayati śrutiḥ - 'tenobhau kuruto yaścaitadevaṃ veda yaśca na veda' (chā. 1.110)
GSP33brssgo3u:4674: prastāvādidevatāvijñānavihīnānāmapi prastotrādīnāṃ yājanādhyavasānadarsanāt 'prastotaryā devatā prastāvamanvāyattā tāṃ cedavidvānprastoṣyasi' (chā. 1.10.9)
GSP33brssgo3u:4677: api caivañjātīyakasya karmavyapāśrayasya vijñānasya pṛthageva karmaṇaḥ phalamupalabhyate
GSP33brssgo3u:4680: nānā tu vidyā cāvidyā ca yadeva vidyayā karoti śraddhayopaniṣadā tadeva vīryavattaraṃ bhavati' (chā. 1.1.10) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4681: tatra nānā tviti vidvadavidvatprayogayoḥ pṛthakkaraṇādvīyarvattaramiti ca tarappratyayaprayogādvidyāvihīnamapi karmaviryavaditi gamyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4685: tathā lokasāmādiṣu pratiniyatāni pratyupāsanaṃ phalāni śiṣyante 'kalpante hāsmai lokā ūrdhvāścāvṛttāśca' (chā. 2.2.3)
GSP33brssgo3u:4690: prayājādiṣu tvitikartavyatākāṅkṣasya kratoḥ prakṛtatvāttādarthye sati yuktaṃ phalaśruterarthavādatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4696: vākyenaiva tu juhvādyāśrayatāṃ vivakṣitvā phale 'pi vidhiṃ vivakṣato vākyabhedaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4697: upāsanānāṃ tu kriyātmatvādviśiṣṭavidhānopapatterudgīthādyāśrayāṇāṃ phale vidānaṃ na virudhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4699: ata eva ca kalpasūtrakārā naivañjātīyakānyupāsanāni kratuṣu kalpayāñcakruḥ // 42 //
GSP33brssgo3u:4702: yathānārābhyādhītaparṇamayītvaṃ juhūdvārā kratvaṅgatayā karmasu nityaṃ prayujyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:4705: prayujyate yathā vā paśvaṅgayūpāśrayaṃ bailvatvamannādyaphalatvādanityaṃ tathā karmasamṛdyādiphalakatvādupāsanānyanaṅgatvenānityānīti saṃśayārthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4711: tathā cāṅgatayā prayogavidhinā nityena prayujyanta iti prāpte siddhāntasūtraṃ vyācaṣṭe-yānītyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4712: udgīthādayaḥ karmaṇāṃ guṇāḥ aṅgāni teṣāṃ yāthātmayaṃ rasatamatvādikaṃ tannirdhāraṇānyupāsanāni yāni tāni karmasu nityaparṇamayītvādivanna niyamyerannityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4713: eṣāṃ karmāṅgatve taddhīnasyāviduṣaḥ karma na syādaṅgalopāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:4716: tāṃ cedavidvānprastoṣyasi mūrdhā te vyapatiṣyatīti cākrāyaṇenartvijāmākṣiptatvādanupāsakānāmapi karmaprayogo 'stītyāha-prastāvādīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4718: tenomityakṣareṇa yaścaitadakṣaramevaṃ rasatamatvādirūpeṇa vedopāste yaśca na veda tāvubhau karma kuruta eva yadyapi tu vidyāvidyayornānātvaṃ bhinnaphalatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4719: dṛṣṭaṃ hi maṇivikraye jñānājñānābhyāṃ vaṇikśabarayoḥ phalavaiṣamyaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4720: tasmādyadeva karma vidyayodgīthādyupāstyā śraddhayāstikyabuddhyopaniṣadā rahasyadevatādhyānena karoti tadeva karma phalātiśayavadityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4721: karmaṇo vīryavattvaṃ nāma phalavattvaṃ vidyāhīnasyāpi gamyamānaṃ vidyāyā anaṅgatve liṅgamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4723: asmai viduṣe kalpante bhogāya samarthā bhavanti bhūmerūrdhvā lokā āvṛttā adhastanāścetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4729: yadyapi parṇamayītvādīnāmaṅgatvabodhakaṃ prakaraṇaṃ nāsti tathāpi teṣu phalaśruteḥ stutitvaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4734: yadapaḥ praṇayettat paśukāmasya sato godohanena brahmavarcasakāmasya kaṃsnyeti phalārthavidhireva nārthavādaḥ godohanādeḥ kratvanākāṅkṣitatvenāṅgatvābhāvāt,
GSP33brssgo3u:4736: tathā khādiratvena nirākāṅkṣakratvaṅgayūpamāśritya bailvamannādyakāmasya khādiraṃ vīryakāmasyeti phalārthavidhirevārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4737: parṇamayītvādiṣu phalavidhiḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-na tviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4741: vidheyaḥ paścānnirākāṅkṣajuhūmāśritya tasyaiva prakṛtidravyasya phalasaṃyogo vidheya
GSP33brssgo3u:4753: ityatrādhyātmaṃ vāgādīnāṃ śreṣṭho 'vadhārito 'dhidaivatamagnyādīnāṃ vāyuḥ tathā chāndogye - 'vāyurvāva saṃvargaḥ' (chā. 4.3.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:4756: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kiṃ pṛthagevemau vāyuprāṇāvupagantavyau syātāmapṛthagveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4759: darśayati ca śrutiradhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca tattvābhedam - 'agnirvāgbhūtvā mukhaṃ prāviśat' (ai. 2.4)
GSP33brssgo3u:4761: tathā 'ta ete sarva eva samāḥ sarvo 'nantāḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.13)
GSP33brssgo3u:4763: tathānyatrāpi tatra tatrādhyātmamadhidaivataṃ ca bahudhā tattvabhedadarśanaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4764: kvacicca 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ iti spaṣṭameva vāyuṃ prāṇaṃ caikaṃ karoti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4770: tathā chāndogye 'pi parastāt 'mahātmanaścaturo deva ekaḥ kaḥ sa jāgara bhuvanasya gopāḥ' (chā. 4.3.6)
GSP33brssgo3u:4771: ityekameva saṃvargaṃ gamayati na bravītyeka ekeṣāṃ caturṇāṃ saṃvargo 'paro 'pareṣāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4781: 'sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇa evametāsāṃ devatānāṃ vāyuḥ' (bṛ. 1.5.22)
GSP33brssgo3u:4786: bhagnavratāni hi vāgādīnyuktāni 'tāni mṛtyuḥ śramo bhūtvopayeme' (bṛ. 1.5.21) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4790: iti cektvā 'teno etasyai devatāyai sāyujyaṃ salokatāṃ jayati (bṛ. 1.5.23)
GSP33brssgo3u:4794: tathā 'tau vā etau dvau saṃvargau vāyureva deveṣu prāṇaḥ prāṇeṣu' (chā. 4.3.4)
GSP33brssgo3u:4795: iti bhedena vyapadiśati 'te vā ete pañcānye pañcānye daśa santastatkṛtam' (chā. 4.3.8)
GSP33brssgo3u:4800: ato vacanādindrābhedācca sahapradānāśaṅkāyāṃ rājādiguṇabhedādyājyānuvākyavyatyāsavidhānācca yathānyasameva devatāpṛthaktvātpradānapṛthaktvaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:4802: taduktaṃ saṃkarṣe 'nānā vā devatā pṛthagjñānāt' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4803: tatra tu dravyadevatābhedādyāgabhedo vidyate naivamiha vidyābhedo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4805: vidyaikasthe 'pi tvadhyātmādhidaivabhedātpravṛttibhedo bhavati agnihotra iva sāyaṃprātaḥkālabhedāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4809: astu karmāṅgānāṃ tatsaṃbaddhopāstīnāṃ ca phalabhedānnityatvānityatvarūpaḥ prayogabhedaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4812: 'yataścodeti sūryastaṃ vada'iti praśne sūtrātmakavāyurvācyo vāyusthāne prāṇaṃ vadannekatvaṃ tayordarśayatītyāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4813: kiñca yadi vāyuprāṇayoḥ pṛthagdhyānaṃ syāttarhi dhyānāṅgavratabhedo 'pi syādiha tu prāṇāpānanirodhātmakavrataikyaśruterdhyānaikyamityāha-tasmāditi
GSP33brssgo3u:4815: kiñca vāyuprāṇo saṃvargau bhedenopakramya parastādvākyaśeṣe saṃvargadevaikyaśruteḥ prayogaikyamityāha-tatheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4817: caturaścatuḥ saṃkhyākānagnisūryodakacandrānaparāṃśca vākcakṣuḥśrotramanorūpāneko devaḥ kaḥ prajāpatiḥ jagāra gīrṇavānupasaṃhṛtavānityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4820: sāyaṃprātaḥkālabhedena prayogabhedastathā 'annādo bhavati ya evaṃ veda'ityutpannāyāḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4823: 'tau vā etau dvau saṃvargau'ityupāsyabhedavākyasya prayogabhedaparatvādvākyādeva bhedasiddhirityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4826: tato 'dhyātmādhidaivāvasthābhedenoktasya dhyeyabhedasya nirāse 'yataścodeti'iti ślokasya na śaktirityāha-śloketi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4829: nanvevakārādvāyuvratanivṛtteḥ prāṇa evaiko dhyeyo bhātītyata āha-ekameveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4830: vadanadarśanādīni vākcakṣurādīnāṃ vratāni śramarūpamṛtyunā bhagnānītyuktvā prāṇasyābhagnavratatvaṃ nirdhāritaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4831: tathā jvalanatāpādīnyagnyādityādīnāṃ vratāni bhagnānītyuktvā vāyorabhagnavratatvaṃ nirdhāritaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4832: 'sa yathaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ madhyamaḥ prāṇaḥ sthiravrata evametāsāṃ devanāṃ vāyurlocanti hyanyā devatā na vāyuḥsaiṣānastamitā devatā yadvāyiḥ'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4833: ato bhagnavatanirāsārtha evakāro na vāyuvratanivṛttyartha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4836: tena vratena vāyoḥ sāyujyaṃ samānadehatvaṃ salokatāṃ ca jayatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4839: saṃprati pūrvoktaṃ pṛthagupadeśaṃ vivṛṇoti-tathā tau vā iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4841: trayaḥ puroḍāśā asyāṃ santīti tripuroḍāśinīṣṭistasyāṃ kiṃ sahapradānamuta bhedeneti saṃdehe pūrvapakṣamāha-sarveṣāmiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4844: yadvā sarvadevārthaṃ yugapadavadānaṃ kāryamityatra heturacchaṃvaṭkāramiti avyarthatvāyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4845: ekārthamavatte haviṣi śeṣo yāgānarhatayā vṛthā syāditi bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4846: evaṃ sahāvadānaśruterdevaikyācca puroḍāśānāṃ sahaprakṣepe prāpte pṛthakprakṣepa iti siddhāntamāha-rājeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4848: kiñcādhvaryuṇā yajeti praiṣe kṛte hotrā yo mantraḥ paṭhyate sā yājyā,
GSP33brssgo3u:4850: tatrāsyāmiṣṭau prathamapuroḍāśapradāne yā kḷptā yājyā sa dvitīyapradāne puronuvākya,
GSP33brssgo3u:4858: karmotpattivākyasthadevatābhedaḥ karmabhede heturiha tvannādo bhavati ya evaṃ vedetyutpattāvekatvena jñātavidyāyāḥ paścācchrutavāyuprāṇabhedo na bhedakaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4866: vājasaneyino 'gnirahasye - 'naiva idamagre sadāsīt' ityetasminbrāhmaṇe mano 'dhikṛtyādhīyate 'tatṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇyapaśyadātmano 'gnīnarkānmanomayāmanaścitaḥ' ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4867: tathaiva 'vākcitaḥ prāṇacitaścakṣuścitaḥ śrotracitaḥ karmacito 'gnicitaḥ' iti pṛthagagamanīnāmananti sāṃpādikān /
GSP33brssgo3u:4868: teṣu saṃśayaḥ - kimete manaścidādayaḥ kriyānupraveśinastaccheṣabhūtā uta svatantrāḥ kevalavidyātmakā iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4869: tatra prakaraṇākriyānupraveśe prāpte svātantryaṃ tāvatpratijānīte liṅgabhayastvāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4870: bhūyāṃsi hiliṅgānyasminbrāhmaṇe kevalavidyātmakatvameṣāmupodbalayanti dṛśyante tadyatkiñcemāni bhūtāni manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtiḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4871: 'tānhaitānevaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvantyapi svapate' iti caivañjātīyakāni /
GSP33brssgo3u:4875: utpatteḥ prāgidaṃ sarvaṃ naiva sadāsīnnāpyasadityupakramya manaḥ sṛṣṭimuktvā tanmana ātmānamaikṣatetīkṣaṇapūrvakamagnīnapaśyaditi mano 'dhikṛtya paṭhantītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4877: tābhiriṣṭakātvena kalpitābhirmanasaiva saṃpāditā agnayo manaścitasthānarkānpūjyānmanovṛttiṣusaṃpāditānātmanaḥ svasya saṃbandhitvena mano 'paśyat,
GSP33brssgo3u:4879: prāṇo ghrāṇaṃ karmendriyeṇa hastādinā citaḥ karmacitaḥ agnistvak pūrvatrāgnicayanaprakaraṇātkimete
GSP33brssgo3u:4883: iha tu manaścidādyagnīnāṃ prakaraṇātkarmāṅgatvenaikaprayogatvamiti prāpayya siddhāntamupakramate-tatretyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:4884: pūrvapakṣe bhāvanāgnīnāṃ kratvaṅgatvamiṣṭaṃ teṣāṃ kriyāṅgatvaṃ vikalpaḥ samuccayo vāstu /
GSP33brssgo3u:4886: tattatra sarvaprāṇimanovṛttibhirmama sadāgnayaḥ cīyanta iti dhyānadārḍhye sati sarvabhūtāni yatkiñcit manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmevāgnīnāṃ sā kṛtiḥ karaṇamityekaṃ liṅgaṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4888: evaṃvide svapate jāgrate 'pi tadīyāgnīnbhūtāni sarvadā cinvantīti liṅgāntaraṃ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4895: pūrvasya kriyāmayasyāgneḥ prakaraṇāttadviṣaya evāyaṃ vikalpaviśeṣopadeśaḥ syānna svatantraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4901: anyārthadarśanaṃ cāsatyāmanyasyāṃ prāptau guṇavādenāpyupapadyamānaṃ na prakaraṇaṃ bādhitumutsahate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4904: yathā daśarātrasya dasaṇe 'hanyavivākye pṛthivyā pātreṇa samudrasya somasya prajāpataye devatāyai guhyamāṇasya grahaṇāsādanahavanāharaṇopahvānabhakṣaṇāni mānasānyevāmnāyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:4905: sa ca mānaso 'pi grahakalpaḥ kriyāprakaraṇātkriyāśeṣa eva bhavatyevamayamapyagnikalpa ityarthaḥ // 45 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo3u:4908: pūrvasyeṣṭakābhiragniṃ cinuta ityuktasya sa eṣa tviṣṭakāgniriti saṃnihitasyāyaṃ vikalpaviśeṣopadeśaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:4916: nanu akriyārūpāgnīnāṃ dhyānamayānāṃ kathaṃ kriyāṅgatvaṃ tatrāha-mānasavaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:4918: taddharmamāṇāmeva teṣvatideśāttasya madhyadaśarātrasya daśame 'hanyarthādekādaśe 'hani mānasagrahaḥ śrūyate-'anayā tvā pātreṇa samudraṃ rasayā prājāpatyaṃ manograhaṃ gṛhṇāti'iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4919: anayā rasayā pṛthivyā pātreṇa samudraṃ tvāṃ prajāpatidevatākaṃ manograhaṃ gṛhyate iti grahaḥ somarasaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:4921: ata evartvijāṃ dhyāyitayā vividhavākyoccāraṇābhāvādavivākyasaṃjñā ahnaḥ prāptaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4923: gṛhītasya svasthāne sthāpanamāsādanaṃ somasya homo havanaṃ hutaśeṣādānamāharaṇaṃ śeṣabhakṣaṇāyartvijāṃ mitho 'nujñānakaraṇamupahvānaṃ tato bhakṣaṇamityetāni mānasānyevetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4924: sa ca mānaso graho dvādaśāhādaharantaraṃ svatantramityāśaṅaḍkya dvādaśāhasaṃjñāvirodhānnāharantaraṃ kintu prakaraṇādavivākyasyāhno 'ṅgamiti siddhāntamāha-sa ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4940: vidyātmakā evaite svatantrā manaścidādayo 'gnayaḥ syurna kriyāśeṣabhūtāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:4941: tathāhi nirdhārayati - 'te haite vidyācita eva' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4942: vidyayā haivaita evaṃvidaścitā bhavanti iti ca // 47 //
GSP33brssgo3u:4952: nanu liṅgamapyasatyāṃmanyasyāṃ prāptāvasādhakaṃ kasyacidarthasyetyapāsya tatprakaraṇasāmarthyātkriyāśeṣatvamadhyavasitamityata uttaraṃ paṭhati
GSP33brssgo3u:4960: tathā liṅm 'sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtāni cinvantyapi svapate' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4962: 'vidyācita eva' iti hi sāvadhāraṇeyaṃ śrutiḥ kriyānupraveśe 'mīṣāmabhyupagamyamāne pīḍitā syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4965: tadabhiprāyatāyāṃ hividyocita itīyatā svarūpasamakīrtanenaiva kṛtatvādanarthakamavadhāraṇaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssgo3u:4968: tathā 'svapate jāgrate caivaṃvide sarvadā sarvāṇi bhūtānyetānyetānagniṃścinvanti' iti sātatyadarśanameṣāṃ svātantrye 'vakalpate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4969: yathā sāṃpādike vākyaprāṇamaye 'gnihotre 'prāṇaṃ tadā vāci juhoti - vācaṃ tadā prāṇe juhoti' (kau. 2.5)
GSP33brssgo3u:4970: iti coktvocyate - 'ete anante āhutī jāgracca svapaṃśca satataṃ - juhoti' (kauṣī. 2.5) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:4972: kriyānupraveśe tu kriyāprayogasyālpakālatvena na sātatyeṣāṃ prayogaḥ kalpeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:4974: yatra hi vispaṣṭo vidhāyako liṅgādirupalabhyate yuktaṃ tatra saṃkīrtanamātrasyārthavādatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4975: iha hi vispaṣṭovidhyantarānupalabdheḥ saṃkīrtanādevaiṣāṃ vijñānavidhānaṃ kalpanīyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4976: tacca yathāsaṃkīrtanameva kalpayituṃ śakyata iti sātatyadarśanāttathābhūtameva kalpyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4978: etena tadyatkiñcemāni bhūtāni manasā saṃkalpayanti teṣāmeva sā kṛtiḥ ityādi vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssgo3u:4979: tathā vākyamapi evaṃvide iti puruṣaviśeṣasaṃbandhamevaiṣāmācakṣaṇaṃ na kratusaṃbandhaṃ mṛṣyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:4989: sarvadā sarvabhūtāni madarthamagnīn cinvantīti dhyāyedityapūrvārthatayā vidhikalpanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:4998: grahā agṛhyanta manasāstuvanmanasāśaṃsanyatkiñca yajñe karma kriyate yatkiñca yajñiyaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:4999: karma manasaiva teṣu tanmanomayeṣu manaścitsu manomayameva kriyate' ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:5001: naca pratyakṣāḥ kriyāvayavāḥ santaḥ saṃpadā lipsitavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5003: nahyatra kriyāṅgaṃ kiñcidādāya tasminnado nāmādhyavasitavyamiti vadati /
GSP33brssgo3u:5004: ṣaṭtriṃśatsahasrāṇi tu manovṛttibhedānādāya teṣvagnitvaṃ grahādīṃśca kalpayati puruṣayādivat /
GSP33brssgo3u:5005: saṃkhyā ceyaṃ puruṣāyuṣasyāhaḥsu dṛṣṭā satī tatsaṃbandhinīṣu manovṛttiṣvāropyata iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5008: tathāhi - 'teṣāmekaika eva tāvānyānānasau pūrvaḥ' iti kriyāmayasyāgnermāhātmyaṃ jñānamayānāmekaikasyātidiśankiriyāyāmanādaraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:5009: naca satyeva kriyāsaṃbandhe vikalpaḥ pūrveṇottareṣāmiti śakyaṃ vaktum /
GSP33brssgo3u:5010: nahi yena vyāpāreṇāhanīyadhāraṇādinā pūrvaḥ kriyāyāmupakaroti tenottara upakartuṃ śaknuvanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5011: yattu pūrvapakṣe 'pyatideśa upodbalaka ityuktaṃ sati hi sāmānye 'tideśaḥ pravartata iti tadasmātpakṣe 'gnitvasāmānyenātideśasaṃbhavātpratyuktam
GSP33brssgo3u:5016: yathā prajñāntarāṇi śāṇḍilyavidyāprabhṛtīni svena svenānubadhyamānāni pṛthageva karmabhyaḥ prajñāntarebhyaśca svatantrāṇi bhavantyevamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5018: taduktaṃ prathame kāṇḍe - 'kratvarthāyāmiti cenna varṇatrayasaṃyogāt' (jai.sū. 11.4.7) iti // 50 // @----------------------
GSP33brssgo3u:5020: saṃpadupāstyai manovṛttiṣu kriyāṅgānāṃ yojanamanubandhaḥ śrutyā kriyate tadanyathānupapattyāpyagnīnāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:5022: te agnayaḥ, adhīyanta teṣāmādhānaṃ manasaiva kuryādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5029: kiṃ bahūktyā yatkiñcidyajñe karmārādupakārakaṃ yajñiyaṃ yajñasvarūpotpādakaṃ ca tatsarvaṃ manomayaṃ kuryāditi śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5033: anādarārtho 'tideśo na bhavati kintu vikalpārtha ityata āha-naceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5034: ekasminmādhye nirapekṣasādhanayorvikalpo bhavati yathā vrīhiyavayoratra tu kriyāgnerdhyānāgnīnāṃ sādhyabhedānna vikalpa ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5040: artha iti śeṣaḥ manaścidādīnāṃ svātantraye kriyāprakaraṇādutkarṣaḥ syādityāśaṅkya sa iṣṭa ityāha-dṛṣṭaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5041: ekādaśe cintitaṃ 'rājā svārājyakāmo rājasūyena yajeta'iti prakṛtyāveṣṭirnāma kācidiṣṭirāmnātā-'āgneyo 'ṣṭākapālo hiraṇyaṃ dakṣiṇā',
GSP33brssgo3u:5045: śrūyate-'yadi brāhmaṇo yajeta bārhaspatyaṃ madhye nidhāyāhutimāhutiṃ hutvābhighārayedyadi vaiśyo vaiśvadevaṃ caruṃ madhye nidadhyādyadi rājanyastadaindram'iti
GSP33brssgo3u:5047: tatrāgneyādicaruṣu aṅgānāṃ tantreṇa prayogo bhavati madhyenidhānaliṅgātprayogabhede madhye nidhānāyogādetayānnādyakāmaṃ yājayedityekavacanācca
GSP33brssgo3u:5048: sa ca tantraprayogo rājasūyakratubāhyāyāmannādyakāmavarṇatrayakartṛkāyāmevāveṣṭau jñeyo na tu kratvantargatāyām /
GSP33brssgo3u:5049: nanu kimatra niyāmakaṃ kratvarthāyāmapyaveṣṭau tantraprayogaḥ kiṃ na syāditi cet / na /
GSP33brssgo3u:5050: varṇatrayasaṃyuktānāṃ kāmyāyāmevāṅgatantraikyasādhakasya madhye nadhānādiliṅgasya sattvādato liṅgaikavacanābhyāṃ tantraikye sati hiraṇyādikā militaikaivā dakṣiṇādheyā,
GSP33brssgo3u:5055: atra caikaprayogaliṅgasya kratvartheṣṭāvasaṃbhavaṃ kāmyeṣṭau ca saṃbhavaṃ vadatānena sūtreṇa kāmyeṣṭeḥ kratvartheṣṭivilakṣaṇatvātkratuprakaraṇādutkarṣa iti sūcitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5068: yathā 'sa vā eṣa eva mṛtyurya eṣa etasminmaṇḍale puruṣaḥ' iti 'agnirvai mṛtyuḥ' (bṛ. 3.2.10)
GSP33brssgo3u:5070: yathā ca 'asau vāva loko gautamāgnistasyāditya eva samit' (chā. 5.4.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:5073: kratvarthatvapuruṣārthatvavaiṣamye 'pi mānasatvasāmānyaṃ na virudhyate viṣamayorapi sāmyadarśanādityarthaḥ //51//
GSP33brssgo3u:5076: pareṇa ca śabdasya tādvidhyaṃ bhūyastvāt tv anubandhaḥ / BBs_3,3.52 /
GSP33brssgo3u:5077: parastādapi 'ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo 'gniścittaḥ' ityasminnanantare brāhmaṇe tāvadvadhyaṃ kevalavidyāvidhitvaṃ śabdasya prayojanaṃ lakṣyate na śuddhakarmāṅgavidhitvam
GSP33brssgo3u:5078: tatra hi -' vidyayā tadārohanti yatra kāmāḥ parāgatāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5079: na tatra dakṣīṇā yanti nāvidvāṃsastapasvinaḥ' ityanena ślokena kevalaṃ karmanindanvidhyāṃ ca praśaṃsannidaṃ gamayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:5080: tathā purastādapi yadetanmaṇḍalaṃ tapati ityasminbrāhmaṇe vidyāpradhānatvameva lakṣyate
GSP33brssgo3u:5081: so 'mṛto bhavati mṛtyurhyasyātmā bhavati iti vidyāphalenaivopasaṃhārānna karmapradhānatā
GSP33brssgo3u:5083: bhūyāṃsastvagnyavayavāḥ saṃpādayitavyā vidyāyāmityetasmātkāraṇādagninānubadhyate vidyā na karmāṅgatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5085: kiñca pūrvottarabrāhmaṇayoḥ svatantravidyāvidhānāttanmadhyasthasyāpi brāhmaṇasya svatantravidyāvidhiparatvamityāha-pareṇa ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5086: cite 'gnau lokadṛṣṭividhānaṃ svatantramuttaratra gamyate pūrvatra maṇḍalapuruṣopāstistatsāṃnidhyānmadhye 'pi mānasāgnayaḥ svatantrā ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:5087: tarhi kriyāgninā saha pāṭhaḥ kimarthamityata āha-bhūyāṃsastviti //52//
GSP33brssgo3u:5093: nahyasati dehavyatiriktātmani paralokāścodanā upapajadyerankasya vā brahmātmatvamupadiśyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:5094: nanu śāstrapramukha eva prathame pāde śāstraphalopabhogyasya dehāvyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvamuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5096: iha tu svayameva sūtrakṛtā tadastitvamākṣepapuraḥsaraṃ pratiṣṭhāpitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5097: ita eva cākṛṣyācāryeṇa śabarasvāminā pramāṇalakṣaṇe varṇitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5098: ata eva ca bhagavatopavarṣeṇa prathame tantra ātmāstitvābhidhānaprasaktau śārīrake vakṣyamāḥ ityuddhāraḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5099: iha cedaṃ codanālakṣaṇeṣūpāsaneṣu vicāryamāṇeṣvātmāstitvaṃ vicāryate kṛtsnaśāstraśeṣatvapradarśanāya /
GSP33brssgo3u:5101: varṇitaṃ ko 'sau puruṣo yadarthā ete manaścidādaya ityasyāṃ prasaktāvidaṃ dehavyatiriktasyātmano 'stitvamucyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5103: ākṣepapūrvikā hi parihāroktirvivakṣiter'the sthūṇānikhanananyāyena dṛḍhāṃ buddhimutpādayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:5105: samastavyasteṣu bāhyeṣu pṛthivyādiṣvadṛṣṭamapi caitanyaṃ śarīrākārapariṇateṣu bhūteṣu
GSP33brssgo3u:5106: syāditi saṃbhāvayantastebhyaścaitanyaṃ madaśaktivadvijñānaṃ caitanyaviśiṣṭaḥ kāyaḥ puruṣa iti cāhuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5107: na svargagamanāyāpavargagamanāya vā samartho dehavyatirikta ātmāsti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5109: yaddhi yasminsati bhavatyasati ca na bhavati tattaddharmatvenādhyavasīte yathāgnidharmāvauṣṇyaprakāśau /
GSP33brssgo3u:5111: upalabhyamānā bahiścānupalabhyamānā asiddhe dehavyatirikte dharmiṇi dehadharmā eva bhavitumarhanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5114: manaścidādīnāṃ puruṣārthatvamuktaṃ tadayuktaṃ dehātiriktapuruṣābhāvādityākṣipati-eka ātmanaḥ śarīre bhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5116: pūrvapakṣe tu paralokārthakarmasu mokṣārthavidyāyāṃ cāpravṛttiriti vyatirekamukhena phalamāha-na hyasatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5117: vyatiriktātmavicārasya pūrvatantre kṛtatvātpaunaruktyamityāśaṅkya tatratyavicārasyāpīdameva sūtraṃ mūlaṃ jaiminisūtrābhāvādataḥ kva punaruktirityāha-nanu śāstretyādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:5118: 'yajñāyudhī yajamānaḥ svargaṃ lokameti'ityādivākyasya bhokturabhāvādaprāmāṇyaprāptāvita evākṛṣya bhokturvicāraḥ kṛta ityatra vṛttikāravacanaṃ liṅgamāha-ata eveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5125: dehātirikta ātmāsti na veti vādivipratipatteḥ saṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-atraika iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5126: yadyapi samasteṣu militeṣu bhūteṣu caitanyaṃ na dṛṣṭaṃ taptodakumbhasya jñānābhāvādvyasteṣu
GSP33brssgo3u:5127: tu nāstyeva tathāpi dehātmakabhūteṣu syāditi tebhyo bhūtebhyaścaitanyaṃ saṃbhāvayanto
GSP33brssgo3u:5129: yathā mādakadravyeṣu tāmbūlapatrādiṣu pratyekamadṛṣṭāpi madaśaktistatsaṃghātājjāyate tadvadityārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5130: nanu dehaḥ svayaṃ na cetanaḥ ghaṭavadbhautikatvāt kintu cetanaḥ kaścitsvargādibhoktāsti tatsāṃnidhyāddehasya caitanyavibhrama ityata āha-na svargeti //53//
GSP33brssgo3u:5137: yadi dehabhāve bhāvāddehadharmatvamātmadharmāṇāṃ manyeta tato dehabhāve 'pyabhāvādataddharmatvamevaiṣāṃ kiṃ na manyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:5140: prāṇaceṣṭādayastu satyapi dehe mṛtāvasthāyāṃ na bavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5142: apica sati hi tāvaddehe jīvadavasthāyāmeṣāṃ bhāvaḥ śakyate niścetuṃ natvasatyabhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5145: kimātmakaṃ ca punaridaṃ caitanyaṃ manyate yasya bhūtebhya utpattimicchatīti paraḥ paryanuyoktavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5148: tarhi viṣayatvātteṣāṃ na taddharmatvamaśnuvīta svātmani kriyāvirodhāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5151: nahi bhūtabhautikadharmeṇa satā caitanyena bhūtabhautikāni viṣayīkriyeran /
GSP33brssgo3u:5155: upalabdhisvarūpa eva ca na ātmetyātmano dehavyatiriktatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5159: yattūktaṃ śarīre bhāvāccharīradharma upalabdairiti tadvarṇitena prakāreṇa pratyuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5162: evaṃ sati deha upalabdhirbhavatyasati ca na bhavatīti na dehadharmau bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssgo3u:5164: nacātyantaṃ dehasyopalabdhāvupayogo 'pi dṛśyate niśceṣṭe 'pyasmindehe svapne nānāvidhopalabdhidarśanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5166: manuṣyo 'haṃ jānāmiti dehasya jñātṛtāyāḥ pratyakṣatvādātmadharmatvena prasiddhānāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:5171: tathāca jñānādayo dehavyatiriktāśrayā dehasattve 'pyasattvādvyatirekeṇa deharūpādivadityāha-vyatireka evāsyeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5173: guṇatvasākṣādvyāpyajātyavacchedena asattvasya vivakṣitatvāt dehe 'vasthite sadā rūpatvāvacchinnamastyeva /
GSP33brssgo3u:5174: jñānatvāvacchinnaṃ tu nāstīti na jñānaṃ dehadharmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5176: kiñca dehavyatirike teṣāmabhāvasya saṃdigdhatvānna dehadharmatvaniścaya ityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5182: dehātmakabhūtānāṃ caitanyaṃ prati viṣayatvātkartṛkarmavirodhena viṣayasya kartṛtvā yogānna bhūtakartṛkatvaṃ caitanyasyetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5185: yā dehātiriktā sadrūpopalabdhiḥ sa evātmā cedanityaḥ syādupalabdheranityatvādityata āha-nityatvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5186: ghaṭaḥ sphurati paṭaḥ sphuratīti sarvatra sphūrterabhedānnityatvaṃ viṣayoparāganāśe tu nāśabhrama ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5188: kiñca jāgratsvapnayordehabhede 'pyātmaikatvapratyabhijñānādātmabhede cānyānubhūte 'nyasya smṛtīcchānupapatteḥ svapnasmṛtyādimānātmā dehādbhinna ityāha-ahamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5194: ata eva tanvabhāve 'pi svapnavadyogināṃ bhogaṃ sūtrakṛdvakṣyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:5196: tasmāduktānumānugṛhītānmama śarīramiti bhedānubhāvādahaṃ manuṣya ityabhedajñānaṃ bhrama ityupasaṃharati-tasmāditi //54//
GSP33brssgo3u:5200: aṅgāvabaddhāstu na śākhāsu hi prativedam / BBs_3,3.55 /
GSP33brssgo3u:5206: 'ayaṃ vāva loka eṣo 'gniścitaḥ' ityevamādyā ya udgīthādikarmāṅgāvabaddhāḥ pratyayāḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:5212: iti hi sāmānyavihitānāṃ viśṣākāṅkṣāyāṃ saṃnikṛṣṭenaiva svaśākhāgatena viśeṣaṇākāṅkṣādinivṛtteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5220: svaśākhāvyavasthāyāṃ hyudgīthamupāsīteti sāmnyaśrutiraviśeṣapravṛttā satī saṃnidhānavaśena viśeṣe vyavasthāpyamānā pīḍitā syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5232: nanūdgīthādīnāṃ sarvaśākhāsvekatvādupāstayaḥ sarvatreti vedyaikyānniścaye kathaṃ saṃśaya ityata āha-pratiśākhaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5233: yathā dehātmanorbhedādātmadharmā dehe na saṃbhavanti tathā prativedamudgīthādīnāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:5237: sāmānyaśruteḥ saṃnihitavyaktigrahākhyasaṃkocastatra kartavyo yatra vyaktimātragraho nopapadyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:5238: yathā śuklaṃ gāmānayetyatra gośruteḥ saṃnihitaśuklavyaktiparatayā saṃkocaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:5246: tathāhi mantrāṇāṃ karmaṇāṃ guṇānāṃ ca śākhāntarotpannānāmapi śākhāntara upasaṃgraho dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5247: yeṣāmapi hi śākhināṃ kuṭarurasītyaśmādānamantro nāmnātasteṣāmapyasau viniyogo dṛśyate
GSP33brssgo3u:5248: kukkuṭarasītyaśmādānamantro nāmnātasteṣāmapyasau viniyogo dṛśyate kukkuṭo 'sītyaśmādānamādatte kudarurasīti veti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5249: yeṣāmapi samidādayaḥ prayājaḍā nāmnātasteṣāmapi teṣu guṇavidhirāmnāyate - ṛtavo vai prayājāḥ samānatra hotavyāḥ iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5250: tathā yeṣāmapi ajo 'gnīṣomīyaḥ iti jātiviśeṣopadeśo nāsti teṣāmapi tadviṣayo mantravarṇa upalabhyate - chāgasya vapāyā medaso 'nurbrūhi iti
GSP33brssgo3u:5251: tathā vedāntarotpannānāmapi 'agnerverhetraṃ veradhvaram' ityevamādimantrāṇāṃ vedāntare parigraho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5252: tathābahvṛcapaṭhitasya sūktasya yo jāta eva prathamo manasvān (ṛ.saṃ 2.6.7)
GSP33brssgo3u:5253: ityasya adhvaryave sajanīyaṃ śasyam ityatra parigraho dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5255: pūrvaṃ śākhāntaravihitopāstīnāṃ śākhāntarasthāṅgasaṃbandhe yaḥ pratīto virodhastamaṅgīkṛtya saṃbandha uktaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:5258: yajurvedināṃ kukkuṭo 'sīti mantro 'sti kuṭarurasīti nāsti tathāpi taṇḍulapeṣaṇārthāśmādāne mantradvayasya vikalpena viniyogātso 'pi prāpnotītyarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:5262: phsamānatratulyakarmasthale hotavyā iti pañcatvaguṇavidhānādguṇinaḥ śākhāntaravihitāḥ saṃbadhyanta iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5264: yajurvedināmagnīṣomīyaḥ paśuḥ śruto nāja iti jātiviśeṣastathāpi praiṣamantraliṅgājjātiviśeṣasaṃgraha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5267: tatheti 'sa janāsa indra'ityanenopalakṣitaṃ sūktaṃ sajanīyaṃ tasya yājuṣādhvaryukartṛkaprayoge śaṃsanaṃ dṛṣṭamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5268: yo jāto bāla eva prathamo guṇaiḥ śroṣṭho manasvānvivekavānsa indra evaṃvidho he jānaso janā iti śrutyarthaḥ //56//
GSP33brssgo3u:5272: bhūmnaḥ kratuvajjyāyastvaṃ tathā hi darśayati / BBs_3,3.57 /
GSP33brssgo3u:5274: ityasyāmākhyāyikāyāṃ vyastasya samastasya ca vaiśvānarasyopāsanaṃ śrūyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5275: vyastopāsanaṃ tāvat 'aupamanyava kaṃ tvamātmānamupāḥsa iti devameva bhagavo rājanniti hovācaiṣa vai sutejā ātmā vaiśvānaro yaṃ tvamātmānamupāḥse' (chā. 5.12.1) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:5276: tathā samastopāsanamapi 'tasya ha vā etasyātmano vaiśvānarasyamūrdhaiva sutejāścakṣurviśvarūpa
GSP33brssgo3u:5277: prāṇaḥ pṛthagvartmātmā saṃdeho bahulo bastireva rayiḥ pṛthivyeva pādau' (chā. 5.18.2) ityādi /
GSP33brssgo3u:5278: tatra saṃśayaḥ - kimihobhayathāpyupāsanaṃ syādvyastasya samastasya cota smastasyaiveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5280: pratyavayavaṃ sutejaḥprabhṛtiṣūpāḥsa iti kriyāpadaśravaṇāt 'tasmāttava sutaṃ prasutamāsutaṃ kule dṛśyate' (chā. 5.12.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:5282: tato 'bidhīyate - bhūnnaḥ padārthopacayātmakasya samastasya vaiśvānaropāsanasya jyāyastvaṃ prādhānyamasminvākye vivakṣitaṃ bhavitumarhati na pratyekamavayavopāsanānāmapi /
GSP33brssgo3u:5284: yathā kratuṣu darśapūrṇamāsāprabhṛtiṣu sāmastyena sāṅgapradhānaprayoga evaikovivakṣyate na vyastānāmapi prayogaḥ prayājādīnām /
GSP33brssgo3u:5289: tathāhi - prācīnaśālaprabhṛtaya uddālakāvasānāḥ ṣaḍṛṣayo vaiśvānaravidyāyāṃ pariniṣṭhamapratipadyamānā

GSP33brssgo3u:5653: iti caivañjātīyakā śrutiḥ samastavedārthavijñānavataḥ karmādhikāraṃ darśayati tasmādapi na vijñānasya svātantryeṇa phalahetutvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5657: guroḥ śuśrūṣārūpaṃ karma kurvannatiśeṣeṇāvaśiṣṭena kālena yathāvidhānaṃ vedamadhītyānantaramācāryasya kulādgṛhāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5659: abhisamāvartanaṃ kṛtvā kuṭumbe gārhasthye sthitaḥ pratyahaṃ śucau deśe svādhyāyādhyayanaṃ kurvannanyāṃśca nityādidharmānanutiṣṭhanbrahmalokaṃ prāpnotīti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5661: dṛṣṭer'thāvabodhākhye phale saṃbhavati adhyayanasyādṛṣṭārthatvāyogāditi pūrvatantre sthitam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5662: tataśca brahmāpi vedārtha iti tadavabedhavataḥ karmavidhānamityarthaḥ //6//
GSP33brssgo3u:5667: evaṃ tvayi nānyatheto 'sti na karma lipyate nare' (īśa. 2) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5668: tathā 'etadvai jarāmaryaṃ satraṃ yadagnihotraṃ jarayā vā hyevāsmānmucyate mṛtyunā vā' ityevañjātīyakānniyamādapi karmaśeṣatvameva vidhyayā iti
GSP33brssgo3u:5670: iha dehe karmāṇi kurvanneva śataṃ saṃvatsarāñjīvitumicchedevaṃ karmitvena jīvati tvayi nare karma pāpaṃ na lipyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5683: yadi saṃsāryevātmā śārīraḥ kartā bhoktā ca śarīramātravyatirekeṇa vedānteṣūpadiṣṭaḥ syāttato varṇitena prakāreṇa phalaśruterarthavādatvaṃ syāt
GSP33brssgo3u:5685: naca tadvijñānaṃ karmaṇāṃ pravartakaṃ bhavati pratyuta karmāṇyucchinattīti vakṣyati 'upamardaṃ ca' (bra.sū. 3.4.16) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo3u:5687: iti yanmataṃ bhagavato bādarāyaṇasya tattathaiva tiṣṭhati na śeṣatvaprabhṛtibhirhetvābhāsaiścālayituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5688: tathāhi tamadhikaṃ śārīrādīśvaramātmānaṃ darśayanti śrutayaḥ - 'yaḥ sarvajñaḥ sarvavit' (muṇḍa. 1.19)
GSP33brssgo3u:5694: yattu priyādisaṃsūcitasya saṃsāriṇa evātmano vedyatayānukarṣaṇam 'ātmanastu kāmāya sarvaṃ priyaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:5696: 'yaḥ prāṇena prāṇiti sa ta ātmā sarvāntaraḥ' (bṛ. 3.4.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:5699: iti caivamādi tadapi 'asya mahato bhūtasya niḥśvasitametadyadṛgvedaḥ' (bṛ. 2.4.10)
GSP33brssgo3u:5709: asya mahata iti vākyaśeṣātpriyasaṃsūcita ātmā para eva draṣṭavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5711: tathākṣipuruṣo 'pyavasthāsākṣi parañjyotiriti vākyaśeṣātpara iti vibhāgaḥ jīvānukarṣaṇamabhedābhiprāyamityaṅgīkāre na virodha iti katham,
GSP33brssgo3u:5713: jñānaṃ karmāṅgamaphalatve sati karmaśeṣāśrayatvādityukto heturasiddha iti bhāvaḥ //8//
GSP33brssgo3u:5719: tathāhi śrutirbhavati - 'etadvā sma vai tadvidvāṃsa āhurṛṣayaḥ kāvaṣeyāḥ kimarthā vayamadhyeṣyāmahe kimarthāvayaṃ yakṣyāmahe /
GSP33brssgo3u:5720: etaddha sma vai tatpūrve vidvāṃso 'gnihotraṃ na juhavāñcakrire' 'etaṃ vai tamātmānaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:5721: viditvā brāhmaṇāḥ putraiṣaṇāyāśca vittaiṣaṇayāśca lokaiṣaṇāyāśca vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:5724: yājñavalkyādīnāmapi brahmavidāmarmaniṣṭhatvaṃ dṛśyate - 'etāvadare khalvamṛtatvamiti hoktvā yājñavalkyo vijahāra' (bṛ. 4.5.15)
GSP33brssgo3u:5738: brahmavidāṃ karmavatsaṃnyāsasyāpi darśanātteṣāṃ karmadarśanātmakaṃ liṅgaṃ lokasaṃgrahārthatvenānyathāsiddhamityāha-tulyaṃ tviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5739: kiñca yasya karma sa na brahmavidityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5741: brahmavidāṃ lokasaṃgrahārthaṃ kriyamāṇamapi karma na bhavati abhimānābhāvenānadhikāritvāditi bhāvaḥ // 9 // //10//
GSP33brssgo3u:5749: yathā śatamābhyāṃ dīyatāmityukte vibhajya dīyate pañcāśadekasmai pañcāśadaparasmai tadvat /
GSP33brssgo3u:5754: tatra saṃsāriviṣaye vidyā vihitā pratiṣiddhā ca parigṛhyate viśeṣābhāvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:5757: samanvārambhavacanasya mumukṣuviṣayatvamaṅgīkṛtya vidyā anyaṃ mumukṣuṃ muktatvenānvārabhata iti vibhāga uktaḥ sūtrakṛtāḥ vastutastu tannāstītyāha-nacedaṃ samanvārambhavacanamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5758: tatra saṃsāriviṣaye taṃ vidyetyādivākye yathāprāptānuvādini vidyādipadārthamāha-tatreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5769: na vayamadhyayanaprabhavaṃ karmāvabodhanamadhikārakāraṇaṃ vārayāmaḥ kiṃ tarhyeniṣadamātmajñānaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:5770: svātantryeṇaiva prayojanavatpratīyamānaṃ na karmādhikārakāraṇatāṃ pratipadyata ityetāvatpratipādayāmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5771: yathāca na kratvantarajñānaṃ kratvantarādhikāreṇāpekṣyata evametadapi draṣṭavyamiti // 12 //
GSP33brssgo3u:5776: ityelamādiṣu niyamaśravaṇeṣu na viduṣa iti viśeṣo 'sti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5780: mātrapadamātmajñānasya vyāvartakaṃ na karmajñānasyetyāha-naiṣa doṣa iti // 12 // //13//
GSP33brssgo3u:5785: ityatrāparo viśeṣa ākhyāyate yadyapyatra prakaraṇasāmarthyādvidvāneva kurvanniti saṃbadhyate tathāpi vidyāstutaye karmānujñānametaddraṣṭavyam
GSP33brssgo3u:5789: yāvajjīvaṃ karma kurvatyapi viduṣi puruṣe hi vakṣyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:5791: yāvajjīvaṃ karma kurvatyapi viduṣupuruṣe na karma lepāya bhavati vidyāsāmarthyāditi tadevaṃ vidyā stūyate // 14 //
GSP33brssgo3u:5793: evaṃ karma kurvityapi tvayi nare neto vidyālabdhādbrahmabhāvādanyathāsti karmaṇā saṃsāro nāstīti yāvat /
GSP33brssgo3u:5799: apicaike vidvāṃsaḥ pratyakṣīkṛtavidyāphalāḥ santastadavaṣṭabhyātphalāntarasādhaneṣu prajādiṣu prayojanābhāvaṃ parāmṛśanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5800: kāmakāreṇeti śrutirbhavati vājasaneyinām 'etaddha sma vai tatpūrve vidvāṃsaḥ prajāṃ na kāmayante kiṃ prajayā kariṣyāmo yeṣāṃ no 'yamātmāyaṃ lokaḥ' (bṛ. 4.4.22)
GSP33brssgo3u:5802: ato 'pi na vidyāyāḥ karmaśeṣatvaṃ nāpi tadviṣayāyāḥ phalaśruterayathārthatvaṃ śakyamāśrayitum // 15 //
GSP33brssgo3u:5804: tadetadbrahma yeṣāṃ no 'smākaṃ ayamaparokṣa ātmā ayameva lokaḥ puruṣārthaste vayaṃ kiṃ prajādinā kariṣyāma ityālocya karma tyaktavanta ityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:5805: nanvayaṃ loka iti jñānaphalasya pratyakṣatvoktirayuktā karmaphalavadadṛṣṭatvādityata āha-anubhaveti //15//
GSP33brssgo3u:5812: vedāntoditātmajñānapūrvikāṃ tu karmādhikārasiddhiṃ pratyāśāsanasya karmādhikārocchittireva prasajyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:5814: na kevalamanupayogājjñānasya karmānaṅgatvaṃ kintu karmanāśakatvāccetyāha-upamardaṃ ceti //16//
GSP33brssgo3u:5823: ūrdhvaretasa āśramā na śrūyante veda iti tadapi nāsti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5833: trayo dharmaskandhāḥ karmapradhānā āśramāścaturtho brahmasaṃstha ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5834: 'brahmacaryeṇa ṛṣibhyo yajñena devebhyaḥ prajayā pitṛbhya eva vā anṛṇaḥ'iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5836: anapākṛtya mokṣaṃ tu sevamāno vrajatyadhaḥ'iti smṛteśca prāptagārhasthyasyaiva nirastarṇatrayasya pārivrājyamityapi śaṅkā na kāryā /
GSP33brssgo3u:5844: ityādayo ye śabdā ūrdhvaretasāmāśramāṇāṃ sadbhāvāyodāhṛtā na te tatpratipādanāya prabhavanti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5845: yataḥ parāmarśameṣu śabdeṣvāśramāntarāṇāṃ jaiminirācāryo manyate na vidim /
GSP33brssgo3u:5848: trayo dharmaskandhā ityatra tāvadyajño 'dhyayanaṃ dānamiti prathamastapa eva dvitīyo
GSP33brssgo3u:5857: nanu gārhasthyamapi sahaivordhvaretobhiḥ parāmṛṣṭaṃ yajño 'dhyayanaṃ dānamiti prathama iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5858: satyamevaṃ tathāpi tu gṛhasthaṃ pratyevāgnihotrādīnāṃ karmaṇāṃ vidhānācchrutiprasiddhameva hi tadastitvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5860: apicāpavadati hi pratyakṣā śrutirāśramāntar 'vīrahā vā eṣa devānāṃ yo 'gnimudvāsayate',
GSP33brssgo3u:5870: nanu brahmacaryādeva pravrajeditivispaṣṭamidaṃ pratyakṣaṃ privrājyavidhānaṃ jābālānām /
GSP33brssgo3u:5872: anapekṣya tvetāṃ śrutimayaṃ vicāra iti draṣṭavyam // 18 //
GSP33brssgo3u:5874: ūrdhvaretaḥ śabditaṃ pārivrājyamanuṣṭheyaṃ na veti mānabhrāntimūlatvābhyāṃ saṃdehe bhrāntimūlatvānnānuṣṭheyamityāha-traya iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5879: yastu vedasya grahaṇāntaṃ brahmacaryaṃ carati sa brāhmaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5883: gṛhastho 'pi caturvidhaḥ vārtāko yāyāvaraḥ śālīno ghorasaṃnyasikaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5887: uddhṛtaparipūtābhiradbhiḥ kāryaṃ kurvanpratyahaṃ kṛtoñchavṛttirgrāmavāsī ghorasaṃnyasika ityucyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:5889: vānaprastho 'pi caturvidhaḥ vaikhānasa audumbaro vālakhilyaḥ phenapaśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5891: yastu prātaruthāya yāṃ diśaṃ paśyati tatratyaudumbarabadarīnīvāraśyāmākaiḥ karmaparaḥ sa audumbaraḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5892: yastu jaṭāvalkaladhārī aṣṭau prātasānvṛttyupārjanaṃ kṛtvā cāturmāsye saṃgṛhītāśī kārtikyāṃ saṃgṛhītapuṣpaphalatyāgī sa vālakhilyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5893: phenapāstu śīrṇaparṇaphalavṛttayo yatra kvacidvasantaḥ karmaparā iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5894: tathā parivrājākāścaturvidhāḥ kuṭīcakā bahūdakā haṃsāḥ paramahaṃsāśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5896: bahūdakāstu tridaṇḍinaḥ śikyajalapavitrapādukāsanaśikhāyajñopavītakaupīnakāṣāyaveṣadhārāstīrthānyaṭanto bhaikṣaṃ caranta ātmānaṃ prārthayante
GSP33brssgo3u:5897: haṃsāstu ekadaṇḍinaḥ śikhāvarjaṃ yajñopavītadharāḥ śikyakamaṇḍalupāṇayaḥ grāmaikarātravāsinaḥ kṛcchracāndrāyaṇaparāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5898: paramahaṃsāstvekadaṇḍadharā muṇḍā ayajñopavītinaḥ tyaktasarvakarmāṇa ātmaniṣṭhā iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5899: atra pūrvapakṣe saṃnyāsābhāvāñjñānasya svatantraphalatvāsiddhiḥ siddhānte tadbhāvāttatsiddhiriti phalabhedaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5900: skandhā āśramāḥ ātmānaṃ śarīramācāryasya kule gṛhe karśayannaiṣṭhika ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5901: skandhaśrutāvāśramā na vidhīyante kintu brahmasaṃsthatāsturthamanūdyanta ityukte śaṅkate-nanu parāmarśe 'pīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5903: pratyakṣā skandhaśrutireva purovādo 'stu nānuvāda ityata āha-smṛtīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5906: asyā anuvādatve tu mūlatvena sāgnikānagnikāśramaśrutistatra vidhiśceti dvayakalpanāgauravādityata āha-ataśceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5917: ātmaloko mahīyān yadarthamaśakyāṃ pravrajyāmapi kurvantīti stutirvartamānāpadeśādityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5924: agnihotrādīnāṃ cāvaśyānuṣṭhoyatvāttadvirodhādanadhikṛtānuṣṭheyamāśramāntaramitihīmāṃ matiṃ nirākaroti gārhasthyavadevāśramāntaramapyanicchatā pratipattavyamiti manyamānaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:5928: yathāca śāstrāntaraprāptayoreva nivītaprācīnavītayoḥ parāmarśa upavītavidhipare vākye /
GSP33brssgo3u:5940: naca yajñādayo bhūyāṃso dharmā utpattibhinnāḥ santo 'nyatrāśramasaṃbandhātritve 'ntarbhāvayituṃ śakyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:5941: tatra yajñādiliṅgo gṛhāśrama eko dharmaskandho nirdiṣṭo brahmacārīti ca spaṣṭa āśramanirdeśastapaityapi ko 'nyastapaḥpradhānādāśramāddharmaskandho 'bhyupagamyeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:5947: nivītaṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ prācīnāvītaṃ pitṛṇāmupavītaṃ devānāmiti vākye daive karmaṇyupavītaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5949: mānuṣakriyāsu dehārdhavastrabandhanākhyanivītasya saukaryārtatayā prāptatvāt pitrye karmaṇi prācīnāvītasyāpi vidhyantaraprāptatvādityarthaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:5963: nanu vidhitvābhyupagama ekavākyatāpratītiruparudhyeta pratīyate cātraikavākyatā puṇyalokaphalāstrayo dharmaskandhā brahmasaṃsthātā tvamṛtatvaphaleti
GSP33brssgo3u:5969: yathā 'adhastatsamidhaṃ dhārayannanudravedupari hi devebhyo dhārayati' ityatra satyāmapyavirodhodhāraṇainaikavākyatāpratītau vidhīyata evoparidhāraṇamapūrvatvāt
GSP33brssgo3u:5972: yadāpi parāmarśa evāyamāśramāntarāṇāṃ tadapi brahmasaṃsthatā tāvatsaṃstavasāmarthyādavaśyaṃ vidheyābhyupagantavyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:5973: sā ca kiṃ caturṣvāśrameṣu yasya kasyacidāhosvitparivrājakasyaiveti vivektavyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5974: yadi ca brahmācāryanteṣvāśrameṣu parāmṛśyamāneṣu parivrājako 'pi parāmṛṣṭastaścaturṇāmapyāśramāṇāṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:5976: atha na parāmṛṣṭastataḥ pariśiṣyamāṇaḥ parivrāḍeva brahmasaṃstha iti saṃtsyati /
GSP33brssgo3u:5979: nahi satyāṃ gatau vānaprasthaviśeṣaṇena parivrājako grahaṇamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5980: yathātra brahmacārigṛhamedhināvasādāraṇenaiva svena svena viśeṣaṇena viśeṣitāvevaṃ bhikṣuvaikhānasāvapīti yuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5984: catuṣṭhvena ca prasiddhā āśramāstritvena parāmṛśyanta ityanyāyyam /
GSP33brssgo3u:5985: apica bhedavyapadeśo 'tra bhavati 'traya ete puṇyalokabhāja eko 'mṛtatvabhāk' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5988: bhavati tvevaṃ devadattayajñadattau mandaprajñau viṣṇumitrastu mahāprajña iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:5989: tasmātpūrvo traya āśramiṇaḥ puṇyalokabhājaḥ pariśiṣyamāṇaḥ parivrāḍevāmṛtatvabhāk /
GSP33brssgo3u:5990: kathaṃ punarbrahmasaṃsthaśabdo yogātpravartamānaḥ sarvatra saṃbhavanparivrājaka evāvatiṣṭheta /
GSP33brssgo3u:5992: atrocyate - brahmasaṃstha iti hi brahmaṇi parisamptirananyavyāpāratārūpaṃ tanniṣṭhatvamabhidhīyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:5996: śamadamādistu tadīyo dharmo brahmasaṃsthatāyā upodbalako na virodhī /
GSP33brssgo3u:5997: brahmaniṣṭhatvameva hi tasya śamadamādyupabṛṃhitaṃ svāśramavihitaṃ karma yajñādīni
GSP33brssgo3u:5998: cetareṣāṃ tadvyatikrame ca tasya pratyavāyaḥ tathāca 'nyāsa iti brahmā brahmā hi
GSP33brssgo3u:5999: paraḥ paro hi brahma tāni vā etānyavarāṇi tapāṃsi nyāsa evātyarecayat' (nārā. 78)
GSP33brssgo3u:6008: 'brahmacaryaṃ parisampya gṛhī bhavedgṛhī bhūtvā vanībhavedvanī bhūtvā pravrajet /
GSP33brssgo3u:6009: yadi vetarathā brahmacaryādeva brahmacaryādeva pravrajedgṛhādvā vanādvā' (jābā. 4) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6012: pṛthagnidhānāccānadhikṛtānāma 'atha punareva vratī vāvratī vā snātako vāsnātako votsannāgniranagniko vā' (jābā. 4) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6014: tacca darśayati - 'atha parivrāḍvivarṇavāsā muṇḍo 'parigrahaḥ śuciradrohī bhaikṣāṇo brahmabhūyāya bhavati' (jābā. 5) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6018: idānīṃ vidhitvaṃ tasyā eva kalpyaṃ lāghavādityāha-vidhirveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6025: mahāpitṛyajñe pretāgnihotre ca sruci prakṣiptaṃ havirāhavanīyaṃ prati yadā nīyate
GSP33brssgo3u:6027: hītyasyaikavākyatvabhāne 'pi daive home srugdaṇḍopari samiddhāraṇe vidhirevāpūrvatvāditi
GSP33brssgo3u:6029: evaṃ catvāra āśramā vidhīyanta iti pakṣa uktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6032: nanu traya iti vākya āśramacatuṣṭayasyāprāpternirbījo 'yaṃ vicāra ityāśaṅkya tadvākye parivrājakaḥ parāmṛṣṭo na veti saṃdihyādye pūrvapakṣaprāptimāha-yadiceti
GSP33brssgo3u:6033: nanvanāśramyeva brahmasaṃsthaḥ kiṃ na syādata āha-anāśramitveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6037: vanasthasya hyasādhāraṇaṃ kṛcchrādikaṃ tapa iti prasiddham /
GSP33brssgo3u:6040: sa ca stutisāmarthyāt saha brahmasaṃsthayā vidhīyata iti siddhāntayati-tadayuktamityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6041: pṛthagvyapadeśācca brahmasaṃsthaḥ pūrvoktebhya āśramibhyaḥ pṛthagbhūta ityāha-apiceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6043: kālabhedenāpi sati mandaprajñatve prajñādhikyavatsati karmitve teṣāṃ vikṣiptacetasāṃ brahmasaṃsthānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6044: karmatyāge ca parivrāḍeva brahmasaṃstha ityasmadiṣṭasiddhiriti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6046: yadyapi brahmasaṃsthaśabdaḥ saṃnyāsāśrame na rūḍhastathāpi yogāttamevopasthāpayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6049: nyāsaḥ saṃnyāso brahmeti stutau hetumāha-brahmā hīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6050: hiraṇyagarbho hi para iti prasiddhaḥ ato brahmatvena stutaḥ saṃnyāsaḥ para eveti stutvā karmāṇi nindati tānīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6051: tato nyāsa eva jñānadvārā mocakatvādadhika ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6052: tadbuddhaye brahmacittāstadātmāno brahmasvarūpāstanniṣṭhāḥ śravaṇādiparāstatparāyaṇāḥ brahmaprepsavaḥ niṣkāmā iti yāvat /

GSP33brssgo3u:6339: prāṇavidyāvidhisaṃnidheraśakyatvācca stutireva na vidhiḥ kalpyaḥ niṣedhaśāstravirodhāt kḷpto hi vidhiḥ sāmānyaśāstrabādhako natu kalpya iti bhāvaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:6354: lipyate na sa pāpena padmapatramivāmbhasā' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6359: surāpānenāpi jīvanamāśaṅkya kadāpi tanna kāryamityāha-tathā madyaṃ nityaṃ brahmaṇa iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6367: śabdaścānannasya pratiṣedhakaḥ kāmakāranivṛttiprayojanaḥ kāṭhakānāṃ saṃhitāyāṃ śrūyate - 'tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ surāṃ na pibet' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6372: kāmakāro yatheṣṭapravṛttiḥ so 'pi niṣedho 'pi upapannataro bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6374: yadyayamapi vidhiḥ syāttarhi vihitapratiṣiddhatvātṣoḍaśigrahaṇāgrahaṇavatsurāpāne vikalpaḥ syātsa ca sarvasmṛtibhiḥ śiṣṭācāreṇa ca viruddha iti tātparyārthaḥ //31//
GSP33brssgo3u:6381: idānīṃ tu kimamumukṣorapyaśramamātraniṣṭhasya vidyāmakāmamayamānasya tānyanuṣṭheyānyutāho neti cintyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6383: ityādināśramakarmaṇāṃ vidyāsādhanatvena vihitatvādvidyāmanicchataḥ phalāntaraṃ kāmayamānasya nityanyananuṣṭheyāni /
GSP33brssgo3u:6384: atha tasyāpyanuṣṭheyāni na tarhyeṣāṃ vidyāsādhanatvaṃ nityānityasaṃyogavirodhāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6385: asyāṃ prāptau paṭhati - 'āśramamātraniṣṭhasyāpyamumukṣoḥ kartavyanyeva nityāni karmāṇi yāvajjīvamagnihotraṃ juhoti' ityādinā vihitatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6392: tasyā anityatvādyāvajjīvādividhinā tu nityatvaṃ ceti viruddhadharmadvayāpātādvividiṣāśruteḥ stutitvamiti phalaṃ pūrvapakṣe /
GSP33brssgo3u:6396: atha yaduktaṃ naivaṃ sati vidyāsādhanatveṣāṃ syādityata uttaraṃ paṭhati -
GSP33brssgo3u:6398: vidyāsahakārīṇi caitāni syurvihitatvādeva 'tametaṃ vedānuvacanena brāhmaṇā vividiṣanti' (bṛ. 4.4.22) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6403: vidhilakṣaṇaṃ hi sādhanaṃ darśapūrṇamāsādi svargaphalasiṣādhayiṣayā sahakārisādhanāntaramapekṣate naivaṃ vidyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6408: nitye hyekaḥ saṃyogo yāvajjīvādivākyakalpito na tasya vidyāphalatvam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6411: yathaikasyāpi khādiratvasya nityena saṃyogena kratvarthatvamanityena saṃyogena puruṣārthatvaṃ tadvat // 33 //
GSP33brssgo3u:6412: saha militvā śuddhidvārā vidyāṃ kurvantīti sahakārīṇi karmāṇi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6416: ato vihitāni karmāṇi avihitāyā na sahakāryaṅgāni mokṣasyāsādhyatvācca na karmāṇāṃ sahakāritvasaṃbhava ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6418: kāmanāyā anityatve 'pi karmaṇāṃ nānityatvaṃ nityavidhinā prayogasya nityatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6421: yathā 'khādiro yūpo bhavati'iti śrutyā khādiratvasya kratvarthatā khādiraṃ vīryakāmasyeti śrutyā puruṣārthatā ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6422: ataḥ sati vākyadvaye viniyuktaviniyogo na virudhyata ityarthaḥ //33//
GSP33brssgo3u:6426: sarvathāpyāśramakarmapakṣe vidyāsahakāritvapakṣe ca ta evāgnihotrādayo dharmā anuṣṭoyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6429: yathā kuṇḍapāyināmayane 'māsamagnihotraṃ jihoti' ityatra nityādagnihotrātkarmāntaramupadiśyate naivamiha karmabhedo 'stītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6433: iti siddhavadutpannarūpāṇyeva yajñādīni vividiṣāyāṃ viniyuṅ kte natu juhvatītyādivadapūrvameṣāṃ rūpamutpādayatīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6434: smṛtiliṅgamapi 'anāśritaḥ karmaphalaṃ kāryaṃ karma karoti yaḥ' (6.1)
GSP33brssgo3u:6436: yasyaite 'ṣṭācatvāriṃśatsaṃskārā ityādyā ca saṃskāratvaprasiddhirvaidikeṣu karmasu tatsaṃskṛtasya vidyotpattimabhipretya smṛtau bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6438: nanu nityāgnihotrādibhyo bhinnā evāpūyarvajñādayo vividiṣāyāṃ viniyujyantāṃ tatra kuto viniyuktaviniyogastatrāha-sarvathāpīti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6444: siddhakarmasu saṃskāratvaprasiddhirapi śuddhākhyasaṃskāradvārā jñānārthakakarmābhede liṅgamityāha-yasyaita iti //34//
GSP33brssgo3u:6449: rāgadibhiḥ kleśaiḥ 'eṣa hyātmā na naśyati yaṃ brahmacaryeṇānuvindate' (chā. 8.5.3) ityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6450: tasmādyajñādīnyāśramakarmāṇi ca bhavanti vidyāsahakārīṇi ceti niścitam // 35 //
GSP33brssgo3u:6456: vidhurādīnāṃ dravyādisaṃpadrahitānāṃ cānyatamāśramapratipattihīnānāmantarālavartināṃ kiṃ vidyāyāmadhikāro 'sti kiṃvā nāstīti saṃśaye nāstīti tāvatprāptam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6458: evaṃ prāpta idamāha - antarā cāpi tvanāśramitvena vartamāno 'pi vidyāyāmadhikriyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6464: anāśramiṇāṃ japādikarmasattvānninditatvācca saṃśaye sati āśramakarmaṇāmeva vidyāhetutvaśruteranāśramasya ninditatvāccānadhikāra iti pūrvapakṣaḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:6469: nanu liṅgamidaṃ śrutismṛtidarśanamipanyastaṃ kā nu khalu prāptiriti sābhidhīyate -
GSP33brssgo3u:6472: tathāca smṛtiḥ - 'japyenaiva tu saṃsiddhyedbrāhmaṇo nātra saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6473: kuryādantra vā kuryānmantro brāhmaṇa ucyate' ityasaṃbhavadāśramakarmāṇo 'pi japye 'dhikāraṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6479: raikvādīnāṃ vidyāvattvaliṅgasya janmāntarāśramakarmaṇānyathāsiddheranāśramakarmaṇo vidyārthatvaprāpakaṃ mānāntaraṃ vācyamiti śaṅkate-nanu liṅgamiti
GSP33brssgo3u:6482: nanvanāśramiṇāṃ karma bhavatu vidyāhetustathāpi teṣāṃ na śravaṇādāvadhikāraḥ saṃnyāsābhāvādityata āha-dṛṣṭārthā ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6484: saṃnyāso 'pi kadācitkṛto jñāna upakaroti śravaṇaṃ pratyanaṅgatvāditi bhāvaḥ //38//

GSP33brssgo3u:6499: tadbhūtasya tu nātadbhāvo jaiminer api niyamāt tadrūpābhāvebhyaḥ / BBs_3,4.40 /

GSP33brssgo3u:6502: pūrvakarmasvanuṣṭhānacikīrṣayā vā rāgādivaśena vā pracyuto 'pi syādviśeṣābhāvāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6503: evaṃ prāpta ucyate - tadbhūtasya tu pratipannordhvaretobhāvasya na kathañcidapyatadbhāvo na tataḥ pracyutiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6506: iti 'araṇyamiyāditi padaṃ tato na punareyādityupaniṣat' iti 'ācāryeṇābhyanujñātaścaturṇāmekamāśramam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6507: ā vimokṣāccharīrasya so 'nutiṣṭhedyathāvidi' iti caivañjātīyake niyamaḥ pracyutyaprabhāvaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6512: yattu pūrvakarmasvanuṣṭhānacikīrṣayā pratyavarohaṇamiti tadasat 'śreyānsvadharmo viguṇaḥ paradharmātsvanuṣṭhitāt' (3.35)
GSP33brssgo3u:6515: yo hi yaṃ prati vidhīyate sa tasya dharmo natu yo yena svanuṣṭhātuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6521: uttamāśramātpūrvāśramaṃ prāptasya pracyutasya karmāpi vidyāheturanāśramikarmavaditi saṃgatiḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:6523: siddhānte tu bhraṣṭasya karma na heturiti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6524: rāgādiprābalyātpracyutiniṣedhācca pracyutiḥ prāmāṇikī na veti saṃśayamāhaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6528: tadiyādgacchediti padaṃ śāstramārgastatastasmātpārivrājyānna punareyānna pracyavediti uniṣadrahasyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6531: 'caṇḍālāḥ pratyavasitāḥ'iti smṛteśca patitānāṃ karma niṣphalamiti bhāvaḥ //40//
GSP33brssgo3u:6535: na cādhikārikam api patanānumānāt tadayogāt / BBs_3,4.41 /
GSP33brssgo3u:6536: yadi naiṣṭhiko brahmacārī pramādādavakīryeta kiṃ tasya 'brahmacaryāvakīrṇī nairṛtaṃ gardabhamālabhet' ityetatprāyaścittaṃ syāduta neti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6540: kiṃ kāraṇam - 'ārūḍho naiṣṭhikaṃ dharmaṃ yastu pracyavate pinaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6541: prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmi yena śuddhyetsa ātmahā' ityapratisamādheyapatanasmaraṇācchinnaśirasa iva pratikriyānupapatteḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6546: atra pracyutasya prāyaścittaṃ syānnaveti upapātakatvātpatanasmṛteśca saṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6547: pracyutasya yajñādikaṃ niṣphalamityuktaṃ tadvatprāyaścittamāpi niṣphalamiti pūrvapakṣayati-netyucyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6548: atra kṛtaprāyaścittasya karma jñānaheturna bhavatīti phalaṃ siddhānte tu bhavatītidaḥ /

GSP33brssgo3u:6552: nirṇītaṃ prāyaścittamādhikārikaṃ tadupakurvāṇasyaiva na naiṣṭhikasyeti prāpte siddhāntayati //41 //
GSP33brssgo3u:6555: upapūrvam api tv eke bhāvamaśanavat tad uktam / BBs_3,4.42 /
GSP33brssgo3u:6557: yannaiṣṭhikasya gurudārādibhyo 'nyatra brahmacaryaṃ viśīryeta na tanmahāpātakaṃ bhavati gurutalpādiṣu mahāpātakeṣvaparigaṇanāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6561: ye hi prāyaścittasyābhāvamicchanti teṣāṃ na mūlamupalabhyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6562: ye tu bhāvamicchanti teṣāṃ brahmacāryavakīrṇetyadaviśeṣaśravaṇaṃ mūlam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6567: evaṃ bhikṣuvaikhānasayorapi vānaprastho dīkṣābhede kṛcchraṃ dvādaśarātraṃ caritvā
GSP33brssgo3u:6572: 'prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmi'iti darśanābhāvasmṛteḥ prāyaścittābhāvāparatvaṃ kalpayitvā tanmūlaśrutikalpanātprāgeva kḷptasādhāraṇaśrutyā prāyaścittasadbhāvasiddheḥ
GSP33brssgo3u:6574: prāyaścittasya bhāvābhāvasiddhyoḥ samatve 'pi bhāvaprasiddhiḥ śrutimūlatvādādartavyetyatra saṃmatimāha-taduktamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6576: ataḥ kasya caruḥ kārya iti saṃdehe vṛddhaprayogasāmyātsamā tulyā vikalpena pratipattiḥ syāditi prāpte siddhāntaḥ-śāstramūlā pratipattirgrāhyā śāstranimittatvāddharmādijñānasya /
GSP33brssgo3u:6580: brahmacaryarakṣārthaṃ yatnādhikyaṃ kāryamiti jñāpanārthaṃ prāyaścittaṃ spaṣṭamapi na paśyāmītyuktaṃ bhagavadatriṇetyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6582: kṛcchraṃ prājāpatyaṃ mahākakṣaṃ bahutṛṇakāṣṭhadeśaṃ jaladānādinā vardhayeta /
GSP33brssgo3u:6597: bahis tūbhayathāpi smṛter ācārāc ca / BBs_3,4.43 /
GSP33brssgo3u:6598: yadūrdhvaretasāṃ svaśramebhyaḥ pracyavanaṃ mahāpātakaṃ yadi vopapātakamubhayathāpi śiṣṭhaiste bahirkartavyāḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6600: prāyaścittaṃ na paśyāmi yena śudhyetsa ātmahā' iti 'ārūḍhapatitaṃ vipraṃ maṇḍalācca viniḥsṛtam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6601: udbaddhaṃ kṛmidaṣṭaṃ ca spṛṣṭvā cāndrāyaṇaṃ caret' iti caivamādinindātiśayasmṛtibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6605: kṛtaprāyaścittaistaiḥ saha kṛtaśravaṇādikaṃ jñānasādhanaṃ na veti saṃdehe teṣāṃ śuddhatvātsādhanamiti

GSP33brssgo3u:6630: apyupāstayo yajamānagāmisvatantraphalāḥ kimu vācyaṃ svaniṣṭhabrahmavidyāyāḥ svātantryamiti
GSP33brssgo3u:6632: ataḥ pādasaṃgatiḥ hiṅkāraprastāvodgīthapratihāranidhanākhyapañcaprakāre sāmni vṛṣṭidhyāturvarṣasamṛddhiḥ phalamiti śrutyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6633: śrutaṃ phalaṃ ṛtviggataṃ kiṃ na syādityata āha-tacceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6635: astu tasya phalaṃ tadgataṃ kartātvanyaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-phalaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6642: ārtvijyam ity auḍulomiḥ tasmai hi parikrīyate / BBs_3,4.45 /
GSP33brssgo3u:6649: tathāca 'taṃ ha bako dālbhyo vidāñcakāra sa ha naimiśīyānāmudgātā babhūva (chā. 1.2.13)
GSP33brssgo3u:6655: yāṃ vai kāñcana yajña ṛtvija āśiṣamāśāsata iti yajamānāyaiva tāmāśāsata iti hovāceti tasmādu haivaṃvidudgātā brūyātkaṃ te kāmamāgāyāni (chā. 1.7.8 - 9) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6659: tamudgīthākhyaṃ praṇavaṃ prāṇadṛṣṭyā dhyātavāndhyātvā ca naimiśīyānāṃ satriṇāmudgātāsīdityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6660: yajamānena svagāmiphalakasāṅgaprayogakaraṇāyartvijāṃ krītatvātkartṛtve 'pi na tatphalabhāktvamutsargasya bādhakābhāvādityuktatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6661: krayaṇadvārā kartṛtvabhoktṛtvasāmānādhikaraṇyaṃ copapadyate bhṛtyakartṛke yuddhe rājā yudhyate jayati cetivaditi bhāvaḥ // 45 // //46//
GSP33brssgo3u:6665: sahakāryantaravidhiḥ pakṣeṇa tṛtīyaṃ tadvato vidhyādivat / BBs_3,4.47 /
GSP33brssgo3u:6666: 'tasmādbrahmaṇaḥ pāṇḍityaṃ nirvidya bālyena tiṣṭhāsedbālyaṃ ca pāṇḍityaṃ ca nirvidyātha muniramaunaṃ ca monaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇaḥ' (bṛ.
GSP33brssgo3u:6668: tatra saṃśayaḥ maunaṃ vidīyate na veti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6671: nahyatha munirityatra vidāyakā vibhaktirupalabhyate tasmādayamanuvādo yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6674: apicāmaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyātha brāhmaṇa ityatra tāvanna brāhmaṇatvaṃ vidhīyate prāgeva prāptatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6675: tasmādatha brāhmaṇa iti praśaṃsāvadastathaivātha munirityapi bhavitumarhati samānanirdeṣatvāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6684: nanu muniśabda uttamāśramavacano 'pi śrūyate 'gārhasthyamācāryakulaṃ maunaṃ vānaprastham' ityatra / na /
GSP33brssgo3u:6686: itarāśramasaṃnidhānāttu pāriśeṣyāttatrottamāśramopādānaṃ jñānapradhānatvādutmāśramasyaṣa tasmādbālyapāṇḍityāpekṣayā tṛtīyamidaṃ maunaṃ jñānātiśayarūpaṃ vidīyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6687: yattu bālya eva vidheḥ paryavasānamiti tathāpyapūrvatvānmunitvasya vidheyatvāmāśrīyate muniḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6691: tadadhikārāt 'ātmānaṃ viditvā putrādyeṣaṇābhyo vyutthāyātha bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6692: nanu sati vidyāvattve prāpnotyeva tatrātiśayaḥ kiṃ monavidhinetyata āha - pakṣeṇeti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6696: yathā - 'darśapūrṇamāsābhyāṃ svargakāmo yajeta' ityevañjātīyake vidhyādau sahakāritvenāgnyanbādhānādikamaṅgajātaṃ vidhīyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6699: yasmātpūrve brāhmaṇā ātmānaṃ viditvā saṃnyasya bhikṣācaryaṃ caranti tasmādadyatano
GSP33brssgo3u:6700: 'pi brāhmaṇa āpātajñānarūpapaṇḍāvānpaṇḍitastasya kṛtyaṃ pāṇḍityaṃ śravaṇaṃ tannirvidya
GSP33brssgo3u:6701: niścayena labdhvā bālyena śravaṇajajñānasya balabhāvena mananenāsaṃbhāvanānirāsena
GSP33brssgo3u:6702: bālasya bhāvena vā śuddhacittatvena sthātumicchedevaṃ mananaśravaṇe kṛtvādānantaraṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:6703: munirnididhyāsanakṛtsyādevamamaunaṃ ca maunādanyadbālyapāṇḍityadvayaṃ maunaṃ ca nididhyāsanaṃ
GSP33brssgo3u:6704: labdhvā atha jñānasāmagrīpauṣkalyānantaraṃ brahmāhamiti sākṣātkāravān brāhmaṇo bhavatītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6705: maunaśabdasya siddharūpe pārivrājye anuṣṭheye ca dhyāne prayogātsaṃśayaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6706: yathā taṃ ha baka ityādivākyaśeṣādudgīthādyupāsanasyārtvijyatvanirṇayastadvadatha brāhmaṇa iti vidhihīnavākyaśeṣānmaunasyāpyavidheyatvaniścaya iti pūrvapakṣamāha-na vidhīyata iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6708: yadi maunaṃ pārivrājyaṃ tadā vākyāntaraprāptamanūdyate bālyavidhipraśaṃsārtham /
GSP33brssgo3u:6714: kiñcāmaunaṃ ca maunaṃ ca nirvidyeti śravaṇamananavadanuṣṭheyatvoktermaunasya vidheyatetyāha-nirvedanīyatveti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6719: sūkṣmārthasākṣātkārasādhanatvena dhyānādeḥ ṣaḍjādau lokataḥ prāptiṃ śaṅkitvā niyamavidhimāha-nanvityādinā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6720: nanu brahmavidyāpare vākye kathaṃ jñānāṅgamiti cetsaphalakratuparavākye 'ṅgavidhivadityāha-vidhyādivaditi /
GSP33brssgo3u:6722: tatra pradhānaḥ kraturvidhyādirata evāṅgaṃ vidhyanta ityucyata ityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6727: evaṃ bālyādiviśiṣṭe kaivalyāśrame śrutimati vidyamāne kasmācchāndogye gṛhiṇopasaṃhāraḥ 'abhisamāvṛtya kuṭumbe' (chā. 8.15.1) ityatra /
GSP33brssgo3u:6733: bahulāyāsāni hi bahūnyāśramakarmāṇi yajñādīni taṃ prati kartavyatayopadiṣṭānyāśramāntarakarmāṇi ca yathāsaṃbhavamahiṃsendriyasaṃyamādīni tasya vidyante /
GSP33brssgo3u:6735: samāvartanānantaraṃ kuṭumbe sthito brahmalokaṃ prāpnoti naca punarāvartata ityupasaṃhārātsaṃnyāso nāstīti śaṅkārthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6740: yathā maunaṃ gārhasthyaṃ caitāvāśramau śrutimantāvevamitarāvapi vānaprasthagurukulavāsau /
GSP33brssgo3u:6741: darśitā hi purastācchrutiḥ- 'tapaḥ eva dvitīyo brahmacaryācāryakulavāsī tṛtīyaḥ' (chā. 2.23.1) ityādyā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6755: tatra bālasya bhāvaḥ karma vā bālyamitiraddhite sati bālabhāvasya vayoviśeṣasyecchāyā
GSP33brssgo3u:6758: kiṃ tāvatprāptaṃ kāmacāravādabhakṣaṇatā yathopapādamūtrapurīṣatvaṃ ca prasiddhataraṃ loke bālyamiti tadgrahaṇaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6763: aviruddhe hyanyasminbālyaśabdābhilapye labhyamāne na vidhyantaravyāghātakalpanā yuktā /
GSP33brssgo3u:6772: tathācoktaṃ smṛtikāraiḥ - 'yaṃ na santaṃ na cāsantaṃ nāśrutaṃ na bahuśrutam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6773: na suvṛttaṃ na durvṛttaṃ veda kaścitsa brāhmaṇaḥ //
GSP33brssgo3u:6778: tatra bālye viṣaye taddhitasya bhāvārthatvāsaṃbhavātkarmārthatvaṃ gṛhītvā tiṣṭhanmūtratvādikarmaṇo 'prarūḍhendriyatvādirūpabhāvaśuddheśca bālakarmatvāviśeṣātsaṃśayamāha-tatreti
GSP33brssgo3u:6779: pūrvapakṣe vidyāṅgatvena tiṣṭhanmūtratvāderapyanuṣṭhānaṃ siddhānte bhāvaśuddhereveti phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6780: pūrvatra maunaśabdasya jñānātiśaye dhyāne prasiddhatvāt dhyānaṃ vidheyamityuktam,
GSP33brssgo3u:6783: yathopapādaṃ yathāsaṃbhavaṃ mūtrādi yasya tadbhāvastattvaṃ bālyavidhibalātpātityaśāstramanyaviṣayamiti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6785: na sa tatpadamāpnoti saṃsāraṃ cādhigacchati'ityādi śaucabhikṣādiniyamavidhiśāstrāviruddhasya bhāvaśuddhākhyabālyasya vidhisaṃbhavānna yatheṣṭaceṣṭāvidhiriti siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6794: tatphalaṃ vidyā siddhyantī kimihaiva janmani siddhyatyuta kadācidamutrāpīti cnavtyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6799: naca kaścidamutra me vidyā jāyatāmityabhisaṃdhāya śravaṇādiṣu pravartate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6800: samāna eva tu janmani vidyājanmābhisaṃdhāyaiteṣu pravartamāno dṛśyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6803: evaṃ prāpte vadāmaḥ - aihikaṃ vidyājanma bhavatyasati prastutapratibandha iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6804: etadapaktaṃ bhavati - yadā prakrāntasya vidyāsādhanasya kaścitpratibandho na kriyata upasthitavipākena karmāntareṇa tadehaiva vidyotpadyate,
GSP33brssgo3u:6805: yadā tu khalu tatpratibandhaḥ kriyate tadāmutreti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6807: yāni cākasya karmaṇo vipācakāni deśakālanimittāni tānyevānyasyāpīti na niyantuṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssgo3u:6809: śāstramapyasya karmaṇa idaṃ phalaṃ bhavatītyetāvati paryavasitaṃ na deśakālanimittaviśeṣamapi saṃkārtayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6811: nacāviśeṣeṇa vidyāyāmabhisaṃdhirnotpadyata ihāmutra vā me vidyā jāyatāmityabhisaṃdherniraṅ kuśatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6813: tathācaśrutirdurbodhatvamātmano darśayati - 'śravaṇāyāpi bahubhiryo na labhyaḥ śṛṇvanto 'pi bahavo yaṃ na vidyuḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6814: āścaryo 'sya vaktā kuśalo 'sya labdhāścaryo jñātā kuśalānuśiṣṭaḥ' (ka. 2.7) iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6815: garbhasya eva ca vāmadevaḥ pratipede brahmabhāvamiti vadantī janmāntarasaṃcitātsādhanājjanmāntare vidyotpattiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6817: samṛtāvapi - 'aprāpya yogasaṃsiddhiṃ kāṃ gatiṃ kṛṣṇa gacchati' (gī. 6.36)
GSP33brssgo3u:6818: ityarjunena pṛṣṭo bhagavānvāsudevaḥ 'nahi kalyāṇakṛtkaściddurgatiṃ tāta gacchati' (gī. 6.40)
GSP33brssgo3u:6819: ityuktvā punastasya puṇyalokaprāptiṃ sādhukule saṃbūtiṃ cābhidhāyānantaram 'tatra taṃ buddhisaṃyogaṃ labhate paurvadehikam' (gī.
GSP33brssgo3u:6823: aihikamapi saṃnyāsādibālyāntaṃ sādhanajātamuktvā tatsādhyavidyājanma vicāryata iti saṃgatiṃ vadan sādhanasya dvidhā phalasaṃbhavātsaṃśayamāha-sarvetyādinā
GSP33brssgo3u:6826: śuddhidvārā yajñādibhiḥ śravaṇādiṣu sākṣādvidyāhetuṣu ghaṭiteṣu vidyāvilambo na yuktaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6827: dṛśyate ca vilambaḥ ataḥ śravaṇādervidyāhetutvamasiddhamiti pūrvapakṣe phalam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6828: pratibandhakavaśādvilambe 'pi hetutvasiddhiriti siddhānte phalaṃ matvā citrādivadaniyataphalaṃ śravaṇādikamiti siddhāntayati-evamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6829: nanu prārabdhakarmaviśeṣeṇa śravaṇādiphalapratibandhaḥ kimiti kriyate śravaṇādinaiva karmavipākapratibandhaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-upasthitavipākatvaṃ ceti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6836: tathāpi karmaṇaiva śravaṇādipratibandho na vaiparītyamityatra ko hetustamāha-sādhaneti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6848: yathā mumukṣorvidyāsādhanāvalambinaḥ sādhanavīryaviśeṣādvidyalakṣaṇe phala aihikāmuṣmikaphalatvakṛto viśeṣapratiniyamo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6851: na khalu muktiphale kaścidevaṃbhūto viśeṣapratiniyama āśaṅkitavyaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6863: apica vidyāsādhanaṃ svavīryaviśeṣāsvaphala eva vidyāyāṃ kañcidatiśayamāsañjayenna vidyāphale muktau /
GSP33brssgo3u:6865: naca tasyāmapyutkarṣanikarṣātmako 'tiśaya upapadyate nikṛṣṭāyā vidyātvābhāvādutkṛṣṭaiva hi vidyā bhavati /
GSP33brssgo3u:6871: ityādyāsu guṇāvāpodvāpavaśādbhedopapattau satyāmupapadyate yathāsvaṃ phalabhedaniyamaḥ karmaphalavat /
GSP33brssgo3u:6872: tathāca liṅgadarśanam - 'taṃ yathā yathopāsate tadeva bhavati' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6874: tathāca smṛtiḥ - 'nahi gatiradhikāsti kasyacitsati hi guṇe pravadantyatulyatām' iti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6876: asati prārabdhakarmapratibandhe śravaṇādinehaiva vidyodayaḥ yajñādibhiḥ saṃcitapāpapratibandhasya nirastatvāt /
GSP33brssgo3u:6877: sati tu bhogena tannirāsādamutreti vidyāyā aihikāmuṣmikatvaviśeṣaniyama uktastadvatphale
GSP33brssgo3u:6880: tasyāṃ vidyāvadviśeṣaniyamo 'sti na veti phalasyobhayathāsaṃbhavātsaṃśaye pūrvapakṣamāha-yatheti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6884: kiñca śravaṇāditāratamyādvidyāyāṃ kañcidatiśayamaṅgīkṛtya vidyālabhyamuktau nātiśaya ityāha-apica vidyāsādhanamiti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6887: vidyayābhivyaktatvena brahmānanda eva mukhyaphalamabhivyaktiravidyānivṛttirānandasvarūpasphūrtipratibandhakābhāvatayā vidyayā sādhyate sā cānirvācyeti na dvaitāpattiḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6897: kathaṃ tarhi pūrvādhikaraṇe vidyāyā viśeṣa uktaḥ,
GSP33brssgo3u:6899: satyāmapi sāmagryāṃ jñāne vilamba ukto na tāratamyamityarthaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6900: tarhi satyapi jñāne muktau vilambaḥ kiṃ na syādityata āha-natviti /
GSP33brssgo3u:6901: vāyvādipratibandhāddipotpattivilambe 'pyutpanne tamonivṛttivilambādarśanātsati jñāne nājñānanivṛttau vilamba iti bhāvaḥ /
GSP33brssgo3u:6902: kiñca karmaṇāmupāsanānāṃ ca guṇabhedena tāratamyātphalatāratamyaṃ yuktam /
GSP33brssgo3u:6908: iti śrīmatparamahaṃsaparivrājakācāryaśrīgovindānandabhagavatkṛtau śārīrakavyākhyāyā bhāṣyaratnaprabhāṭīkāyāṃ tṛtīyasyādhyāyasya caturthaḥ pādaḥ
